source:
Done, are we?
Then haul your bloody arses over here so's we can leave this awful place!
target:
Done, are we?
Then haul your bloody arses over here so's we can leave this awful place!

source: That was...adequate. Back to me, adventurer.
target: That was...adequate. Back to me, adventurer.

source: You've a knack for this, haven't you? 'Twas as if I were watching myself, ten summers past!
target: You've a knack for this, haven't you? 'Twas as if I were watching myself, ten summers past!

source: Defeat one enemy group at a time.
target: Defeat one enemy group at a time.

source: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
target: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.

source: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
target: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.

source: Steady there! Only a fool with a death wish would engage both parties at once!
target: Steady there! Only a fool with a death wish would engage both parties at once!

source: Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.
target: Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.

source: Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!
target: Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!

source: The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!
target: The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!

source: Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!
target: Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!

source: What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!
target: What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!

source: Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.
target: Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.

source: You've come this far, now finish him!
target: You've come this far, now finish him!

source: When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!
target: When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!

source: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
target: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.

source: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
target: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.

source: The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.
target: The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.

source: Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.
target: Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.

source: Reinforcements! Move to intercept!
target: Reinforcements! Move to intercept!

source: Another wave! But unlike the last!
target: Another wave! But unlike the last!

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.
target: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.

source: Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.
target: Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.
target: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.

source: Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.
target: Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.

source: Pull the lever and open the gate!
target: Pull the lever and open the gate!

source: Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!
target: Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!

source: There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.
target: There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.

source: A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.
target: A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.

source: A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!
target: A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!

source: A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!
target: A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!

source: The boulders are beginning to crack!
target: The boulders are beginning to crack!

source: The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!
target: The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!

source: Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.
target: Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.

source: My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.
target: My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.

source: Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.
target: Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.

source: Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.
target: Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.

source: The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.
target: The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.

source: The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.
target: The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.

source: The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!
target: The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!

source: The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.
target: The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.
target: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.

source: Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.
target: Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.

source: Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.
target: Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.

source: The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.
target: The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.

source: In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!
target: In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!

source: Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.
target: Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.

source: The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!
target: The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!

source: And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.
target: And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.

source: Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.
target: Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.

source: Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!
target: Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!

source:
Stay your blades!
The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!
target:
Stay your blades!
The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!

source: You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!
target: You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!

source: The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.
target: The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.

source: Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.
target: Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.

source: Fire sprite cores
target: Fire sprite cores

source: Silence those bandits!
target: Silence those bandits!

source: Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.
target: Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.

source: Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.
target: Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.

source: If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.
target: If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.

source: Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.
target: Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.

source: It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.
target: It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.

source: Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!
target: Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!

source: Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!
target: Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!

source: The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!
target: The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!

source: The mist, it returns!
target: The mist, it returns!

source:
The creature has left the pollen mist!
Now is your chance! Strike it down!
target:
The creature has left the pollen mist!
Now is your chance! Strike it down!

source: Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!
target: Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!

source: Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!
target: Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!

source: Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.
target: Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.

source: Beware of reinforcements.
target: Beware of reinforcements.

source: Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.
target: Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.

source: Redbellies! To me!
target: Redbellies! To me!

source: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
target: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!

source: Where are all my men!?
target: Where are all my men!?

source: Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.
target: Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.

source: The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!
target: The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!

source: Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.
target: Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.

source: Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.
target: Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.

source: Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.
target: Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.

source: The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.
target: The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.

source:
Reinforcements!
See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.
target:
Reinforcements!
See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.

source: Another unit! You know what you must do!
target: Another unit! You know what you must do!

source: Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!
target: Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!

source: Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!
target: Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!

source: Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.
target: Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.

source: Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.
target: Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.

source: Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.
target: Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.

source: Reinforcements called
target: Reinforcements called

source: Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.
target: Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.

source: Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.
target: Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.

source: Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!
target: Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!

source: Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.
target: Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.

source: Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!
target: Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!

source: Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.
target: Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.

source: Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.
target: Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.

source: Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.
target: Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.

source: The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.
target: The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.

source: The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.
target: The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.

source: Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!
target: Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!

source: If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.
target: If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.

source: I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!
target: I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!

source: The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!
target: The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!

source: The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!
target: The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!

source: Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.
target: Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.

source: Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.
target: Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.

source: When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.
target: When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.

source: Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!
target: Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!

source: That wasn't so hard now, was it?
target: That wasn't so hard now, was it?

source:
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!?
See to the bubbles afore they see to you!
target:
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!?
See to the bubbles afore they see to you!

source:
I reckon you've done this before.
That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.
target:
I reckon you've done this before.
That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.

source: What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?
target: What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?

source: Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?
target: Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?

source: The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!
target: The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!

source: Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!
target: Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!

source: Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!
target: Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!

source: Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.
target: Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.

source: See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!
target: See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!

source: Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.
target: Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.

source: Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.
target: Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.

source: A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.
target: A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.

source: If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.
target: If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.

source: Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...
target: Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...

source: You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.
target: You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.

source: Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!
target: Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!

source:
Go! Smother the blue flames!
It's the only way to see Buso weakened!
target:
Go! Smother the blue flames!
It's the only way to see Buso weakened!

source:
Damn! Another blue flame is lit!
Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!
target:
Damn! Another blue flame is lit!
Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!

source:
Rise up, adventurer!
This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!
target:
Rise up, adventurer!
This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!

source: Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!
target: Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!

source:
Now is your chance!
Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!
target:
Now is your chance!
Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!

source: Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!
target: Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!

source:
One of you has been marked!
For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!
target:
One of you has been marked!
For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!

source: Thrust him back into the void!
target: Thrust him back into the void!

source: Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!
target: Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!

target: Meet a Longstop ally

source: Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.

source: As you might have guessed, the purpose of this exercise is to teach cooperation.
target: As you might have guessed, the purpose of this exercise is to teach cooperation.

source: Your ally will hold the enemy's attention─it is your job to take the foe down!
target: Your ally will hold the enemy's attention─it is your job to take the foe down!

source: 味方と協力して、敵を討伐できれば訓練合格だよ！
target: 味方と協力して、敵を討伐できれば訓練合格だよ！

source: Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
target: Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!

source: Attack the same foe as your ally to win the battle!
target: Attack the same foe as your ally to win the battle!

source: That's the way, novice! I'll keep him occupied─you concentrate on bringing him down!
target: That's the way, novice! I'll keep him occupied─you concentrate on bringing him down!

source:
Very good!
Now here's a hint about enemy facing!
target:
Very good!
Now here's a hint about enemy facing!

source: Your opponent will have a harder time avoiding blows from the flanks or from behind.
target: Your opponent will have a harder time avoiding blows from the flanks or from behind.

source: There are also certain techniques that perform better when executed from such positions.
target: There are also certain techniques that perform better when executed from such positions.

source: When it comes to your place in a party you are the sharp end of the spear.
target: When it comes to your place in a party you are the sharp end of the spear.

source: Simply put, your role is to inflict as much damage as possible, while keeping your own skin intact.
target: Simply put, your role is to inflict as much damage as possible, while keeping your own skin intact.

source: As such, you cannot just attack whichever enemy you please!
target: As such, you cannot just attack whichever enemy you please!

source: If you strike a foe other than one controlled by your ally, then you risk becoming the target of deadly aggression.
target: If you strike a foe other than one controlled by your ally, then you risk becoming the target of deadly aggression.

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

source: For this exercise, you will be fighting multiple opponents!
target: For this exercise, you will be fighting multiple opponents!

source: The key to victory is coordination with your comrades─each foe will fall all the swifter under a focused assault!
target: The key to victory is coordination with your comrades─each foe will fall all the swifter under a focused assault!

source:
Pay attention, novice!
Target the enemy engaged by your ally!
target:
Pay attention, novice!
Target the enemy engaged by your ally!

source: Coordinate with your allies and defeat the enemy!
target: Coordinate with your allies and defeat the enemy!

source: Mark well the opponent your ally has engaged, and attack the same enemy!
target: Mark well the opponent your ally has engaged, and attack the same enemy!

source: Start the fight with the staff waver─such foes are often the most dangerous, but the least robust.
target: Start the fight with the staff waver─such foes are often the most dangerous, but the least robust.

source: Be sure to attack the same enemy as your ally! Strike the wrong foe five times and you fail this exercise!
target: Be sure to attack the same enemy as your ally! Strike the wrong foe five times and you fail this exercise!

source:
There's another yet standing!
Don't lose your focus!
target:
There's another yet standing!
Don't lose your focus!

source:
He's almost done for!

He's almost done for!

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

target: Do you remember the lesson where I had you evading enemy attacks?

Not bad, aye...

Not bad, aye...

Excellent!

Excellent!

Here comes another!

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

target: In this exercise, you will learn to manipulate the battlefield.

target: During the battle, enemies will pour forth from the rear gate. New foes will continue to flood in whilst this portal remains open.

But keep an eye on your companion!

source: Dealin' with the unpredictability of fiery brutes like these sharpens the reflexes, so we'll get 'em nice an' angry for ye.
target: Dealin' with the unpredictability of fiery brutes like these sharpens the reflexes, so we'll get 'em nice an' angry for ye.

source: Pick up the pace, soldier! These ain't even the small fry!
target: Pick up the pace, soldier! These ain't even the small fry!

source: Tap into those primeval instincts! Eye o' the coeurl! ...Speakin' o' which—let loose the coeurl!
target: Tap into those primeval instincts! Eye o' the coeurl! ...Speakin' o' which—let loose the coeurl!

source: That's one o' the benefits o' trainin' on this island. No shortage o' creatures ready to rip ye to shreds.
target: That's one o' the benefits o' trainin' on this island. No shortage o' creatures ready to rip ye to shreds.

source: Now yer all nice an' limbered up, we'll let ye loose on some more civilized targets!
target: Now yer all nice an' limbered up, we'll let ye loose on some more civilized targets!

source: Well, I weren't expectin' that. Still...made for interestin' viewin', I must say. From now on, though, you'll be up against the Maelstrom's best.
target: Well, I weren't expectin' that. Still...made for interestin' viewin', I must say. From now on, though, you'll be up against the Maelstrom's best.

source:
It's time, Brother!
Don't hold back, now! We'll be the talk of Maelstrom Command if we can leave a scratch on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target:
It's time, Brother!
Don't hold back, now! We'll be the talk of Maelstrom Command if we can leave a scratch on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!

source: <var 1A 02 /var>If<var 1A 01 /var>, aye. But I suppose it's too late to back out now... I say we move in tandem and try to overwhelm them.
target: <var 1A 02 /var>If<var 1A 01 /var>, aye. But I suppose it's too late to back out now... I say we move in tandem and try to overwhelm them.

source: Quick! Bind them with the iron chain! And watch your footing!
target: Quick! Bind them with the iron chain! And watch your footing!

source: Forgive me, Brother. I couldn't keep up...
target: Forgive me, Brother. I couldn't keep up...

source: Knights o' the Barracuda, to your positions!
target: Knights o' the Barracuda, to your positions!

source: No doubt you've heard tales of our skill at arms, adventurer. And now you shall witness it firsthand.
target: No doubt you've heard tales of our skill at arms, adventurer. And now you shall witness it firsthand.

source: Seven hells... To think I spoke of <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> skill at arms...
target: Seven hells... To think I spoke of <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> skill at arms...

source: I trust you will show me no favors! Meet me as you would an equal!
target: I trust you will show me no favors! Meet me as you would an equal!

source:
<pant> <pant> I yield! I yield!
By the Navigator... <pant> <pant>
That was...<var 1A 02 /var>inspirational<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
<pant> <pant> I yield! I yield!
By the Navigator... <pant> <pant>
That was...<var 1A 02 /var>inspirational<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Expectin' wet-nosed Maelstrom pups, were ye? Then yer in fer a treat! The Sirens are 'ere to give ye a <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> drillin'!
target: Expectin' wet-nosed Maelstrom pups, were ye? Then yer in fer a treat! The Sirens are 'ere to give ye a <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> drillin'!

source: We'll do our best not to gut ye, darlin', but once we taste blood, well...<var 1A 02 /var>old 'abits die 'ard<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: We'll do our best not to gut ye, darlin', but once we taste blood, well...<var 1A 02 /var>old 'abits die 'ard<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Tsk-tsk. Didn't nobody ever tell ye the 'ells 'ave no fury like a Siren scorned? Yer gizzard won't be fit fer the chum bucket when we're through with ye!
target: Tsk-tsk. Didn't nobody ever tell ye the 'ells 'ave no fury like a Siren scorned? Yer gizzard won't be fit fer the chum bucket when we're through with ye!

source: Sound the bell o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Lady Infernal<var 1A 01 /var>! Make ready the cannons!
target: Sound the bell o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Lady Infernal<var 1A 01 /var>! Make ready the cannons!

source: Forward battery! Fire!
target: Forward battery! Fire!

source: Abeam, fire!
target: Abeam, fire!

source: Cross spread! Fire!
target: Cross spread! Fire!

source: Blast 'em front an' center!
target: Blast 'em front an' center!

source: Like that, is it? PAH! All guns! Bombard the bilge-swillin' scrags!
target: Like that, is it? PAH! All guns! Bombard the bilge-swillin' scrags!

source:
Now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> a 'venturer after me own 'eart!
That lust for blood... Oooh, it sets me skin atingle.
target:
Now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> a 'venturer after me own 'eart!
That lust for blood... Oooh, it sets me skin atingle.

source: Bested the Sirens already? Why, Rhoswen would scarce have had time to swear herself hoarse.
target: Bested the Sirens already? Why, Rhoswen would scarce have had time to swear herself hoarse.

source: Dear me... Did the Sirens keep you so long? Mayhap you were loath to strike them for fear you might catch something...?
target: Dear me... Did the Sirens keep you so long? Mayhap you were loath to strike them for fear you might catch something...?

source: No matter. I am come to test the worth of the Krakens' newest acquisition. I trust you will oblige me...?
target: No matter. I am come to test the worth of the Krakens' newest acquisition. I trust you will oblige me...?

source: You will be <var 1A 02 /var>shocked<var 1A 01 /var> to hear that she prefers her prey roasted. Rather sophisticated for a savage beast, wouldn't you say?
target: You will be <var 1A 02 /var>shocked<var 1A 01 /var> to hear that she prefers her prey roasted. Rather sophisticated for a savage beast, wouldn't you say?

source: You seem to be keeping up with her quite well─thus far, at least. Did I mention that Ymir has hidden talents?
target: You seem to be keeping up with her quite well─thus far, at least. Did I mention that Ymir has hidden talents?

source: Hmph. 'Twould seem I wasted my coin. Very well. Victory is yours. Be on your way.
target: Hmph. 'Twould seem I wasted my coin. Very well. Victory is yours. Be on your way.

source: I, Eynzahr Slafyrsyn, shall be your final opponent.
target: I, Eynzahr Slafyrsyn, shall be your final opponent.

source: Couldn't help myself, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Those last few matches stirred something...
target: Couldn't help myself, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Those last few matches stirred something...

source: You seem to be treading water, Marshal. If I did not know better, I should think you cared naught for our company's good name.
target: You seem to be treading water, Marshal. If I did not know better, I should think you cared naught for our company's good name.

source: Spare me, Admiral. I hold my duty to the Maelstrom above all else─as you well know. Nevertheless, I will not deny that this uniform now prevents me from doing my worst.
target: Spare me, Admiral. I hold my duty to the Maelstrom above all else─as you well know. Nevertheless, I will not deny that this uniform now prevents me from doing my worst.

source: But since all here present are privy to the truth, might we not loosen the collar and hearken back to the glory days, just this once? ...By your leave, o' course.
target: But since all here present are privy to the truth, might we not loosen the collar and hearken back to the glory days, just this once? ...By your leave, o' course.

source: As you like. 'Twill make for a better spectacle.
target: As you like. 'Twill make for a better spectacle.

source: Heh. I said I'd never don you again, old friend. But many a man would trade the wisdom of years for a minute of youthful hubris...
target: Heh. I said I'd never don you again, old friend. But many a man would trade the wisdom of years for a minute of youthful hubris...

source: Abandon hope, ye fools of fortune, for you face Mistbeard, king of the five seas!
target: Abandon hope, ye fools of fortune, for you face Mistbeard, king of the five seas!

source:
I have drowned a hundred men on their own decks ere they took to sea!
Here, have yourselves a whiff of this!
target:
I have drowned a hundred men on their own decks ere they took to sea!
Here, have yourselves a whiff of this!

source: Aching for the theriac, are you? Let's have a little treasure hunt for it.
target: Aching for the theriac, are you? Let's have a little treasure hunt for it.

source: Nothin' gets the blood pumpin' like scrappin' with a pack o' ravenous beasties!
target: Nothin' gets the blood pumpin' like scrappin' with a pack o' ravenous beasties!

target: Overcome Unsevered Despair

target: Overcome Unstifled Prayer

target: Defeat Hraesvelgr

source: Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!
target: Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!

source:
The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?
target:
The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?

source:
A wyrm doth fight with both might and magicks.
Canst thou withstand the onslaught of spell and claw?
target:
A wyrm doth fight with both might and magicks.
Canst thou withstand the onslaught of spell and claw?

source:
This is as far as you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
You and your ridiculous name won't make it past me, kupo!
target:
This is as far as you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

Everyone fights! No one quits!

I'm chieftain because I'm the baddest, kupo!

Nidhogg will spare thee no clemency.

...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...

...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.

target: Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!

source:
Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?

Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?

...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.

...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.

source: Pursue the legatus
target: Pursue the legatus

source: Defeat Regula van Hydrus
target: Defeat Regula van Hydrus

source:
The legatus himself is here!
After him!
target:
The legatus himself is here!
After him!

source:
I shall contend with this foe.
Press onwards, my comrades!
target:
I shall contend with this foe.
Press onwards, my comrades!

source: There! It's van Hydrus!
target: There! It's van Hydrus!

source: Wha─ Ah!
target: Wha─ Ah!

source: I can't─ It's crushing me...
target: I can't─ It's crushing me...

source: Can't...breathe...
target: Can't...breathe...

source: Mistress Krile!
target: Mistress Krile!

source: Quickly! Inside the barrier!
target: Quickly! Inside the barrier!

source:
My weapon's inhibitors exist for a reason...
But I will not lose to you again!
target:
My weapon's inhibitors exist for a reason...
But I will not lose to you again!

source:
Magitek enhances my bladework tenfold!
You cannot hope to win!
target:
Magitek enhances my bladework tenfold!
You cannot hope to win!

source: Forgive me... I thought myself stronger...
target: Forgive me... I thought myself stronger...

source:
Mine eyes grow dim...
Whither now the Light...?
target:
Mine eyes grow dim...
Whither now the Light...?

source: Ugh... I am no warrior, it seems...
target: Ugh... I am no warrior, it seems...

source: No... Not again...
target: No... Not again...

source:
The Garleans strike for the heart of the facility.
And the legatus spearheads their charge.
target:
The Garleans strike for the heart of the facility.
And the legatus spearheads their charge.

source: We must be swift in our pursuit.
target: We must be swift in our pursuit.

source:
Go! I will stand guard over Mistress Krile.
You must keep the legatus from his prize!
target:
Go! I will stand guard over Mistress Krile.
You must keep the legatus from his prize!

source:
We leave her in your care, then.
You'd best keep her safe, Unukalhai!
target:
We leave her in your care, then.
You'd best keep her safe, Unukalhai!

source:
The central laboratory should be up ahead.
Let's hurry along, shall we?
target:
The central laboratory should be up ahead.
Let's hurry along, shall we?

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Krile needs you!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Krile needs you!

source: Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!
target: Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!

source:
Come, my children!
Claim the vengeance that is rightfully yours!
target:
Come, my children!
Claim the vengeance that is rightfully yours!

source:
Look upon the fool who dared embrace my power!
Witness the darkened wings that beat about his shriveled soul!
target:
Look upon the fool who dared embrace my power!
Witness the darkened wings that beat about his shriveled soul!

source: Champions of man! Hearken to my fury!
target: Champions of man! Hearken to my fury!

source: Thy final verse is sung!
target: Thy final verse is sung!

source:
Brood-brother, thou hast doomed me...
But if I must meet mine end, then all shall burn upon my pyre!
target:
Brood-brother, thou hast doomed me...
But if I must meet mine end, then all shall burn upon my pyre!

source: Slain twice by mortal hands...
target: Slain twice by mortal hands...

source:
All will perish!
All will be consumed by fiery ruin!
target:
All will perish!
All will be consumed by fiery ruin!

source:
Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!
target:
Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!

source:
Will you flee, little mortals?
My talons shall rend your courage; my jaws, taste agony!
target:
Will you flee, little mortals?
My talons shall rend your courage; my jaws, taste agony!

target: Clear the peat bogs

source: Defeat Arachne Eve
target: Defeat Arachne Eve

target: Clear the Shatotto Memorial

source: Defeat Ozma
target: Defeat Ozma

source: Defeat Calofisteri
target: Defeat Calofisteri

source:
My dear Yafaem...
What a wretched morass it has become.
target:
My dear Yafaem...
What a wretched morass it has become.

source:
Do you spy that wreckage up ahead?
Could it be one of the Talons' downed vessels?
target:
Do you spy that wreckage up ahead?
Could it be one of the Talons' downed vessels?

source:
Is this not a tributary of the White Maiden?
We should come upon Mhach if we follow it downstream!
target:
Is this not a tributary of the White Maiden?
We should come upon Mhach if we follow it downstream!

source: <cough> <splutter> I am not terribly fond of water...
target: <cough> <splutter> I am not terribly fond of water...

source:
We aim for that pyramidal structure, but ware the voidsent.
The air is thick with their otherworldly stench...
target:
We aim for that pyramidal structure, but ware the voidsent.
The air is thick with their otherworldly stench...

source:
Ah, the wonders of Mhachi architecture.
Fifteen centuries and a flood later, and still it stands.
target:
Ah, the wonders of Mhachi architecture.
Fifteen centuries and a flood later, and still it stands.

source:
Barring our way is a terrible sphere that has devoured entire cities.
We must prove the stronger if we are to reach the Nullstone.
target:
Barring our way is a terrible sphere that has devoured entire cities.
We must prove the stronger if we are to reach the Nullstone.

source:
This is it: the Tomb of the Nullstone.
There will be a guardian. There is always a guardian...
target:
This is it: the Tomb of the Nullstone.
There will be a guardian. There is always a guardian...

source:
Gaha! There were <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> of you blood-filled morsels!?
How well I will sup this day!
target:
Gaha! There were <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> of you blood-filled morsels!?
How well I will sup this day!

source:
Nasty little insects!
You will not scurry so within my web!
target:
Nasty little insects!
You will not scurry so within my web!

source:
Bah! Not strong enough! Not strong enough!
I must feed on more than flesh!
target:
Bah! Not strong enough! Not strong enough!
I must feed on more than flesh!

source:
Are you frightened, my precious prey?
Gaze into my eyes and know true terror!
target:
Are you frightened, my precious prey?
Gaze into my eyes and know true terror!

source:
What manner of prey...bites back?
I must warn...Lord Forgall...
target:
What manner of prey...bites back?
I must warn...Lord Forgall...

source:
Ah, some of you survived. How convenient.
I am in need of fresh souls to shatter the ward.
target:
Ah, some of you survived. How convenient.
I am in need of fresh souls to shatter the ward.

source:
<cough> After so long...I am arisen...
I will not...be buried here...
target:
<cough> After so long...I am arisen...
I will not...be buried here...

source:
Even empty husks have their uses.
See how they jerk and dance at my command!
target:
Even empty husks have their uses.
See how they jerk and dance at my command!

source: I will teach those who oppose me the extent of their folly...
target: I will teach those who oppose me the extent of their folly...

source:
Your pitiful lives will be mine in due time.
But first, you must be punished for your insolence!
target:
Your pitiful lives will be mine in due time.
But first, you must be punished for your insolence!

source:
Solitude weakens the spirit and warps the flesh...
Stray from the pack at your peril!
target:
Solitude weakens the spirit and warps the flesh...
Stray from the pack at your peril!

source:
Will you glimpse the realm that awaits you after death?
Drink deep from the chalice of oblivion!
target:
Will you glimpse the realm that awaits you after death?
Drink deep from the chalice of oblivion!

source:
Ah, how sweet the rancid breeze of the underhells...
Its winds will strip you to the bone!
target:
Ah, how sweet the rancid breeze of the underhells...
Its winds will strip you to the bone!

source:
Arise, my rotting playthings!
The board needs more pieces in play!
target:
Arise, my rotting playthings!
The board needs more pieces in play!

source:
My undead toys are so easily broken.
Mayhap my minions will prove the sturdier...
target:
My undead toys are so easily broken.
Mayhap my minions will prove the sturdier...

source:
How tiresome. I had thought to spare my energies for the ward.
But you insist on gripping to life so very tightly...
target:
How tiresome. I had thought to spare my energies for the ward.
But you insist on gripping to life so very tightly...

source: Embrace your fate! By my stygian light be your doom revealed!
target: Embrace your fate! By my stygian light be your doom revealed!

source:
My lord warned that mortals of power might interfere...
But you are no threat to me! I reign in the court of the void!
target:
My lord warned that mortals of power might interfere...
But you are no threat to me! I reign in the court of the void!

source: Know your slayer, intruders. I am Calofisteri, and by the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...
target: Know your slayer, intruders. I am Calofisteri, and by the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...

source:
Behold my magnificent mane!
These curls are blades that cut, and roots that drain!
target:
Behold my magnificent mane!

Forgive me, my queen...

target: The auracite! Gaze upon its undying brilliance and know true fear!

source: Hah hah hah hah! Even a hound knows when to turn tail! Would you have us think you less than chattel!?
target: Hah hah hah hah! Even a hound knows when to turn tail! Would you have us think you less than chattel!?

source: Ill fortune befall all who dare gaze upon me!
target: Ill fortune befall all who dare gaze upon me!

source: An inescapable hell awaits you all!
target: An inescapable hell awaits you all!

source: Without light, there can be only darkness!
target: Without light, there can be only darkness!

source: Born of darkness, born of night! Come forth, my children!
target: Born of darkness, born of night! Come forth, my children!

source: To maintain order, one must first have control.
target: To maintain order, one must first have control.

source: The land seeks order. It will not suffer the chaos you peddle. Nor will I!
target: The land seeks order. It will not suffer the chaos you peddle. Nor will I!

source: Why do you resist!?
target: Why do you resist!?

source: Resistance will be met with retribution! The land shall bury your screams!
target: Resistance will be met with retribution! The land shall bury your screams!

source: To defy order is to defy creation itself!
target: To defy order is to defy creation itself!

source: Tear them asunder!
target: Tear them asunder!

source: Even the laws of life itself are mine to bend! Rise sand! Rise stone! Heed my bidding!
target: Even the laws of life itself are mine to bend! Rise sand! Rise stone! Heed my bidding!

source: Come! The cleansing flame will seal all wounds!
target: Come! The cleansing flame will seal all wounds!

source: Rise dark water, and grant me strength!
target: Rise dark water, and grant me strength!

source: Goddess of ice, be my blade!
target: Goddess of ice, be my blade!

source: Goddess of ice, be my shield!
target: Goddess of ice, be my shield!

source: Living shield, protect me from evil!
target: Living shield, protect me from evil!

source: Freeze, dark waters! Steel my body! Steel my resolve!
target: Freeze, dark waters! Steel my body! Steel my resolve!

source: Let the ichor flow. Let it birth the mire that will drown mine enemies!
target: Let the ichor flow. Let it birth the mire that will drown mine enemies!

source: Petty creatures! And still you do not fall!
target: Petty creatures! And still you do not fall!

source: Enough of this! I shall end you now. All of you!
target: Enough of this! I shall end you now. All of you!

source: How is this possible? Nothing can withstand the cold! Nothing!
target: How is this possible? Nothing can withstand the cold! Nothing!

source: Now, the city shall sleep!
target: Now, the city shall sleep!

source: Before us lies the Royal City. My father is somewhere inside. I can feel it.
target: Before us lies the Royal City. My father is somewhere inside. I can feel it.

source: These are no ordinary birds!
target: These are no ordinary birds!

source: Something foul prevents our crossing. Ware its numbing breath!
target: Something foul prevents our crossing. Ware its numbing breath!

source: Cid was not mistaken in his assessment of your skill in battle. Still, I worry that something even more sinister awaits us ahead.
target: Cid was not mistaken in his assessment of your skill in battle. Still, I worry that something even more sinister awaits us ahead.

source: Seeq bandits! It appears the deplorable creatures are here to raid abandoned homes.
target: Seeq bandits! It appears the deplorable creatures are here to raid abandoned homes.

source: My father mentioned the Empire using their might to put down rebellions within the city, but this destruction is too widespread. What if that creature we fought earlier...
target: My father mentioned the Empire using their might to put down rebellions within the city, but this destruction is too widespread. What if that creature we fought earlier...

source: More bandits...despite all the creatures we've encountered? I know not whether they are brave or foolish.
target: More bandits...despite all the creatures we've encountered? I know not whether they are brave or foolish.

source: Another of the twisted “others”! This is not the work of the Empire. Something is wrong here.
target: Another of the twisted “others”! This is not the work of the Empire. Something is wrong here.

source: Again, you have proven your worth to this expedition. Let us see what lies beneath the city.
target: Again, you have proven your worth to this expedition. Let us see what lies beneath the city.

source: Welcome to the Garamsythe Waterway. These tunnels are said to have existed since before even the kingdom of Dalmasca was born. As the city grows, channels are widened, and new outlets dug. I would venture that some of the pools are so deep, no one alive has ever seen their bottoms.
target: Welcome to the Garamsythe Waterway. These tunnels are said to have existed since before even the kingdom of Dalmasca was born. As the city grows, channels are widened, and new outlets dug. I would venture that some of the pools are so deep, no one alive has ever seen their bottoms.

source: The creatures here are not mere beasts or voidsent. The secrets that lie beyond must be ones worth keeping.
target: The creatures here are not mere beasts or voidsent. The secrets that lie beyond must be ones worth keeping.

source: Any doubts I had of your participation in this rescue I have no longer. I was wrong to place mistrust in Cid and my sister's judgment. Now let us continue on. I sense we are close to our goal.
target: Any doubts I had of your participation in this rescue I have no longer. I was wrong to place mistrust in Cid and my sister's judgment. Now let us continue on. I sense we are close to our goal.

source: These ruins... We are no longer in Rabanastre, my friends. This is Lesalia. The Lesalia of Ivalician legend!
target: These ruins... We are no longer in Rabanastre, my friends. This is Lesalia. The Lesalia of Ivalician legend!

source: The air here feels...wrong. Can't you sense it? Death awaits us in yon chamber.
target: The air here feels...wrong. Can't you sense it? Death awaits us in yon chamber.

source: The ice burns hotter than flame! You are branded for life!
target: The ice burns hotter than flame! You are branded for life!

source: Crawl forth from the shadows, my pet!
target: Crawl forth from the shadows, my pet!

source: Pah! You have yet to witness the auracite's true might!
target: Pah! You have yet to witness the auracite's true might!

source: I walk the shadows. You will not see me until my lance has transfixed your very soul!
target: I walk the shadows. You will not see me until my lance has transfixed your very soul!

source: The tip of my lance is already at your necks. Submit, or die.
target: The tip of my lance is already at your necks. Submit, or die.

source: The light! It blinds!
target: The light! It blinds!

source: Drown in my darkness!
target: Drown in my darkness!

source: Writhe in the land's embrace!
target: Writhe in the land's embrace!

source: O Bahamut! We shall stand guard as you make ready your divine judgment!
target: O Bahamut! We shall stand guard as you make ready your divine judgment!

source: Ugh... None shall defy Lord Bahamut's will! On your knees, vermin!
target: Ugh... None shall defy Lord Bahamut's will! On your knees, vermin!

target: 10 seconds to Teraflare

source: 5 seconds to Teraflare
target: 5 seconds to Teraflare

target: 4 seconds to Teraflare

source: 3 seconds
target: 3 seconds

source: 2 seconds
target: 2 seconds

source: 1 second
target: 1 second

source: Use Deflect to dissipate the aether spheres!
target: Use Deflect to dissipate the aether spheres!

source: Defeat Lakshmi!
target: Defeat Lakshmi!

source:
Leaders of Gyr Abania...
Accept my love. Worship my light!
target:
Leaders of Gyr Abania...
Accept my love. Worship my light!

source:
She means to enthrall everyone...
We have to stop her!
target:
She means to enthrall everyone...
We have to stop her!

source: They've done a fine job of blocking our retreat...
target: They've done a fine job of blocking our retreat...

source:
We must break through!
Forget the primal and focus on the foe before you!
target:
We must break through!
Forget the primal and focus on the foe before you!

source:
Why...? I offer you peace and ssserenity...
Sssurrender yourselves to me...
target:
Why...? I offer you peace and ssserenity...
Sssurrender yourselves to me...

source:
And give up the freedom we've worked so hard to win?
Not likely!
target:
And give up the freedom we've worked so hard to win?
Not likely!

source:
Do not your mortal bodies tire?
Far better to dwell in dream.
target:
Do not your mortal bodies tire?
Far better to dwell in dream.

source: We'll keep our eyes open, thanks very much!
target: We'll keep our eyes open, thanks very much!

source: I shall free you from your hate.
target: I shall free you from your hate.

source:
There are too many...
We can't stop them all!
target:
There are too many...
We can't stop them all!

source:
Why? Why do you deny my blessing!?
You who defy me shall ressst in death!
target:
Why? Why do you deny my blessing!?
You who defy me shall ressst in death!

source:
They brought you into this world over a mistake I made...
And I'll be damned if I let you taunt me with it!
target:
They brought you into this world over a mistake I made...
And I'll be damned if I let you taunt me with it!

source: I'll cut us a path. Stand ready!
target: I'll cut us a path. Stand ready!

source:
You cannot flee my radiance.
You will all be my dreamers.
target:
You cannot flee my radiance.
You will all be my dreamers.

source:
We'll lock her down as best we can.
The rest of you need to run!
target:
We'll lock her down as best we can.
The rest of you need to run!

source:
I can't. I can't run away from this.
They need us!
target:
I can't. I can't run away from this.
They need us!

source:
...Then we stand and fight together.
Alphinaud, the envoys are in your care!
target:
...Then we stand and fight together.
Alphinaud, the envoys are in your care!

source:
Surely you do not mean to... Very well.
I shall see our guests to safety.
target:
Surely you do not mean to... Very well.
I shall see our guests to safety.

source: All of you, to me!
target: All of you, to me!

source:
Why are you two staying!?
She still has more than enough strength to addle you both!
target:
Why are you two staying!?
She still has more than enough strength to addle you both!

source:
You need more than three to best a primal!
And if we let you fall here, then who'll be left to stop her?
target:
You need more than three to best a primal!
And if we let you fall here, then who'll be left to stop her?

source:
Pitiful, misssguided children.
Lay down your weapons, lay down your heads...
target:
Pitiful, misssguided children.
Lay down your weapons, lay down your heads...

source:
Wha─ I can't move!
She's going after Lyse and Raubahn!
target:
Wha─ I can't move!
She's going after Lyse and Raubahn!

source: Do not your sssouls weigh heavy?
target: Do not your sssouls weigh heavy?

source:
She's building up to something big!
Come close to me, all of you!
target:
She's building up to something big!
Come close to me, all of you!

source:
Nice work, Fordola!
...Are you all right, though?
target:
Nice work, Fordola!
...Are you all right, though?

source: <huff> This... <gasp> ...This is nothing!
target: <huff> This... <gasp> ...This is nothing!

source:
Ugh, it's one thing after another...
We have to fight as one!
target:
Ugh, it's one thing after another...
We have to fight as one!

source: Why do you cling to your misery?
target: Why do you cling to your misery?

source:
She's starting to weaken!
Don't give up!
target:
She's starting to weaken!
Don't give up!

source: Behold...my divine brilliance!
target: Behold...my divine brilliance!

source:
What in the─? Her power's out of control!
I'll shield us, but you'll have to finish her off!
target:
What in the─? Her power's out of control!
I'll shield us, but you'll have to finish her off!

source: ...Quickly! I can't hold her off forever!
target: ...Quickly! I can't hold her off forever!

source: ...Kill her! <gasp> You need to kill her now!
target: ...Kill her! <gasp> You need to kill her now!

source: <gasp> I can't... <groan> I'm spent...
target: <gasp> I can't... <groan> I'm spent...

source:
My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I'll make sure my steel is worth the effort!
target:
My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I'll make sure my steel is worth the effort!

source: Again and again you refuse my gift...
target: Again and again you refuse my gift...

source:
Quickly now, while the primal is─
...Lyse!?
target:
Quickly now, while the primal is─
...Lyse!?

source: Godsdammit! We've failed...
target: Godsdammit! We've failed...

source:
Hold on, Fordola...
We end this now! For Ala Mhigo!
target:
Hold on, Fordola...
We end this now! For Ala Mhigo!

Activating drone attack sequence.

Automated assistant online... <buzzzzzz> <buzzzzzz>
Hello there. I see you've activated Ultima Prototype IV.
target:
Automated assistant online... <buzzzzzz> <buzzzzzz>
Hello there. I see you've activated Ultima Prototype IV.

source: This humanoid prototype can perfectly replicate eikon abilities. In fact, it's already loading our data on Sephirot.
target: This humanoid prototype can perfectly replicate eikon abilities. In fact, it's already loading our data on Sephirot.

source: Utilizing our data on Sophia, we can at last tip the scales in our favor.
target: Utilizing our data on Sophia, we can at last tip the scales in our favor.

source: Successfully mimicking the Demon Zurvan earned our researchers a patent under article 42─ <buzzzzzz>
target: Successfully mimicking the Demon Zurvan earned our researchers a patent under article 42─ <buzzzzzz>

source: Its ability to seamlessly switch between sets of data will keep enemies guessing.

target: Automated assistant offline... Please vacate Exhibit Level VIII. Maintenance will begin shortly.

Hello again. Oh dear, you've disturbed Ultima Prototype VI.
target:
Automated assistant online... <buzzzzzz> <buzzzzzz>
Hello again. Oh dear, you've disturbed Ultima Prototype VI.

source: This prototype is the result of years of research in genetic augmentation. Its preternatural vitality is not to be trifled with.
target: This prototype is the result of years of research in genetic augmentation. Its preternatural vitality is not to be trifled with.

source: A number of roborants can also be administered to bolster its strength further, making it the ultimate─ <buzzzzzz>
target: A number of roborants can also be administered to bolster its strength further, making it the ultimate─ <buzzzzzz>

source: There is no turning back!
target: There is no turning back!

source: Steel yourself!
target: Steel yourself!

source: You're mine!
target: You're mine!

source: To ashes with you!
target: To ashes with you!

source: Lightning, sear!
target: Lightning, sear!

source: Tempest, surge!
target: Tempest, surge!

source: Twofold is my wrath, twice-cursed my foes!
target: Twofold is my wrath, twice-cursed my foes!

source: All creation trembles before my might!
target: All creation trembles before my might!

source: Behold fury given form!
target: Behold fury given form!

source: My wrath is a ceaseless torrent!
target: My wrath is a ceaseless torrent!

source: No more games!
target: No more games!

source: Impressive. Very well, I shall bring all to bear!
target: Impressive. Very well, I shall bring all to bear!

source: Roar! Writhe! Rage!
target: Roar! Writhe! Rage!

source: You are stronger than I dared to hope.
target: You are stronger than I dared to hope.

target: Clear the first trial

target: Clear the second trial

target: Till Mog Do Us Part

target: Cards Beat as One

source: Welcome to the Valentione's Ceremony, kupo.
target: Welcome to the Valentione's Ceremony, kupo.

source:
Here, the pair of you will undertake two trials.
By your performance, we will know your affinity for one another.
target:
Here, the pair of you will undertake two trials.
By your performance, we will know your affinity for one another.

source:
First up, “Till Mog Do Us Part.”
The rule is simple: get through the maze, kupo.
target:
First up, “Till Mog Do Us Part.”
The rule is simple: get through the maze, kupo.

source:
Just take care not to stray too far from one another,
or your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Affinity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will weaken!
target:
Just take care not to stray too far from one another,
or your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Affinity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will weaken!

source:
Next up, “Cards Beat as One.”
Work together to find matching pairs of cards, kupo.
target:
Next up, “Cards Beat as One.”
Work together to find matching pairs of cards, kupo.

source: Be warned: picking the wrong cards results in a penalty.
target: Be warned: picking the wrong cards results in a penalty.

source: You may begin, kupo!
target: You may begin, kupo!

source: You may begin, kupo!
target: You may begin, kupo!

source: You made it, kupo!
target: You made it, kupo!

source:
That does it for the second trial, kupo!
We've seen all that we need to see!
target:
That does it for the second trial, kupo!
We've seen all that we need to see!

source: And now, the moment you've been waiting for...
target: And now, the moment you've been waiting for...

How well did your bond hold up amid the trials?
All shall be revealed, kupo!
target:
How well did your bond hold up amid the trials?
All shall be revealed, kupo!

source:
Your affinity can be likened to a rotten kupo nut.
I wouldn't wish it on my worst enemy, kupo.
target:
Your affinity can be likened to a rotten kupo nut.
I wouldn't wish it on my worst enemy, kupo.

source:
Your affinity can be likened to an ordinary kupo nut.
It could be better, but I'd still eat it, kupo.
target:
Your affinity can be likened to an ordinary kupo nut.
It could be better, but I'd still eat it, kupo.

source:
Your affinity can be likened to a plump kupo nut.
It makes you the envy of moogles for malms around!
target:
Your affinity can be likened to a plump kupo nut.
It makes you the envy of moogles for malms around!

source:
B-By the heavens, this is nothing short of a miracle!
Were your affinity a kupo nut, it would be the golden kupo nut of myth!
target:
B-By the heavens, this is nothing short of a miracle!
Were your affinity a kupo nut, it would be the golden kupo nut of myth!

source: Off you go, kupo! The first trial awaits!
target: Off you go, kupo! The first trial awaits!

source: Er, right... Well, you got through the first trial, kupo. That has to count for something.
target: Er, right... Well, you got through the first trial, kupo. That has to count for something.

source: Well done getting through the first trial, kupo. That wasn't a bad effort, but there's room for improvement.
target: Well done getting through the first trial, kupo. That wasn't a bad effort, but there's room for improvement.

source: Well done getting through the first trial, kupo! I must say, that was some impressive teamwork!
target: Well done getting through the first trial, kupo! I must say, that was some impressive teamwork!

source:
Now then, since I'm such a kind moogle,
here's a bit of help to get you started.
target:
Now then, since I'm such a kind moogle,
here's a bit of help to get you started.

source: Onward, kupo! The second trial awaits!
target: Onward, kupo! The second trial awaits!

source: I'm going to give you a little flash. Don't tell anyone, alright, kupo?
target: I'm going to give you a little flash. Don't tell anyone, alright, kupo?

target: Have yourself a good eyeful before I put them away.

source: Nice one, kupo! Keep up the good guesswork!
target: Nice one, kupo! Keep up the good guesswork!

source: Wow, you didn't make a single mistake! That's incredible, kupo!
target: Wow, you didn't make a single mistake! That's incredible, kupo!

source: Too bad, kupo. You have to focus and work together.
target: Too bad, kupo. You have to focus and work together.

source: That's all the cards matched. Well done, kupo!
target: That's all the cards matched. Well done, kupo!

That concludes the Valentione's Ceremony.
We look forward to hosting you again, kupo!
target:
That concludes the Valentione's Ceremony.

target: Did Ba'Gamnan─the Duma─give life to that creature!?

source: This pattern... It is unmistakably─ No, it cannot be...
target: This pattern... It is unmistakably─ No, it cannot be...

source: The city remains functional...after all these centuries. Let us access the transportation nodes.
target: The city remains functional...after all these centuries. Let us access the transportation nodes.

target: The city's defenses also seem operational. Destroy them, if you must.

target: The heat...is almost unbearable. Could this be the heart of the lighthouse's beacon?

target: I've discovered another device.

source: The architecture here is similar to that of the lighthouse...yet something feels off. The air...is so thin...
target: The architecture here is similar to that of the lighthouse...yet something feels off. The air...is so thin...

source: I believe you've succeeded in clearing another path.
target: I believe you've succeeded in clearing another path.

target: Those golems... I believe I now know where we are!

target: The area's final line of defense is upon us. We must proceed with the utmost caution!

target: There is no mistaking it. We are in the legendary Clockwork City of Goug!

source:
Enough of that.
I wouldn't want the pain to grow familiar.

Enough of that.
I wouldn't want the pain to grow familiar.

Struggle all you wish─I encourage it!
Your death will be all the sweeter...
target:
Struggle all you wish─I encourage it!
Your death will be all the sweeter...

source: Why does it fade away...?
target: Why does it fade away...?

source:
Worthless excuse for a daughter.
You're nothing but trouble.
target:
Worthless excuse for a daughter.
You're nothing but trouble.

target: A font of misery, that's what you are!

Fight like your life depends on it, dear sister.
You wouldn't want to disappoint me...
target:
Fight like your life depends on it, dear sister.
You wouldn't want to disappoint me...

If it isn't the cold-blooded little worm.
Always crawling through my rotten heart.
target:
If it isn't the cold-blooded little worm.
Always crawling through my rotten heart.

target: Your pitiful fortunes can bring you no lower...

target: Stay behind me, Tsuyu!

source:
Why...?
You have no place here...
target:
Why...?
You have no place here...

Perhaps... But it is too late for me.
There can be no redemption.
target:
Perhaps... But it is too late for me.
There can be no redemption.

target: All is bitterness and ashes...

target: In darkness blooms the spider lily...

target: From mortal husk I rise anew!

target: Suffused with night, I shall prevail!

target: In moonlight's chill, shine petals pale...

Rising moon!
A light without warmth, stark and uncaring!

Rising moon!
A light without warmth, stark and uncaring!

source:
Reaping crescent!
A sweeping doom, striking from darkness!
target:
Reaping crescent!
A sweeping doom, striking from darkness!

source:
No. No... Not yet.
Not. Yet.
target:
No. No... Not yet.
Not. Yet.

source:
Yes, my dearest parents.
I was the bane of your existence unto the very end!
target:
Yes, my dearest parents.
I was the bane of your existence unto the very end!

source:
The waning moon commands the night.
Its light...and its darkness!
target:
The waning moon commands the night.
Its light...and its darkness!

This is far from over!
My bloodied hands have much left to accomplish!
target:
This is far from over!
My bloodied hands have much left to accomplish!

target: A nightbloom shall flower here upon the site of my demise...

target: A nightbloom shall flower here upon the graves of my enemies!

You have come to deliver judgment for my failure?
Cut me down, then. Surely it is a simple task!
target:
You have come to deliver judgment for my failure?

The stalks are cast, and the fates have spoken.

The kami spared us, and we cannot repay that boon in death!

Begone from my sight!

A tiresome contest.
Begone from my sight!

...Ah. I understand.

target: Defeat Magnai the Older

source: Come, khagan! Let us dance!
target: Come, khagan! Let us dance!

source: You are strong indeed... A worthy champion of the Steppe...
target: You are strong indeed... A worthy champion of the Steppe...

source: But you are mistaken if you think I will fall so easily!
target: But you are mistaken if you think I will fall so easily!

source: Ahhh, fighting you is pure bliss!
target: Ahhh, fighting you is pure bliss!

source: Such sweet pleasure, I will not suffer to end so soon!
target: Such sweet pleasure, I will not suffer to end so soon!

source: ...Well? Do not tell me that is all you have?
target: ...Well? Do not tell me that is all you have?

source: My soul demands more, khagan! Give me more!
target: My soul demands more, khagan! Give me more!

source: <grunt> My arms...grow heavy... My eyes dim...
target: <grunt> My arms...grow heavy... My eyes dim...

source: But so long as my lifeblood flows...I will fight on!
target: But so long as my lifeblood flows...I will fight on!

source: Yaaaaaarrrgh!
target: Yaaaaaarrrgh!

source: Come! Let us begin anew!
target: Come! Let us begin anew!

source: This is the reckoning, khagan! One must fall!
target: This is the reckoning, khagan! One must fall!

target: 60 seconds to Meteor impact...

target: 30 seconds to Meteor impact...

target: 20 seconds to Meteor impact...

source: 10 seconds to Meteor impact...
target: 10 seconds to Meteor impact...

target: 5 seconds to Meteor impact...

source: Come! Plead your case unto the Sun!
target: Come! Plead your case unto the Sun!

source: Oh, we shall endeavor to be most convincing!
target: Oh, we shall endeavor to be most convincing!

source: When we have claimed victory, I claim Hien for the Buduga!
target: When we have claimed victory, I claim Hien for the Buduga!

source: <sigh> Do as you will...
target: <sigh> Do as you will...

source: Focus on Magnai─leave Daidukul to me.
target: Focus on Magnai─leave Daidukul to me.

source: You, too, must learn your place.
target: You, too, must learn your place.

source: You have left yourself open, Doman!
target: You have left yourself open, Doman!

source:
My fist swells with the passion of the Buduga!
Every last drop, I give to you, Hien!
target:
My fist swells with the passion of the Buduga!
Every last drop, I give to you, Hien!

source: Ugh, this bodes ill... Y'shtola─some healing would be welcome!
target: Ugh, this bodes ill... Y'shtola─some healing would be welcome!

source: So you still stand. But soon you will kneel.
target: So you still stand. But soon you will kneel.

source: Know the folly of opposing the will of Azim!
target: Know the folly of opposing the will of Azim!

source: These axes will not break! You have nowhere to hide!
target: These axes will not break! You have nowhere to hide!

source: Very well, then... Y'shtola─to me!
target: Very well, then... Y'shtola─to me!

source: I shall take care of this!
target: I shall take care of this!

source: What!?
target: What!?

source: Every step you will take, every move you will make─the Sun sees all!
target: Every step you will take, every move you will make─the Sun sees all!

source: Now, fall!
target: Now, fall!

source: Ungh... What strength─what <var 1A 02 /var>grace<var 1A 01 /var> is this?
target: Ungh... What strength─what <var 1A 02 /var>grace<var 1A 01 /var> is this?

source: You will not defile my new paradise!
target: You will not defile my new paradise!

source: Scurrying about my domain like insects... I will not suffer it!
target: Scurrying about my domain like insects... I will not suffer it!

source: Come no closer, filthy creatures!
target: Come no closer, filthy creatures!

source: I am righteousness!
target: I am righteousness!

target: And righteousness will prevail!

source: Bah, can't you do anything by yourselves!?
target: Bah, can't you do anything by yourselves!?

Come forth, my child!

I am Midgardsormr.
Father of Dragons, and paragon of wyrms!

I am Midgardsormr.
Father of Dragons, and paragon of wyrms!

Thou and thine fight with admirable spirit.
I reward such courage with an exchange on even ground...
target:
Thou and thine fight with admirable spirit.
I reward such courage with an exchange on even ground...

Valiantly have you struggled, but no more.
My roar shall herald your downfall!

Valiantly have you struggled, but no more.
My roar shall herald your downfall!

target: My coils will confound your mortal eyes...

Even in battle are mine assaults ever-changing!

'Tis the fate of all dragons to shed one form for another.
Even in battle are mine assaults ever-changing!

Overlong doth this clash endure.
Let us not allow the dance to grow stale!
