source: The time has come and so have I!
target: The time has come and so have I!

source:
I...I did not expect such fierce opposition!
And from <var 1A 02 /var>eight<var 1A 01 /var> of you, no less!
target:
I...I did not expect such fierce opposition!
And from <var 1A 02 /var>eight<var 1A 01 /var> of you, no less!

source:
Enough! It is time we fought like men.
And ladies. And men who dress like ladies!
target:
Enough! It is time we fought like men.
And ladies. And men who dress like ladies!

source: For Yojimbo... It is Gilgameshing time!
target: For Yojimbo... It is Gilgameshing time!

source: Yes, 'tis I! The man, the myth, the legend!
target: Yes, 'tis I! The man, the myth, the legend!

source: Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!
target: Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!

source:
I have learned much and more in the
Far East, my friends! Behold!
target:
I have learned much and more in the
Far East, my friends! Behold!

source: Double your pleasure! Double your fun!
target: Double your pleasure! Double your fun!

source: Look behind you! A giant <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Look behind you! A giant <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: How our hearts sing in the chaos!
target: How our hearts sing in the chaos!

source:
You have some skill, I'll give you that...
But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!
target:
You have some skill, I'll give you that...
But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!

source: What's the matter, friend? All tied up?
target: What's the matter, friend? All tied up?

source: Take wing, ye souls of war!
target: Take wing, ye souls of war!

source: Slippery little devil, aren't you!?
target: Slippery little devil, aren't you!?

source:
Most impressive! Very well!
I, too, shall fight with all my strength!
target:
Most impressive! Very well!
I, too, shall fight with all my strength!

source: I...I will not be bested yet again! Have at thee!
target: I...I will not be bested yet again! Have at thee!

source: Arrive on the Field of Dust
target: Arrive on the Field of Dust

target: Clear the Field of Dust

source: Arrive at the impact crater
target: Arrive at the impact crater

source: Clear the impact crater
target: Clear the impact crater

source: Arrive at the provisional imperial landing
target: Arrive at the provisional imperial landing

source: They will not escape.
target: They will not escape.

source: Commence bombardment, and prepare to strike.
target: Commence bombardment, and prepare to strike.

source: Impressive. Annia, let us engage them together.
target: Impressive. Annia, let us engage them together.

source: They cannot hope to evade us both.
target: They cannot hope to evade us both.

source: Annia. Fall back.
target: Annia. Fall back.

source: Very well. Leave the artillery to me.
target: Very well. Leave the artillery to me.

source: Ready the ceruleum tanks.
target: Ready the ceruleum tanks.

source: Deploying now.
target: Deploying now.

source: You should feel honored, savages. Few are they who have witnessed this twice.
target: You should feel honored, savages. Few are they who have witnessed this twice.

source: It seems we have no choice, Julia.
target: It seems we have no choice, Julia.

source: And fewer still who have witnessed this...
target: And fewer still who have witnessed this...

source: Farewell, savages.
target: Farewell, savages.

source: Annia. Take the field.
target: Annia. Take the field.

source: Very well. I leave the artillery fire to you.
target: Very well. I leave the artillery fire to you.

source: Defeat Julia and Annia
target: Defeat Julia and Annia

source: Clear the Jungle's Plea
target: Clear the Jungle's Plea

source: Clear the Realm of the Machinists
target: Clear the Realm of the Machinists

source: Clear the Realm of the Templars
target: Clear the Realm of the Templars

source: Clear the lifeless alley
target: Clear the lifeless alley

source: Clear the Realm of the Thunder God
target: Clear the Realm of the Thunder God

source: Clear the Crystalline Gaol
target: Clear the Crystalline Gaol

source: The aether grows thick. She whom we seek must lie beyond this threshold.
target: The aether grows thick. She whom we seek must lie beyond this threshold.

source: My name is Mustadio Bunansa...and all paths lead through me.
target: My name is Mustadio Bunansa...and all paths lead through me.

source: Nothing I cannot fix!
target: Nothing I cannot fix!

source: And where might you be off to?
target: And where might you be off to?

source: You have proven yourself deserving of the title, Zodiac Brave. With this my journey can, at long last, come to an end.
target: You have proven yourself deserving of the title, Zodiac Brave. With this my journey can, at long last, come to an end.

source: The Beoulve youth guides your fate, but have you the faith to fulfill his legacy?
target: The Beoulve youth guides your fate, but have you the faith to fulfill his legacy?

source: Well fought, champion. I leave you now to your quest. My Ovelia awaits...
target: Well fought, champion. I leave you now to your quest. My Ovelia awaits...

source: Witness as the light returns!
target: Witness as the light returns!

source: Spirits of heroes fallen, rise! Pass thy judgment on those who would gaze unto the beyond!
target: Spirits of heroes fallen, rise! Pass thy judgment on those who would gaze unto the beyond!

source:
Bend to my will!
An inescapable prison awaits!
target:
Bend to my will!
An inescapable prison awaits!

source: Graaaaaah!
target: Graaaaaah!

source: To the current of life we succumb, its judgment swift and final. Its bite as cold as steel.
target: To the current of life we succumb, its judgment swift and final. Its bite as cold as steel.

source: The hearts of men are black with corruption and must needs be cleansed!
target: The hearts of men are black with corruption and must needs be cleansed!

source: Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.
target: Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.

source: I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.
target: I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.

source: They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!
target: They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!

source: The dreams of men are fleeting, yet they must be embraced if they are to flourish. Have you the faith to do as much?
target: The dreams of men are fleeting, yet they must be embraced if they are to flourish. Have you the faith to do as much?

source: Gaze deep into the light!
target: Gaze deep into the light!

source: O, divine light! Send us from our sins!
target: O, divine light! Send us from our sins!

source: Raise your shields against the falling light!
target: Raise your shields against the falling light!

source: Raise your swords against the coming night!
target: Raise your swords against the coming night!

source: You shall rue the day you raised your eyes to the heavens.
target: You shall rue the day you raised your eyes to the heavens.

source: Denizens of the abyss! From ink of blackest night, I summon you!
target: Denizens of the abyss! From ink of blackest night, I summon you!

source: I see it now. In you...his blood, my vanquisher in times...long past. But not so soon...shall I accept defeat...
target: I see it now. In you...his blood, my vanquisher in times...long past. But not so soon...shall I accept defeat...

source: O darkest of vessels! You are my sword! You are my rain!
target: O darkest of vessels! You are my sword! You are my rain!

source: Time waits for no one!
target: Time waits for no one!

source: To maintain order, one must first have control.
target: To maintain order, one must first have control.

source: Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.
target: Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.

source: It is time to end this!
target: It is time to end this!

source: Bare your steel!
target: Bare your steel!

source: Simmer does the light of life before rising to the heavens in a cleansing conflagration of divine benevolence.
target: Simmer does the light of life before rising to the heavens in a cleansing conflagration of divine benevolence.

source: She weaves her foul magicks!
target: She weaves her foul magicks!

source: Only we can shield you from doom! To me, heroes! To me!
target: Only we can shield you from doom! To me, heroes! To me!

source: You will not intervene!
target: You will not intervene!

source: What is she doing!?
target: What is she doing!?

source: The barrier will not last! We must stop her!
target: The barrier will not last! We must stop her!

source: Is it over?
target: Is it over?

source: I am the only god!
target: I am the only god!

source: Such fury!
target: Such fury!

source: Now is not the time to stay our blades!
target: Now is not the time to stay our blades!

source: Children of Hydaelyn! Make it swift! You are Her only hope!
target: Children of Hydaelyn! Make it swift! You are Her only hope!

source: Few can claim to have endured the might of my will.
target: Few can claim to have endured the might of my will.

source: Your coming was foretold, servant of Ivalice. Or perhaps you serve another.
target: Your coming was foretold, servant of Ivalice. Or perhaps you serve another.

source: I am Count Cidolfus Orlandeau. Your journey ends here.
target: I am Count Cidolfus Orlandeau. Your journey ends here.

source: The clouds have parted and the skies cleared. It is time I bade you farewell.
target: The clouds have parted and the skies cleared. It is time I bade you farewell.

source: To the current of life we succumb, its judgment swift and final. Its bite as cold as steel.
target: To the current of life we succumb, its judgment swift and final. Its bite as cold as steel.

source: The hearts of men are black with corruption and must needs be cleansed!
target: The hearts of men are black with corruption and must needs be cleansed!

source: Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.
target: Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.

source: They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!
target: They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!

source: I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.
target: I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.

source: Open your eyes to the darkness, and drown in its loveless embrace. The gods will not be watching.
target: Open your eyes to the darkness, and drown in its loveless embrace. The gods will not be watching.

source: To live by the sword is to die by the sword. There is time enough for regret in the flames of hell.
target: To live by the sword is to die by the sword. There is time enough for regret in the flames of hell.

source: Even the strongest of shields cannot defend the weakest of wills. A moment's hesitation beckons a lifetime of pain!
target: Even the strongest of shields cannot defend the weakest of wills. A moment's hesitation beckons a lifetime of pain!

source: Misfortune hangs heavy on a head once held high. Such is poor cover for when the heavens fall.
target: Misfortune hangs heavy on a head once held high. Such is poor cover for when the heavens fall.

source: Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.
target: Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.

source: Hark! The screams of ruin rise above the storm's discord. Shudder not in her endless cold.
target: Hark! The screams of ruin rise above the storm's discord. Shudder not in her endless cold.

source: You will need to withstand far more than this if you are to stand against the likes of <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: You will need to withstand far more than this if you are to stand against the likes of <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: I have been called the god of thunder. You will now know why! Upon my holy blade the very world lies in balance.
target: I have been called the god of thunder. You will now know why! Upon my holy blade the very world lies in balance.

source: And now the scales will tip!
target: And now the scales will tip!

source: That was merely the beginning, Warrior of Light! Merely the beginning!
target: That was merely the beginning, Warrior of Light! Merely the beginning!

source: Death awaits defiance!
target: Death awaits defiance!

source: Watch this!
target: Watch this!

source: You show promise. But promise won't save you from what comes next!
target: You show promise. But promise won't save you from what comes next!

source: Let this be your final testament!
target: Let this be your final testament!

source: I rarely miss.
target: I rarely miss.

source: “逃がすものかッ！”
target: “逃がすものかッ！”

source: I see you!
target: I see you!

source: Tell me... What is your darkest fear?
target: Tell me... What is your darkest fear?

source: The path ends here, but for that arcane circle. Do you believe it some sort of gate?
target: The path ends here, but for that arcane circle. Do you believe it some sort of gate?

source: The ruins of the monastery lie ahead, but do not think the path will be easy.
target: The ruins of the monastery lie ahead, but do not think the path will be easy.

source: Harpies? My sisters would not allow this... Unless...
target: Harpies? My sisters would not allow this... Unless...

source: Impressive. Perhaps you are deserving of your accolades. But do you have an answer for this...this Mist? Or is it aether?
target: Impressive. Perhaps you are deserving of your accolades. But do you have an answer for this...this Mist? Or is it aether?

source: Only the name of these ruins lives on with my people. We have no knowledge of their past, nor do we wish it. Trespass into the monastery is avoided except when necessary.
target: Only the name of these ruins lives on with my people. We have no knowledge of their past, nor do we wish it. Trespass into the monastery is avoided except when necessary.

source: Ahead! I see someone... No... Some<var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: Ahead! I see someone... No... Some<var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: The last time I was here, the only thing holding watch over these stones was a deafening silence. Could it be that guardian rose from its slumber upon sensing your master's auracite?
target: The last time I was here, the only thing holding watch over these stones was a deafening silence. Could it be that guardian rose from its slumber upon sensing your master's auracite?

source: When the Empire marched upon Rabanastre, many who lived in the desert fled east to the sanctuary of the jungle. Some who were not turned away by my sisters are said to have taken refuge here.
target: When the Empire marched upon Rabanastre, many who lived in the desert fled east to the sanctuary of the jungle. Some who were not turned away by my sisters are said to have taken refuge here.

source: There! Another...Lucavi? It appears to be a knight, but how─
target: There! Another...Lucavi? It appears to be a knight, but how─

source: She was a knight most noble, and her sacrifice will not be forgotten. My sisters will want to know much of her tale, I believe.
target: She was a knight most noble, and her sacrifice will not be forgotten. My sisters will want to know much of her tale, I believe.

source: Something here feels different than the monastery above... Otherworldly...
target: Something here feels different than the monastery above... Otherworldly...

source: Can you not feel it? An evil lurks here...one far beyond our ken.
target: Can you not feel it? An evil lurks here...one far beyond our ken.

source: Once, when I was very young, I heard the elders speak of a dark city where the horrors that haunt our nightmares dwell. The Necrohol, they called it─the Necrohol of Mullonde.
target: Once, when I was very young, I heard the elders speak of a dark city where the horrors that haunt our nightmares dwell. The Necrohol, they called it─the Necrohol of Mullonde.

source: This...guardian─he is not like the first two. We must tread with care, lest our journey meet a premature end.
target: This...guardian─he is not like the first two. We must tread with care, lest our journey meet a premature end.

source: The Mist I sensed before─the aether─its flow is much stronger now. It is almost as if the guardians we defeated were somehow preventing its escape...
target: The Mist I sensed before─the aether─its flow is much stronger now. It is almost as if the guardians we defeated were somehow preventing its escape...

source: If I must forsake myself to keep mine oath, then so be it!
target: If I must forsake myself to keep mine oath, then so be it!

source: Not since Tenzen have I...I...
target: Not since Tenzen have I...I...

source: You brought this upon yourself!
target: You brought this upon yourself!

source: Beg not for mercy!
target: Beg not for mercy!

source: How it burns!
target: How it burns!

source: You've nowhere to run!
target: You've nowhere to run!

source: Impudent mortals!
target: Impudent mortals!

source: Tremble before true power!
target: Tremble before true power!

source: None can match my might!
target: None can match my might!

source: More! I must have more! O aramitama!
target: More! I must have more! O aramitama!

source: Grant me the strength to smite mine enemies!
target: Grant me the strength to smite mine enemies!

source: Bah! Stubborn fools! This is far from over!
target: Bah! Stubborn fools! This is far from over!

source: Divided we shall triumph!
target: Divided we shall triumph!

source: Flesh of my flesh, show them their folly!
target: Flesh of my flesh, show them their folly!

source: No, I will not lose! I cannot!
target: No, I will not lose! I cannot!

source: RISE WE, THE LAND, THE LAND!
target: RISE WE, THE LAND, THE LAND!

source: FALL YOU, CRUSH YOU, OUR DUTY!
target: FALL YOU, CRUSH YOU, OUR DUTY!

source: SWALLOW YOU, CONSUME YOU, OUR DUTY!
target: SWALLOW YOU, CONSUME YOU, OUR DUTY!

source: THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...
target: THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...

source: RISE AGAIN, THE LAND, THE LAND!
target: RISE AGAIN, THE LAND, THE LAND!

source: ENDURE YOU, DEFY YOU, HOW DARE!
target: ENDURE YOU, DEFY YOU, HOW DARE!

source: THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...
target: THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...

source: Alright, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's time to put your new power to use.
target: Alright, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's time to put your new power to use.

source: You'll get the hang of it in no time. We'll warp circles around Garuda!
target: You'll get the hang of it in no time. We'll warp circles around Garuda!

source: Get ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We warp in to strike together!
target: Get ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We warp in to strike together!

source: Yeah, that's what I call teamwork! Keep it up!
target: Yeah, that's what I call teamwork! Keep it up!

source: No good─we gotta strike at the same time. Follow my lead!
target: No good─we gotta strike at the same time. Follow my lead!

source: Something big's comin'! Quick, get clear!
target: Something big's comin'! Quick, get clear!

source: Running's too slow! Warp to the pillar!
target: Running's too slow! Warp to the pillar!

source: Son of a─! Hang on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: Son of a─! Hang on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: I'll take it from here!
target: I'll take it from here!

source: Heh, I even amaze myself sometimes.
target: Heh, I even amaze myself sometimes.

source: Defeat Garuda
target: Defeat Garuda

source: Now!
target: Now!

source: Of all the places...
target: Of all the places...

source: Hold your ground until the Warrior of Light arrives
target: Hold your ground until the Warrior of Light arrives

source: Defeat Zenos yae Galvus
target: Defeat Zenos yae Galvus

source: Still you choose to struggle against the inevitable...
target: Still you choose to struggle against the inevitable...

source: Let's put an end to this here and now!
target: Let's put an end to this here and now!

source: Behold─a taste of my true power!
target: Behold─a taste of my true power!

source: Look upon Ame-no-Habakiri and know the depths of your folly!
target: Look upon Ame-no-Habakiri and know the depths of your folly!

source: Do you truly believe that possible? Then let us test the limits of this Garlean vessel.
target: Do you truly believe that possible? Then let us test the limits of this Garlean vessel.

source: Soon I shall give the lie to man's <var 1A 02 /var>indomitable<var 1A 01 /var> spirit.
target: Soon I shall give the lie to man's <var 1A 02 /var>indomitable<var 1A 01 /var> spirit.

source: Fight and struggle if that is your wont, but you will not escape your fate.
target: Fight and struggle if that is your wont, but you will not escape your fate.

source: So, there are still those willing to stand against the crown prince. Interesting...
target: So, there are still those willing to stand against the crown prince. Interesting...

source: Our fate is not for you to decide!
target: Our fate is not for you to decide!

source: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> comes, does <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>? Then I need not waste my time on you.
target: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> comes, does <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>? Then I need not waste my time on you.

source: A formidable foe... But we have come too far to fail now.
target: A formidable foe... But we have come too far to fail now.

source: Grrr... Ngh... What is this sorcery!?
target: Grrr... Ngh... What is this sorcery!?

source: Enough! You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> learn your place.
target: Enough! You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> learn your place.

source: Impossible... How is it you have grown so powerful in the gift!?
target: Impossible... How is it you have grown so powerful in the gift!?

source: You are strong, Bringer of Light, but Her blessing will avail you not.
target: You are strong, Bringer of Light, but Her blessing will avail you not.

source: To redress the balance─to ensure the salvation of this star─you must fall!
target: To redress the balance─to ensure the salvation of this star─you must fall!

source: No matter... You may have bested Lahabrea, but I will not be cast aside so easily!
target: No matter... You may have bested Lahabrea, but I will not be cast aside so easily!

source: We will suffer your interference no longer.
target: We will suffer your interference no longer.

source: You think you know of the dark, but I will show you the true nature of our power!
target: You think you know of the dark, but I will show you the true nature of our power!

source: The potential of this vessel is transcendent─without limit!
target: The potential of this vessel is transcendent─without limit!

source: Lyse, no... What have you done!?
target: Lyse, no... What have you done!?

source: I cannot fail... Not again...
target: I cannot fail... Not again...

source: ユウギリよ、リセを助けるぞ！
target: ユウギリよ、リセを助けるぞ！

source:
いや、よくやったユウギリよ！
残るは、わしが叩き斬ってくれようぞ！
target:
いや、よくやったユウギリよ！
残るは、わしが叩き斬ってくれようぞ！

source: No! I can still fight, I can still...still...
target: No! I can still fight, I can still...still...

source: クッ……ひとつ仕損じたか……！
target: クッ……ひとつ仕損じたか……！

source: If he would bring all to bear then so must we!
target: If he would bring all to bear then so must we!

source: Oh no you don't!
target: Oh no you don't!

source: No... Not like this...
target: No... Not like this...

source: し、しまった……！？
target: し、しまった……！？

source: Well done dispelling his phantoms. Now hurry, we must protect Lyse!
target: Well done dispelling his phantoms. Now hurry, we must protect Lyse!

source: If we can at least hold out until <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrives, I'm sure we can turn this around.
target: If we can at least hold out until <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrives, I'm sure we can turn this around.

source: Warrior of Light's Timely Arrival
target: Warrior of Light's Timely Arrival

source: Strength, my friends! It would not do to have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrive to find us battered and broken!
target: Strength, my friends! It would not do to have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrive to find us battered and broken!

source: We may be on the back foot, but it's not over yet!
target: We may be on the back foot, but it's not over yet!

source: Arrive at Teag Gye
target: Arrive at Teag Gye

source: Clear Teag Gye
target: Clear Teag Gye

source: Arrive in the Atelier
target: Arrive in the Atelier

source: Clear the Atelier
target: Clear the Atelier

source: Arrive in the throne room
target: Arrive in the throne room

source: Water is love, water is life! Drink up, ye parched souls!
target: Water is love, water is life! Drink up, ye parched souls!

source: There'll be no wilted flowers on my watch!
target: There'll be no wilted flowers on my watch!

source: Onward, my friends! Onward to your prize!
target: Onward, my friends! Onward to your prize!

source: Oh dear, I seem to have dropped a wasp nest! How very clumsy of me!
target: Oh dear, I seem to have dropped a wasp nest! How very clumsy of me!

source: My apologies, but accidents do happen!
target: My apologies, but accidents do happen!

source: Come and play in my beautiful garden!
target: Come and play in my beautiful garden!

source: Awww, it's a fake! You'll just have to keep going!
target: Awww, it's a fake! You'll just have to keep going!

source: Welcome! Welcome to our humble palace!
target: Welcome! Welcome to our humble palace!

source: Bravo, bravo! Very impressive!
target: Bravo, bravo! Very impressive!

source: Do keep up that fine form the rest of the way!
target: Do keep up that fine form the rest of the way!

source: Ah, our guests have arrived!
target: Ah, our guests have arrived!

source: It's the Fuath way to give guests a smashing welcome!
target: It's the Fuath way to give guests a smashing welcome!

source: Oh yes, we'll smash you! To bits and pieces!
target: Oh yes, we'll smash you! To bits and pieces!

source: Time for a musical interlude!
target: Time for a musical interlude!

source: O sweet melody, take phantasmic form!
target: O sweet melody, take phantasmic form!

source: You mastered the melody! Bravo!
target: You mastered the melody! Bravo!

source: For you, I will play a song...of terror!
target: For you, I will play a song...of terror!

source: Give me a crescendo! Give me a fortissimo!
target: Give me a crescendo! Give me a fortissimo!

source: Nooo! M-My performance!
target: Nooo! M-My performance!

source: Bear witness to the first doom
target: Bear witness to the first doom

source: Endure the first doom
target: Endure the first doom

source: Bear witness to the second doom
target: Bear witness to the second doom

source: Endure the second doom
target: Endure the second doom

source: Bear witness to the third doom
target: Bear witness to the third doom

source: Welcome to the final days of Amaurot...
target: Welcome to the final days of Amaurot...

source: The fabric of our star began to fray...
target: The fabric of our star began to fray...

source: ...and the unchecked energies of creation begat malformed beasts.
target: ...and the unchecked energies of creation begat malformed beasts.

source: Just as prayer gives rise to primals, our dread made manifest our deepest fears.
target: Just as prayer gives rise to primals, our dread made manifest our deepest fears.

source: The land buckled; the cities burned; the waters ran red with blood...
target: The land buckled; the cities burned; the waters ran red with blood...

source: Yet this was far from the worst of it. Come, and I will show you...
target: Yet this was far from the worst of it. Come, and I will show you...

source: Just a little further...
target: Just a little further...

source: ...and you will see the end of a world.
target: ...and you will see the end of a world.

source: The star was fading. We saw we had to weave its laws anew...
target: The star was fading. We saw we had to weave its laws anew...

source: But between us and our goal loomed a final misbegotten fiend...
target: But between us and our goal loomed a final misbegotten fiend...

source:
The beast bellows, and gives birth to terror.
A terror which, in turn, gives birth to new beasts...
target:
The beast bellows, and gives birth to terror.
A terror which, in turn, gives birth to new beasts...

source: Its gaze turns skyward, and fiery rain falls from the heavens...
target: Its gaze turns skyward, and fiery rain falls from the heavens...

source: Once the fear has taken root, it cannot be expunged...
target: Once the fear has taken root, it cannot be expunged...

source: As if feeding upon the horror, the beast bloats...then shivers...then ruptures...
target: As if feeding upon the horror, the beast bloats...then shivers...then ruptures...

source: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2201201 /var>
target: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2201201 /var>

source: The first beast was striking in its unsightliness...
target: The first beast was striking in its unsightliness...

source: As if to scour away all life, it called down a cataclysmic deluge.
target: As if to scour away all life, it called down a cataclysmic deluge.

source: Yet even its defeat did not halt the march of oblivion...
target: Yet even its defeat did not halt the march of oblivion...

source: From the depths of despair, the last harbinger arose...
target: From the depths of despair, the last harbinger arose...

source: Its voice was fulgent destruction, and none could stand in its path.
target: Its voice was fulgent destruction, and none could stand in its path.

source: And as it edged inexorably closer, we knew...
target: And as it edged inexorably closer, we knew...

source: Without decisive sacrifice, our star would surely perish.
target: Without decisive sacrifice, our star would surely perish.

source: Arrive at Terminus
target: Arrive at Terminus

source: Clear Terminus
target: Clear Terminus

source: Arrive at Malikah's Gift
target: Arrive at Malikah's Gift

source: Clear Malikah's Gift
target: Clear Malikah's Gift

source: Arrive at Unquestioned Acceptance
target: Arrive at Unquestioned Acceptance

source: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2203901 /var>
target: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2203901 /var>

source: Arrive at Repurposing
target: Arrive at Repurposing

source: Clear Repurposing
target: Clear Repurposing

source: Arrive at Aetherial Observation
target: Arrive at Aetherial Observation

source: Clear Aetherial Observation
target: Clear Aetherial Observation

source: Arrive at the Cornice
target: Arrive at the Cornice

source: Temporal stasis sequence initiated
target: Temporal stasis sequence initiated

source: Deactivation in 3...
target: Deactivation in 3...

source: Deactivation in 2...
target: Deactivation in 2...

source: Deactivation in 1...
target: Deactivation in 1...

source: Temporal stasis deactivated
target: Temporal stasis deactivated

source: Arrive in Ichthyology
target: Arrive in Ichthyology

source: Clear Ichthyology
target: Clear Ichthyology

source: Arrive in Phytobiology
target: Arrive in Phytobiology

source: Clear Phytobiology
target: Clear Phytobiology

source: Arrive in Phantomology
target: Arrive in Phantomology

source: I offer up my life's energies in the name of noble creation! Come forth, Quetzalcoatl! Tame the frenzy which profanes these halls!
target: I offer up my life's energies in the name of noble creation! Come forth, Quetzalcoatl! Tame the frenzy which profanes these halls!

source: You shouldn't be in here! The <var 1A 02 /var>beast<var 1A 01 /var> has broken free, and released the other experiments!
target: You shouldn't be in here! The <var 1A 02 /var>beast<var 1A 01 /var> has broken free, and released the other experiments!

source: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2205101 /var>
target: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2205101 /var>

source: Arrive at the Divine Threshold
target: Arrive at the Divine Threshold

source: Clear the Divine Threshold
target: Clear the Divine Threshold

source: Arrive in Shadowed Hollow
target: Arrive in Shadowed Hollow

source: Clear Shadowed Hollow
target: Clear Shadowed Hollow

source: Arrive at the Song of Ox'Gatorl
target: Arrive at the Song of Ox'Gatorl

source: Open your eyes, and purge the Ravel of this taint!
target: Open your eyes, and purge the Ravel of this taint!

source: Guardians of the Ravel─in the name of the emperor, I bid you awaken!
target: Guardians of the Ravel─in the name of the emperor, I bid you awaken!

source: Crush...intruders... Raaaaaargh!
target: Crush...intruders... Raaaaaargh!

source: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2202901 /var>
target: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2202901 /var>

source: 洞窟の奥から、何かが聞こえてきた……
target: 洞窟の奥から、何かが聞こえてきた……

source: 洞窟の奥から、叫び声のようなものが聞こえてきた……
target: 洞窟の奥から、叫び声のようなものが聞こえてきた……

source: 洞窟の奥から、またもや叫び声が聞こえた……！
target: 洞窟の奥から、またもや叫び声が聞こえた……！

source: 叫び声の主は、近くにいるようだ……！
target: 叫び声の主は、近くにいるようだ……！

source: Relive Branden and Ardbert's battle against Tadric!
target: Relive Branden and Ardbert's battle against Tadric!

source: Come, my children! Render up your lives for your master!
target: Come, my children! Render up your lives for your master!

source: For all your crimes and more, you will pay!
target: For all your crimes and more, you will pay!

source: The direct approach isn't working...
target: The direct approach isn't working...

source: Your feeble tricks are no match for my magicks!
target: Your feeble tricks are no match for my magicks!

source: He's drawing upon the aether of his thralls. Kill them!
target: He's drawing upon the aether of his thralls. Kill them!

source: Poor bastards. That's what you get for trusting a court mage...
target: Poor bastards. That's what you get for trusting a court mage...

source: Branden! Bring them all in close!
target: Branden! Bring them all in close!

source: Such an incredible display of strength! The stuff of legends!
target: Such an incredible display of strength! The stuff of legends!

source: There's no escape, Tadric! Surrender!
target: There's no escape, Tadric! Surrender!

source: While I still have so many lives at my disposal? I think not.
target: While I still have so many lives at my disposal? I think not.

source:
Come, children! In death shall your meaningless
lives gain glorious purpose!
target:
Come, children! In death shall your meaningless
lives gain glorious purpose!

source: I'll defend Lamitt! Branden, go to Nyelbert!
target: I'll defend Lamitt! Branden, go to Nyelbert!

source: Now... Burn bright for me, and die, die, die!
target: Now... Burn bright for me, and die, die, die!

source: How many more must die for your vanity!?
target: How many more must die for your vanity!?

source: No sacrifice is too great to claim what is by rights mine!
target: No sacrifice is too great to claim what is by rights mine!

source: Rise, my children! Rise and defend me!
target: Rise, my children! Rise and defend me!

source: TAAADRIIIC!!!
target: TAAADRIIIC!!!

source: Branden─don't let him cast that spell! Do whatever it takes!
target: Branden─don't let him cast that spell! Do whatever it takes!

source: Hahaha! What is life but a medium for my magicks!?
target: Hahaha! What is life but a medium for my magicks!?

source: How much longer can you hold the line, I wonder?
target: How much longer can you hold the line, I wonder?

source: The bastard's keen to drag this out...
target: The bastard's keen to drag this out...

source: Everyone! Now's our chance to turn the tide!
target: Everyone! Now's our chance to turn the tide!

source: I've still got a few arrows in my quiver!
target: I've still got a few arrows in my quiver!

source: Branden, bring them all into the center like before!
target: Branden, bring them all into the center like before!

source: See that, Tadric!? You're next!
target: See that, Tadric!? You're next!

source: Time to thin the herd...starting with that dwarf perhaps?
target: Time to thin the herd...starting with that dwarf perhaps?

source: Don't you touch her, you bastard!
target: Don't you touch her, you bastard!

source: Branden─we have to defend Lamitt at all costs!
target: Branden─we have to defend Lamitt at all costs!

source: Whew, thank you both!
target: Whew, thank you both!

source: I tire of these theatrics. Let us end this farce here and now!
target: I tire of these theatrics. Let us end this farce here and now!

source: This castle will be your tomb!
target: This castle will be your tomb!

source:
He's channeling a vast quantity of aether!
Whatever he's preparing, we cannot let him finish!
target:
He's channeling a vast quantity of aether!
Whatever he's preparing, we cannot let him finish!

source: You heard Lamitt! We have to stop him!
target: You heard Lamitt! We have to stop him!

source: Don't ask for mercy, Tadric. You won't get it!
target: Don't ask for mercy, Tadric. You won't get it!

source:
Mwahaha! You are beaten, Branden!
Voeburt and your precious princess are mine for the taking!
target:
Mwahaha! You are beaten, Branden!
Voeburt and your precious princess are mine for the taking!

source: We can't keep this up forever!
target: We can't keep this up forever!

source: You are most tenacious, but everyone has their limits...
target: You are most tenacious, but everyone has their limits...

source:
That attack's too much for any one person to take!
We have to stand together! Understood!?
target:
That attack's too much for any one person to take!
We have to stand together! Understood!?

source: Understood!
target: Understood!

source: Your end is nigh!
target: Your end is nigh!

source: Surely no one can harness such a massive torrent of aether...
target: Surely no one can harness such a massive torrent of aether...

source: Such obedient children, to offer up their lives in sacrifice!
target: Such obedient children, to offer up their lives in sacrifice!

source: Unrepentant to the last... This madness dies with you.
target: Unrepentant to the last... This madness dies with you.

source: Come and play! For the night is bright, and you can sleep when you're dead!
target: Come and play! For the night is bright, and you can sleep when you're dead!

source: Squish, squash! A crimson flower!
target: Squish, squash! A crimson flower!

source: This may tingle a bit!
target: This may tingle a bit!

source: This is the rhythm of the light!
target: This is the rhythm of the light!

source: Twist and sprout!
target: Twist and sprout!

source: We're sick of this cramped old castle! Let's play in the forest!
target: We're sick of this cramped old castle! Let's play in the forest!

source: Dance like the leaves on the boughs!
target: Dance like the leaves on the boughs!

source: This is so much fun! Let's play some more!
target: This is so much fun! Let's play some more!

source: Wet, wet, wet!
target: Wet, wet, wet!

source: When you play with fire...
target: When you play with fire...

source: Can you guess which one?
target: Can you guess which one?

source: Grow, my lovelies! Grow!
target: Grow, my lovelies! Grow!

source: Bigger is better!
target: Bigger is better!

source: Owww, that hurts! You play rough!
target: Owww, that hurts! You play rough!

source: I grow weary of this waking dream. 'Tis time to sleep for good.
target: I grow weary of this waking dream. 'Tis time to sleep for good.

source: Where did everyone go? Why did they all leave me?
target: Where did everyone go? Why did they all leave me?

source: The more the merrier! Join us, my children!
target: The more the merrier! Join us, my children!

source: Arrive at the Wound
target: Arrive at the Wound

source: Clear the Wound
target: Clear the Wound

target: Arrive in the Auction

source: Clear the Auction
target: Clear the Auction
