target: Arrive in the Manor House Courtyard

source: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2206D01 /var>
target: Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2206D01 /var>

source: Ah...ah...ah... Graaargh!
target: Ah...ah...ah... Graaargh!

source: Grrraaarrrgh!!!
target: Grrraaarrrgh!!!

source:
Servants of the accursed Light,
this world is not yours to claim!
target:
Servants of the accursed Light,
this world is not yours to claim!

source: By my hand, the veil between our worlds is torn open!
target: By my hand, the veil between our worlds is torn open!

source: Gaze into the abyss and despair!
target: Gaze into the abyss and despair!

source:
It is too late to beg forgiveness.
Your fate is sealed.
target:
It is too late to beg forgiveness.
Your fate is sealed.

source: May shadow blot out the Light!
target: May shadow blot out the Light!

source: From beyond the rift, your doom draws near...
target: From beyond the rift, your doom draws near...

source: Your evil will not go unpunished!
target: Your evil will not go unpunished!

source: Ravager of worlds, judgment is upon you!
target: Ravager of worlds, judgment is upon you!

source: Defeat Voidwalker
target: Defeat Voidwalker

source: I shall erase you from existence─mind, body, and soul!
target: I shall erase you from existence─mind, body, and soul!

source: My blade hungers for your lifeblood, evil one!
target: My blade hungers for your lifeblood, evil one!

source: Defeat the lesser eater!
target: Defeat the lesser eater!

source: Defeat Sophrosyne!
target: Defeat Sophrosyne!

source: Relive Lamitt's battle in pursuit of ancient secrets!
target: Relive Lamitt's battle in pursuit of ancient secrets!

source: Watch closely...
target: Watch closely...

source: Wait for it... There!
target: Wait for it... There!

source: ...Why doesn't it fix the other one, though?
target: ...Why doesn't it fix the other one, though?

source: Well, makes our lives easier, I guess. Chaaarge!
target: Well, makes our lives easier, I guess. Chaaarge!

source: Take down the weakling first!
target: Take down the weakling first!

source: <huff>
target: <huff>

source: Ha! Ain't no match for us!
target: Ha! Ain't no match for us!

source: Now for Sophrosy─ Oh. Shite.
target: Now for Sophrosy─ Oh. Shite.

source: How does it do that so fast?
target: How does it do that so fast?

source: Right. Divide and conquer, then. You take Sophrosyne.
target: Right. Divide and conquer, then. You take Sophrosyne.

source: Urgh... Can I get some help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: Urgh... Can I get some help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?

source: It's working! Keep at it!
target: It's working! Keep at it!

source: Ha! Take that, you─ What!?
target: Ha! Take that, you─ What!?

source: I'm so sorry... After everything you did for me...
target: I'm so sorry... After everything you did for me...

source: How am I <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> not strong enough?
target: How am I <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> not strong enough?

source: I'm...<huff>...not going to make it...
target: I'm...<huff>...not going to make it...

source: I can't keep up...
target: I can't keep up...

source: I'll keep it busy!
target: I'll keep it busy!

source: Ouch! Please tell me your Esuna can fix this...
target: Ouch! Please tell me your Esuna can fix this...

source: Much better! And now I take my revenge...
target: Much better! And now I take my revenge...

source: It's a big one! To me, quickly!
target: It's a big one! To me, quickly!

source: Nicely done, everyone!
target: Nicely done, everyone!

source: I don't know what's coming, but it can't be good...
target: I don't know what's coming, but it can't be good...

source:
Gods, it's as if my strength is being drained somehow...
I need you to heal me as much as you can!
target:
Gods, it's as if my strength is being drained somehow...
I need you to heal me as much as you can!

source: You did it! I'm alright!
target: You did it! I'm alright!

source: The statues─they're moving!
target: The statues─they're moving!

source: I'll draw their focus. Meanwhile...
target: I'll draw their focus. Meanwhile...

source: Say no more! Just keep them in one place.
target: Say no more! Just keep them in one place.

source: Tougher than I thought... But I'll get you yet!
target: Tougher than I thought... But I'll get you yet!

source: That's all of them. Now, let's finish this!
target: That's all of them. Now, let's finish this!

source: It's going for you, Lamitt! Come here!
target: It's going for you, Lamitt! Come here!

source: I need...help...
target: I need...help...

source: I get the feeling that you just saved my life. Again!
target: I get the feeling that you just saved my life. Again!

source: We're so close! Hit it with everything you've got!
target: We're so close! Hit it with everything you've got!

source: We'll follow your lead, Lamitt!
target: We'll follow your lead, Lamitt!

source: If I'm not fully healed soon, I think I might...<pant>
target: If I'm not fully healed soon, I think I might...<pant>

source: Come, then! Prepare for judgment!
target: Come, then! Prepare for judgment!

source: To me, my servants! Feast upon these villains and their foul sins!
target: To me, my servants! Feast upon these villains and their foul sins!

source: Receive of me my blessing and rise higher!
target: Receive of me my blessing and rise higher!

source: Fine, fine! If you refuse to die...
target: Fine, fine! If you refuse to die...

source: Then you will suffer! Yes! That will be your punishment!
target: Then you will suffer! Yes! That will be your punishment!

source: Suffer, suffer, suffer! Suffer and know your folly!
target: Suffer, suffer, suffer! Suffer and know your folly!

source: Damn you... Why do you not fall?
target: Damn you... Why do you not fall?

source: Why? WHYYY!?
target: Why? WHYYY!?

source: Graaargh! It burns, it burns!
target: Graaargh! It burns, it burns!

source: What...what is this?
target: What...what is this?

source: The Light surges within me! Ahhh, such bliss!
target: The Light surges within me! Ahhh, such bliss!

source: I see now... This is the passion of my ascension...
target: I see now... This is the passion of my ascension...

source: Very well, I shall embrace this trial!
target: Very well, I shall embrace this trial!

source: Your reckoning comes.
target: Your reckoning comes.

source: I shall excise the sin of your existence!
target: I shall excise the sin of your existence!

source: My ascension to godhood is complete!
target: My ascension to godhood is complete!

source: Relive Nyelbert and Ardbert's initial adventure!
target: Relive Nyelbert and Ardbert's initial adventure!

source: ボヴァインを倒せ
target: ボヴァインを倒せ

source: Your aid is most welcome, Nyelbert. Let us make short work of the beast, and take our leave of this place while we still can.
target: Your aid is most welcome, Nyelbert. Let us make short work of the beast, and take our leave of this place while we still can.

source: ...Indeed.
target: ...Indeed.

source: They come! Nyelbert, we will draw our foe's attack!
target: They come! Nyelbert, we will draw our foe's attack!

source: It would seem we're not the only ones stuck in here, eh?
target: It would seem we're not the only ones stuck in here, eh?

source: I have a bad feeling about this...
target: I have a bad feeling about this...

source: The leftmost one is mine! Cylva, you take its friend on the right!
target: The leftmost one is mine! Cylva, you take its friend on the right!

source: Consider it done. Have at you, fiends!
target: Consider it done. Have at you, fiends!

source: チィッ！　もう1体いやがったか！
target: チィッ！　もう1体いやがったか！

source: ラミット！　クソッ、あの岩を破壊しないとマズいぞ！
target: ラミット！　クソッ、あの岩を破壊しないとマズいぞ！

source: すまない……ラミット……。
target: すまない……ラミット……。

source: 命拾いしたわ、ありがとう……！
target: 命拾いしたわ、ありがとう……！

source: ああ、俺の仲間を助けてくれて感謝する！
target: ああ、俺の仲間を助けてくれて感謝する！

source: Well, aren't you a big boy...
target: Well, aren't you a big boy...

source: Still think you could have managed on your own, mage?
target: Still think you could have managed on your own, mage?

source: Perhaps...it would have been more of a struggle than I expected.
target: Perhaps...it would have been more of a struggle than I expected.

source: 開けた場所に出そうです。
target: 開けた場所に出そうです。

source: ここが、ボヴァインの根城か……。
target: ここが、ボヴァインの根城か……。

source: That's him. He's the one who drinks of the mines' aether.
target: That's him. He's the one who drinks of the mines' aether.

source: All right, let's put this oversized bull out to pasture. Cylva, Lamitt, Nyelbert...with me!
target: All right, let's put this oversized bull out to pasture. Cylva, Lamitt, Nyelbert...with me!

source: My magicks are yours...for now.
target: My magicks are yours...for now.

source: I will take the front. The battle is on!
target: I will take the front. The battle is on!

source: It summons others of its ilk? We should dispatch the small fry, and quickly!
target: It summons others of its ilk? We should dispatch the small fry, and quickly!

source: Leave it to me!
target: Leave it to me!

source: Gah, this one looks like trouble!
target: Gah, this one looks like trouble!

source: That should do it, Cylva!
target: That should do it, Cylva!

source: Another earthquake? This bodes ill...
target: Another earthquake? This bodes ill...

source: Our foe's up to something! Stand back, my friends!
target: Our foe's up to something! Stand back, my friends!

source: To my side! I'll heal your wounds!
target: To my side! I'll heal your wounds!

source: Damn it, here it comes again! Get back!
target: Damn it, here it comes again! Get back!

source: Take cover behind the rocks! You don't want to bear the full brunt of it!
target: Take cover behind the rocks! You don't want to bear the full brunt of it!

source: I sense unholy power... Get behind me, friends! Quickly!
target: I sense unholy power... Get behind me, friends! Quickly!

source: Cylva...are you all right!? Damn it, we can't keep this up much longer. Strike with all of your strength!
target: Cylva...are you all right!? Damn it, we can't keep this up much longer. Strike with all of your strength!

source:
チィッ、はずしたか！
だが、あと少しで……！　このまま押し切るんだ！
target:
チィッ、はずしたか！
だが、あと少しで……！　このまま押し切るんだ！

source: Taynor, my friend... Forgive me...
target: Taynor, my friend... Forgive me...

source: What's this? It leads deeper within...?
target: What's this? It leads deeper within...?

source: We really should have asked for a map. Not that it'd have been much use after all the cave-ins...
target: We really should have asked for a map. Not that it'd have been much use after all the cave-ins...

source: Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner
target: Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner

source: We must hurry. Before the Eulmoran soldiers gain any ground.
target: We must hurry. Before the Eulmoran soldiers gain any ground.

source: Wait! Do you see those sentinels?
target: Wait! Do you see those sentinels?

source: They are made to curse any who enter the pyramid. It is said to be seen by them is to be seen by death.
target: They are made to curse any who enter the pyramid. It is said to be seen by them is to be seen by death.

source: Dammit! We must deal with them quickly, before the curse can take hold.
target: Dammit! We must deal with them quickly, before the curse can take hold.

source: This curse was not as potent as I dared imagine. But I suggest we avoid another confrontation. Its effects no doubt grow with every invocation.
target: This curse was not as potent as I dared imagine. But I suggest we avoid another confrontation. Its effects no doubt grow with every invocation.

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> hold on!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> hold on!

source: Another sentinel. Its movement is somehow different from before.
target: Another sentinel. Its movement is somehow different from before.

source: They are massive... How are we to get around them?
target: They are massive... How are we to get around them?

source: I will draw their attention with a glamour.
target: I will draw their attention with a glamour.

source: It will not last long. The moment they are distracted we must run with all haste.
target: It will not last long. The moment they are distracted we must run with all haste.

source: I... I was reckless...
target: I... I was reckless...

source: Forgive me...
target: Forgive me...

source: A teleportation device? This should end well...
target: A teleportation device? This should end well...

source: Sister! They have reached the temple! I fear they are too fast for us.
target: Sister! They have reached the temple! I fear they are too fast for us.

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Almet? ...Can anyone hear me?
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Almet? ...Can anyone hear me?

source: We have been sent to...<cough> <cough>...separate chambers. This mist...
target: We have been sent to...<cough> <cough>...separate chambers. This mist...

source: Poison. And it has─<cough>─nullified my magick.
target: Poison. And it has─<cough>─nullified my magick.

source: Finally, fresh air. How fare you two? We have to keep moving.
target: Finally, fresh air. How fare you two? We have to keep moving.

source: I am here. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Are you all right?
target: I am here. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Are you all right?

source: Could it be Ran'jit? If so, we have precious little time.
target: Could it be Ran'jit? If so, we have precious little time.

source: It's all right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There's a path down here, but you have to jump.
target: It's all right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There's a path down here, but you have to jump.

source: Be careful of the traps inside. We are nearly there.
target: Be careful of the traps inside. We are nearly there.

source: Somehow we are still in one piece...
target: Somehow we are still in one piece...

source: That means little to the others if we do not hurry.
target: That means little to the others if we do not hurry.

source: Run!!!
target: Run!!!

source: There! That crevice in the wall!
target: There! That crevice in the wall!

source: We have to jump!
target: We have to jump!

source: Well, there is no going back now. I pray it is not much further.
target: Well, there is no going back now. I pray it is not much further.

source: Sister! Sister, can you hear me? Two soldiers have broken through our defenses!
target: Sister! Sister, can you hear me? Two soldiers have broken through our defenses!

source: Follow them! They are not to reach this temple, understood?
target: Follow them! They are not to reach this temple, understood?

source: A pair of soldiers somehow made it past my sisters. No doubt on their way here.
target: A pair of soldiers somehow made it past my sisters. No doubt on their way here.

source: All the more reason we should hurry, then.
target: All the more reason we should hurry, then.

source: Another door. Wonderful... I can but imagine what awaits us inside.
target: Another door. Wonderful... I can but imagine what awaits us inside.

source: There you are!
target: There you are!

source: Impossible!
target: Impossible!

source: More sentinels? Go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I will draw their attention.
target: More sentinels? Go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I will draw their attention.

source: I fear I've reached my limit. We must go. Now!
target: I fear I've reached my limit. We must go. Now!

source: I realize we must hurry, but we mustn't be reckless.
target: I realize we must hurry, but we mustn't be reckless.

source: These markings on the floor. <cough> <cough> I think they show the way out.
target: These markings on the floor. <cough> <cough> I think they show the way out.

source: What was that noise?
target: What was that noise?

source: By the gods...!
target: By the gods...!

source: This is no time for dithering. Come!
target: This is no time for dithering. Come!

source: We will hold him here. Quickly, make for the Heart of Toupasa.
target: We will hold him here. Quickly, make for the Heart of Toupasa.

source: It is unheard of for anyone to outpace the Viis. What is this man who comes after you?
target: It is unheard of for anyone to outpace the Viis. What is this man who comes after you?

source: My lord demands retribution!
target: My lord demands retribution!

source: At once, sister!
target: At once, sister!

source: Avoid the Ronkan executioners
target: Avoid the Ronkan executioners

source: Avoid the Ronkan executioners
target: Avoid the Ronkan executioners

source: Escape the chamber of poison
target: Escape the chamber of poison

source: Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner
target: Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner

source: Flee from the boulders
target: Flee from the boulders

source: Take a leap of faith
target: Take a leap of faith

source: Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner
target: Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner

source: Defeat Ran'jit
target: Defeat Ran'jit

source: Activate the Heart of Toupasa
target: Activate the Heart of Toupasa

source: Uimet! Cymet! You know what to do!
target: Uimet! Cymet! You know what to do!

source: I fear this is going nowhere...
target: I fear this is going nowhere...

source: I have him!
target: I have him!

source: Hurry! We cannot hold him for long!
target: Hurry! We cannot hold him for long!

source: Hurry! We can hold him no longer!
target: Hurry! We can hold him no longer!

source: Defeat Ran'jit!
target: Defeat Ran'jit!

source: Defeat Ran'jit!
target: Defeat Ran'jit!

source: Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!
target: Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!

source: Fire a round from your gunblade!
target: Fire a round from your gunblade!

source: Bide your time for a chance to strike!
target: Bide your time for a chance to strike!

source: Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!
target: Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!

source: Fire another round from your gunblade!
target: Fire another round from your gunblade!

source: Bide your time for a chance to strike!
target: Bide your time for a chance to strike!

source: Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!
target: Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!

source: Endure Ran'jit's onslaught!
target: Endure Ran'jit's onslaught!

source: Evade Ran'jit using Souldeep Invisibility!
target: Evade Ran'jit using Souldeep Invisibility!

source: Fire your last cartridge!
target: Fire your last cartridge!

source: Whatever it takes, I swear I will end you.
target: Whatever it takes, I swear I will end you.

source: Hmph. You lie to yourself as you lied to her.
target: Hmph. You lie to yourself as you lied to her.

source: Aye, I lied. Kept secrets. But no more. She deserves better.
target: Aye, I lied. Kept secrets. But no more. She deserves better.

source: A life of pain? Of ceaseless conflict and despair?
target: A life of pain? Of ceaseless conflict and despair?

source: This is going well...
target: This is going well...

source: Vanity...
target: Vanity...

source: Beast of my blood, answer my call!
target: Beast of my blood, answer my call!

source: Rend my foes and ward their blows.
target: Rend my foes and ward their blows.

source: Hah, so you really <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> a monster.
target: Hah, so you really <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> a monster.

source: Better a monster than a deceiver. A spinner of foolish dreams and false hopes.
target: Better a monster than a deceiver. A spinner of foolish dreams and false hopes.

source: There is no folly in hope!
target: There is no folly in hope!

source: ...I said as much myself, once. I was wrong. Never again.
target: ...I said as much myself, once. I was wrong. Never again.

source: Dammit! I need time to line up a clean shot.
target: Dammit! I need time to line up a clean shot.

source: I suppose if there's no other way...
target: I suppose if there's no other way...

source: When will you learn?
target: When will you learn?

source: When you're dead and buried!
target: When you're dead and buried!

source: Not good...
target: Not good...

source: The strain is more than I remember... At least now I can get that shot.
target: The strain is more than I remember... At least now I can get that shot.

source: You would court death for mere parlor tricks?
target: You would court death for mere parlor tricks?

source: <pant> <pant> ...My life would be but a small price to pay.
target: <pant> <pant> ...My life would be but a small price to pay.

source: You never understood her.
target: You never understood her.

source: She is not a bird to be locked away in a gilded cage.
target: She is not a bird to be locked away in a gilded cage.

source: And you presume to be her protector. Pathetic!
target: And you presume to be her protector. Pathetic!

source: Looks like I'll have to use it again, then.
target: Looks like I'll have to use it again, then.

source: Urgh... Hold still, damn you!
target: Urgh... Hold still, damn you!

source: No quarter!
target: No quarter!

source: You have played your hand far too early, boy.
target: You have played your hand far too early, boy.

source: This has carried on long enough, wouldn't you agree?
target: This has carried on long enough, wouldn't you agree?

source: Why do you persist in this folly?
target: Why do you persist in this folly?

source: Is that all?
target: Is that all?

source: Minfilia's last cartridge... Have to... <pant> <pant> ...make it count...
target: Minfilia's last cartridge... Have to... <pant> <pant> ...make it count...

source: There you are!
target: There you are!

source: Gah! But how!?
target: Gah! But how!?

source: Fools to a man!
target: Fools to a man!

source: I'd hoped you would fall for it a third time...
target: I'd hoped you would fall for it a third time...

source: Urgh... Though two times was... <pant> <pant> ...perhaps already too many...
target: Urgh... Though two times was... <pant> <pant> ...perhaps already too many...

source: No more tricks? Then let us finish this.
target: No more tricks? Then let us finish this.

source: But you've not even seen the grand finale.
target: But you've not even seen the grand finale.

source: One...last...disappearing act...
target: One...last...disappearing act...

source: Were you not struggling to stand I might think you serious.
target: Were you not struggling to stand I might think you serious.

source: Oh, I am <var 1A 02 /var>deadly<var 1A 01 /var> serious.
target: Oh, I am <var 1A 02 /var>deadly<var 1A 01 /var> serious.

source: Fool! You think the shadows will save you?
target: Fool! You think the shadows will save you?

source: There is no escape! Do you hear me!?
target: There is no escape! Do you hear me!?

source: To hell with you!!!
target: To hell with you!!!

source: Thank you, Minfilia...for this precious gift...
target: Thank you, Minfilia...for this precious gift...

source: Come on, old boy... <pant> ...One more shot...
target: Come on, old boy... <pant> ...One more shot...

source: Yield now and I will grant you a quick death.
target: Yield now and I will grant you a quick death.

source: But we've only just begun.
target: But we've only just begun.

source: Then pay it you shall!
target: Then pay it you shall!

source: Rise, oceans! Swallow this forsaken land!
target: Rise, oceans! Swallow this forsaken land!

source: All shall crumble before me!
target: All shall crumble before me!

source: Surge, tides! Crush, waves! Let none be spared.
target: Surge, tides! Crush, waves! Let none be spared.

source: Your corse shall feed the vortex!
target: Your corse shall feed the vortex!

source: Too stubborn to accept your fate, too blind to see you are doomed!
target: Too stubborn to accept your fate, too blind to see you are doomed!

source: Power...such power...mine for the taking!
target: Power...such power...mine for the taking!

source: None shall defy me!
target: None shall defy me!

source: Everything...is mine to consume!
target: Everything...is mine to consume!

source: I will not cease until the ocean covers every ilm of this star!
target: I will not cease until the ocean covers every ilm of this star!

source: Now, the sea shall swallow all!
target: Now, the sea shall swallow all!

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll use Eden's power!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll use Eden's power!

source: This should hold for now, but be careful!
target: This should hold for now, but be careful!

source: Not again! Hold on, I'll try to rebuild it!
target: Not again! Hold on, I'll try to rebuild it!

source: That's it, Eden!
target: That's it, Eden!

source: Defeat Leviathan
target: Defeat Leviathan

source: Relive Renda-Rae's battle against Balam-Quitz!
target: Relive Renda-Rae's battle against Balam-Quitz!

source: Balam-Quitz! Vengeance will be mine this day!
target: Balam-Quitz! Vengeance will be mine this day!

source: Just wait until I hit you with one of my dulling arrows...
target: Just wait until I hit you with one of my dulling arrows...

source: It worked! I've got you now, you bastard...
target: It worked! I've got you now, you bastard...

source: Gah, my ears! Need to use the arrows...
target: Gah, my ears! Need to use the arrows...

source: All I need is one good shot with a dulling arrow...
target: All I need is one good shot with a dulling arrow...

source: Godsdammit, what is wrong with you? Use the arrows...
target: Godsdammit, what is wrong with you? Use the arrows...

source: Ugh... Need to hit him with a dulling arrow before he roars...
target: Ugh... Need to hit him with a dulling arrow before he roars...

source: You'll pay for taking them from me!
target: You'll pay for taking them from me!

source: It was my fault. My failure. That's why I have to do it alone...
target: It was my fault. My failure. That's why I have to do it alone...

source: If I'd only been this strong back then, they'd still be alive...
target: If I'd only been this strong back then, they'd still be alive...

source: You can feel it, can't you!? The pain, the fear! Serves you right!
target: You can feel it, can't you!? The pain, the fear! Serves you right!

source: What the─ Where is this coming from!?
target: What the─ Where is this coming from!?

source: Gah! I won't let it end like this!
target: Gah! I won't let it end like this!

source: We won't! Godsdammit, Renda...
target: We won't! Godsdammit, Renda...

source: Made it in the nick, I see.
target: Made it in the nick, I see.

source: Are you hurt!? Don't worry, I've got you...
target: Are you hurt!? Don't worry, I've got you...

source: The lone wolf just had to do it on her own terms...
target: The lone wolf just had to do it on her own terms...

source: Aye, well, I was never good at indulging foolishness.
target: Aye, well, I was never good at indulging foolishness.

source: Don't...don't tell me you followed my trail?
target: Don't...don't tell me you followed my trail?

source: I'll tell you all about it after we kill this bloody bastard, aye?
target: I'll tell you all about it after we kill this bloody bastard, aye?

source: It's coming for me and Renda! Keep your distance!
target: It's coming for me and Renda! Keep your distance!

source: Gather round Nyelbert! Lend him your strength!
target: Gather round Nyelbert! Lend him your strength!

source: Gonna roar again, huh? The hells you will!
target: Gonna roar again, huh? The hells you will!

source: I've got plenty arrows left for you yet!
target: I've got plenty arrows left for you yet!

source: Gah... Too late...
target: Gah... Too late...

source: Steady, Renda! We'll best this bastard yet!
target: Steady, Renda! We'll best this bastard yet!

source: No one's dying on my watch!
target: No one's dying on my watch!

source: Take that, you bastard!
target: Take that, you bastard!

source: Well struck! Keep it up!
target: Well struck! Keep it up!

source: Focus, everyone!
target: Focus, everyone!

source: Renda, Nyelbert! Assist Lamitt, quickly!
target: Renda, Nyelbert! Assist Lamitt, quickly!

source: It's summoning all its strength for something big. Finish it!
target: It's summoning all its strength for something big. Finish it!

source: Everyone, to me! I'll lend you my power!
target: Everyone, to me! I'll lend you my power!

source: Together we will avenge my fallen friends!
target: Together we will avenge my fallen friends!

source: Something's wrong! It's shrugging off our attacks!
target: Something's wrong! It's shrugging off our attacks!

source: Without your roar you're nothing!
target: Without your roar you're nothing!

source: Calm down. Trust the arrows. Shut its bloody gob...
target: Calm down. Trust the arrows. Shut its bloody gob...

source: Grr... Need to hit it with a dulling arrow...
target: Grr... Need to hit it with a dulling arrow...

source: The arrows...use the arrows. It's the only way...
target: The arrows...use the arrows. It's the only way...

source: Gotta hit it with a dulling arrow before it roars again...
target: Gotta hit it with a dulling arrow before it roars again...

source: Yes, yes! Just like that!
target: Yes, yes! Just like that!

source: Like I'll let you roar again! I've got plenty of arrows left!
target: Like I'll let you roar again! I've got plenty of arrows left!

source: You are destined for naught else but oblivion!
target: You are destined for naught else but oblivion!

source: I am stifled by this vessel of flesh...
target: I am stifled by this vessel of flesh...

source: Behold, a sorcerer of eld! Tremble before my glory!
target: Behold, a sorcerer of eld! Tremble before my glory!

source: My dormant brethren, dream now of a dark tomorrow...
target: My dormant brethren, dream now of a dark tomorrow...

source: By our gathered might must we reclaim these vain reflections.
target: By our gathered might must we reclaim these vain reflections.

source: In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!
target: In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!

source: Has the Wardens' Light won free!? No...
target: Has the Wardens' Light won free!? No...

source: Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!
target: Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!

source: That Light split the world, and every life upon it!
target: That Light split the world, and every life upon it!

source: Our tragedy must never again come to pass!
target: Our tragedy must never again come to pass!

source: By His grace will Darkness reign over all!
target: By His grace will Darkness reign over all!

source: Death comes for Her servants...
target: Death comes for Her servants...

source: I shall rebuild our kingdom upon your bones.
target: I shall rebuild our kingdom upon your bones.

source: The future of this star shall be shaped by my hands!
target: The future of this star shall be shaped by my hands!

source: I shall be raised up by the prayers of my fallen brethren!
target: I shall be raised up by the prayers of my fallen brethren!

source: I am unbound by cosmic law!
target: I am unbound by cosmic law!

source: Hearken to the word of ruin!
target: Hearken to the word of ruin!

source: This place will be your tomb!
target: This place will be your tomb!

source: Begone!
target: Begone!

source: Darkness, flow through me!
target: Darkness, flow through me!

source: Abomination! You seek to shatter my soul?
target: Abomination! You seek to shatter my soul?

source: The arcane is mine to command!
target: The arcane is mine to command!

source: Flee, you fools!
target: Flee, you fools!

source: Darkness reigns!
target: Darkness reigns!

source: Drown in despair!
target: Drown in despair!

source: Unburden your sleeping souls, my brethren...
target: Unburden your sleeping souls, my brethren...

source: I shall bear every hope, every dream, every prayer!
target: I shall bear every hope, every dream, every prayer!

source: I will extinguish the spark of your miserable lives!
target: I will extinguish the spark of your miserable lives!

source: Give voice to your anguish, my brethren!
target: Give voice to your anguish, my brethren!

source: Give substance to our hopes, our dreams, our prayers...
target: Give substance to our hopes, our dreams, our prayers...

source: And by their undeniable grace, may our perfect world rise anew!
target: And by their undeniable grace, may our perfect world rise anew!

source: Yawn wide, the ever-hungering void!
target: Yawn wide, the ever-hungering void!

source: Devour the Light, and return all to Darkness!
target: Devour the Light, and return all to Darkness!

source: Impressive resilience... But it matters little. I have all eternity to break your stubborn wills!
target: Impressive resilience... But it matters little. I have all eternity to break your stubborn wills!

source: From the heart of a mountain, I rise.
target: From the heart of a mountain, I rise.

source: Tempered in the flows of the mountain's core, my rage is eternal!
target: Tempered in the flows of the mountain's core, my rage is eternal!

source: There is no salvation for the sons of man.
target: There is no salvation for the sons of man.

source: I shall grind you to dust, mortal!
target: I shall grind you to dust, mortal!

source: I am unbreakable, unstoppable!
target: I am unbreakable, unstoppable!

source: Bow down, overdweller!
target: Bow down, overdweller!

source: Now you too shall go the way of all the earth.
target: Now you too shall go the way of all the earth.

source: Embrace your fate!
target: Embrace your fate!

source:
Frail, foolish creature.
You are nothing!
target:
Frail, foolish creature.
You are nothing!

source: Your tomb awaits!
target: Your tomb awaits!

source: Your fleeting, meaningless existence ends here.
target: Your fleeting, meaningless existence ends here.

source: Defeat Titan
target: Defeat Titan

source: My fury erupts forth!
target: My fury erupts forth!

source: Now, the earth will claim you.
target: Now, the earth will claim you.

source: Your soul is doomed to everlasting torment!
target: Your soul is doomed to everlasting torment!

source: Defeat Eden Prime
target: Defeat Eden Prime

source: Show me your “vaunted” strength. And I shall expose the lie of your fragmented existence!
target: Show me your “vaunted” strength. And I shall expose the lie of your fragmented existence!

source: The arcane is mine to command!
target: The arcane is mine to command!

source: Flee, you fools!
target: Flee, you fools!

source: Darkness reigns!
target: Darkness reigns!

source: You are no match for my mastery of the arcane!
target: You are no match for my mastery of the arcane!

source: Pitiful, malformed, wretched creatures!
target: Pitiful, malformed, wretched creatures!

source: Your call for aid beyond this world will avail you naught!
target: Your call for aid beyond this world will avail you naught!

source: My brethren are legion!
target: My brethren are legion!

source: Let shadows form from my will alone!
target: Let shadows form from my will alone!

source: Come, Nabriales!
target: Come, Nabriales!

source: Emerge, Lahabrea! Rise, Igeyorhm!
target: Emerge, Lahabrea! Rise, Igeyorhm!

source: Our plea transcends the very boundaries of the soul!
target: Our plea transcends the very boundaries of the soul!

source: Your meager convictions will crumble before our might!
target: Your meager convictions will crumble before our might!

source: Unburden your sleeping souls, my brethren...
target: Unburden your sleeping souls, my brethren...

source: I shall bear every hope, every dream, every prayer!
target: I shall bear every hope, every dream, every prayer!

source: Behold, a sorcerer of eld! Tremble before my glory!
target: Behold, a sorcerer of eld! Tremble before my glory!

source: The future of this star shall be shaped by my hands!
target: The future of this star shall be shaped by my hands!

source: Remember, my brethren!
target: Remember, my brethren!

source: Yearn, my brethren!
target: Yearn, my brethren!

source: My brethren! Let our will be as one!
target: My brethren! Let our will be as one!

source: I am unbound by cosmic law!
target: I am unbound by cosmic law!

source: Hearken to the word of ruin!
target: Hearken to the word of ruin!

source: Begone!
target: Begone!

source: Darkness, flow through me!
target: Darkness, flow through me!

source: Drown in despair!
target: Drown in despair!

source: My dormant brethren, dream now of a dark tomorrow...
target: My dormant brethren, dream now of a dark tomorrow...

source: By our gathered might must we reclaim these vain reflections.
target: By our gathered might must we reclaim these vain reflections.

source: In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!
target: In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!

source: Has the Wardens' Light won free!? No...
target: Has the Wardens' Light won free!? No...

source: Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!
target: Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!

source: No... This is not the end...
target: No... This is not the end...

source: <var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> are the blessed! <var 1A 02 /var>We are the chosen<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: <var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> are the blessed! <var 1A 02 /var>We are the chosen<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Let the darkness consume you!
target: Let the darkness consume you!

source: This star is ours, and ours alone! We will not relinquish it to the likes of you!
target: This star is ours, and ours alone! We will not relinquish it to the likes of you!

source: Be scattered and strewn like dust!
target: Be scattered and strewn like dust!

source: For you, who never should have been, this is the end!
target: For you, who never should have been, this is the end!

source: That Light split the world, and every life upon it!
target: That Light split the world, and every life upon it!

source: Our tragedy must never again come to pass!
target: Our tragedy must never again come to pass!

source: By His grace will Darkness reign over all!
target: By His grace will Darkness reign over all!

source: Death comes for Her servants...
target: Death comes for Her servants...

source: I shall rebuild our kingdom upon your bones.
target: I shall rebuild our kingdom upon your bones.

source: Abomination! You seek to shatter my soul?
target: Abomination! You seek to shatter my soul?

source: I shall be raised up by the prayers of my fallen brethren!
target: I shall be raised up by the prayers of my fallen brethren!

source: Unworthy wretches... I consign you to the darkness!
target: Unworthy wretches... I consign you to the darkness!

source: Farewell, pitiful creatures!
target: Farewell, pitiful creatures!

source: Tremble and fall to the ground before me!
target: Tremble and fall to the ground before me!

source: Let fire and ice cleanse you of your mortal turpitude!
target: Let fire and ice cleanse you of your mortal turpitude!

source: At last, you are one! Let the profundity of your soul crush all who would defy us!
target: At last, you are one! Let the profundity of your soul crush all who would defy us!

source: Arrive at the Martial Court
target: Arrive at the Martial Court

source: Clear the Martial Court
target: Clear the Martial Court

source: Arrive at the Font of Quintessence
target: Arrive at the Font of Quintessence

source: Clear the Font of Quintessence
target: Clear the Font of Quintessence

source: Arrive at the Chamber of Celestial Song
target: Arrive at the Chamber of Celestial Song

source:
我が宮殿に、客を招いた覚えはないぞ！
立ち去らぬというなら……！
target:
我が宮殿に、客を招いた覚えはないぞ！
立ち去らぬというなら……！

source: Come, my lovelies! There is filth that wants for cleaning!
target: Come, my lovelies! There is filth that wants for cleaning!

source: Such pernicious stains, you are. No matter...
target: Such pernicious stains, you are. No matter...

source: Ugh! Insufferable, the lot of you. I will spare you, but only this once. Now leave me be!
target: Ugh! Insufferable, the lot of you. I will spare you, but only this once. Now leave me be!

source: Krow ot emit! Swish-swish-aroo!
target: Krow ot emit! Swish-swish-aroo!

source: Ssem a tahw, ssem a tahw! Swish-swish-aroo!
target: Ssem a tahw, ssem a tahw! Swish-swish-aroo!

source: Come, then, little ones. Let me show you the delights of my garden.
target: Come, then, little ones. Let me show you the delights of my garden.

source: The time has come to play, my children. Hearken to my melody.
target: The time has come to play, my children. Hearken to my melody.

source: Grow, my children, grow! Show them the glory of your splendor!
target: Grow, my children, grow! Show them the glory of your splendor!

source: I shall...bloom...again...
target: I shall...bloom...again...

source: Go, Lugus. Turn them to ash. I care not how.
target: Go, Lugus. Turn them to ash. I care not how.

source: Yes, set them alight with your undying flames. Burn bright until they are naught but cinders!
target: Yes, set them alight with your undying flames. Burn bright until they are naught but cinders!

source: Defeat Lugus
target: Defeat Lugus

source: From ageless sleep, I bid thee rise!
target: From ageless sleep, I bid thee rise!

source: Bring unto them a swift demise!
target: Bring unto them a swift demise!

source: I call forth blades to run them through!
target: I call forth blades to run them through!

source: Brave knights of eld, tried-and-true.
target: Brave knights of eld, tried-and-true.

source: With wings of dreams, I bar thy path.
target: With wings of dreams, I bar thy path.

source: I conjure forth the garden's wrath.
target: I conjure forth the garden's wrath.

source: Hold them fast with thorn and vine.
target: Hold them fast with thorn and vine.

source: To death's embrace their souls consign.
target: To death's embrace their souls consign.

source: I summon thee from flesh of stone.
target: I summon thee from flesh of stone.

source: Seize the intruders who besmirch thy hall!
target: Seize the intruders who besmirch thy hall!

source: しまった……シャンデリアが……！？
target: しまった……シャンデリアが……！？

source: Should you value your lives, you will quit this place at once. Now, begone with you!
target: Should you value your lives, you will quit this place at once. Now, begone with you!

source: Look how they make a mess of my floors! Swish and flick, my lovelies. Swish and flick!
target: Look how they make a mess of my floors! Swish and flick, my lovelies. Swish and flick!

source: If you insist on making a mess of my palace, then you leave me no choice...
target: If you insist on making a mess of my palace, then you leave me no choice...

source: Still you press onward? How foolish.
target: Still you press onward? How foolish.

source: Leannan sith! These cretins have sullied the sanctity of your garden. They must be dealt with!
target: Leannan sith! These cretins have sullied the sanctity of your garden. They must be dealt with!

source: The garden is ruined. Ruined! Mark my words─you <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> pay for this!
target: The garden is ruined. Ruined! Mark my words─you <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> pay for this!

source: With wings of dreams to grind their bones.
target: With wings of dreams to grind their bones.

source: Why do you persist? Why will you not leave me be!?
target: Why do you persist? Why will you not leave me be!?

source: And by King's judgment see them fall.
target: And by King's judgment see them fall.

source: I see you cannot be dissuaded from your misguided path. A pity...
target: I see you cannot be dissuaded from your misguided path. A pity...

source: Knights immortal, heed my call!
target: Knights immortal, heed my call!

source: Clear warehouse A
target: Clear warehouse A

source: Clear warehouse B
target: Clear warehouse B

source: Clear quality assurance
target: Clear quality assurance

source: Clear warehouse C
target: Clear warehouse C

source: Clear the forward deck
target: Clear the forward deck

source: Clear the rear deck
target: Clear the rear deck

source: What <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that awful noise?
target: What <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that awful noise?

source: The alarm. They know we're here.
target: The alarm. They know we're here.

source: “They”?
target: “They”?

source: The machine lifeforms. As you see.
target: The machine lifeforms. As you see.

source: Machines don't have “life,” though. That's an oxymoron.
target: Machines don't have “life,” though. That's an oxymoron.

source: They have sentience; they have will. Though these ones' will is not their own...
target: They have sentience; they have will. Though these ones' will is not their own...

source: Intruders detected. Purge protocol initialized.
target: Intruders detected. Purge protocol initialized.

source: Multiple lifeforms confirmed. Eliminating.
target: Multiple lifeforms confirmed. Eliminating.

source: All units: fire at will.
target: All units: fire at will.

source: We're surrounded! Watch your back. And your front.
target: We're surrounded! Watch your back. And your front.

source: All units: sight primary targets.
target: All units: sight primary targets.

source: Don't let them get a lock on you! Keep moving!
target: Don't let them get a lock on you! Keep moving!

source: All units: ready detonators.
target: All units: ready detonators.

source: They're coming from above! Get clear!
target: They're coming from above! Get clear!

source: All units: ready lasers.
target: All units: ready lasers.

source: These energy readings... Move!
target: These energy readings... Move!

source: All units: expend energy reserves.
target: All units: expend energy reserves.

source: Alert. Alert. Preliminary defen...ses...breach...
target: Alert. Alert. Preliminary defen...ses...breach...

source: I appreciate your assistance.
target: I appreciate your assistance.

source: Awfully clever of us to bring help along.
target: Awfully clever of us to bring help along.

source: Stay close.
target: Stay close.

source: Fancy meeting you here, yawning chasm.
target: Fancy meeting you here, yawning chasm.

source: We'll need to take the pods across.
target: We'll need to take the pods across.

source: What, these tiny things? You sure?
target: What, these tiny things? You sure?

source: The small ones are easy enough to deal with. Most of the time...
target: The small ones are easy enough to deal with. Most of the time...

source: Reinforcements. Take them out.
target: Reinforcements. Take them out.

source: Good enough. Let's go.
target: Good enough. Let's go.

source: I can't believe that this─whatever it is─has been here all along...
target: I can't believe that this─whatever it is─has been here all along...

source: It's a factory for the machine lifeforms. And an active threat.
target: It's a factory for the machine lifeforms. And an active threat.

source: This way.
target: This way.

source: Volunteers detected and welcomed. Commencing assessment.
target: Volunteers detected and welcomed. Commencing assessment.

source: Something isn't right here. It's almost like...
target: Something isn't right here. It's almost like...

source: Sacrifice for the greater good logged and appreciated.
target: Sacrifice for the greater good logged and appreciated.

source: It's above us. And below. And... Dammit.
target: It's above us. And below. And... Dammit.

source: Subject finesse duly noted as “inspirational.” Congratulations!
target: Subject finesse duly noted as “inspirational.” Congratulations!

source: Initial testing complete. Commencing pain tolerance assessment.
target: Initial testing complete. Commencing pain tolerance assessment.

source: The walls! Keep your eyes on the walls!
target: The walls! Keep your eyes on the walls!

source: New durability records logged. Congratulations!
target: New durability records logged. Congratulations!

source: Commencing logic circuit and processing speed assessment.
target: Commencing logic circuit and processing speed assessment.

source: Results far exceeding projections logged. Subjects confirmed irregular.
target: Results far exceeding projections logged. Subjects confirmed irregular.

source: I assume these tests are only designed for machine lifeforms.
target: I assume these tests are only designed for machine lifeforms.

source: Potential score manipulation detected. Offense taken.
target: Potential score manipulation detected. Offense taken.

source: Evaluation suspended. Discarding subjects.
target: Evaluation suspended. Discarding subjects.

source: As I thought. We'll need to destroy it quickly.
target: As I thought. We'll need to destroy it quickly.

source: Subject persistence duly noted as “irritating.”
target: Subject persistence duly noted as “irritating.”

source: Further manipulation detected. Offense heightened.
target: Further manipulation detected. Offense heightened.

source: Alert: Subjects advised that failure to follow instructions will be punished.
target: Alert: Subjects advised that failure to follow instructions will be punished.

source: High Alert: Subjects advised that failure to be punished will be punished.
target: High Alert: Subjects advised that failure to be punished will be punished.

source: Danger: Subjects advised to die faster.
target: Danger: Subjects advised to die faster.

source: Flagrant disrespect for science detected. “How dare you?” queried.
target: Flagrant disrespect for science detected. “How dare you?” queried.

source: How...dare...you...
target: How...dare...you...

source: Anomaly...dete...cted...commend...re...pair...
target: Anomaly...dete...cted...commend...re...pair...

source: We can descend via the central hatch.
target: We can descend via the central hatch.

source: Some may still be functional. Be careful.
target: Some may still be functional. Be careful.

source: How are all of these machines powered?
target: How are all of these machines powered?

source: Each of them has a core. Destroy that, and it can't function.
target: Each of them has a core. Destroy that, and it can't function.

source: Look! What's that?
target: Look! What's that?

source: A flight unit. This should speed things up.
target: A flight unit. This should speed things up.

source: It's been hacked!
target: It's been hacked!

source: I've taken control. This way.
target: I've taken control. This way.

source: Goliath-class machines ahead. Prepare yourselves.
target: Goliath-class machines ahead. Prepare yourselves.

source: My name is Engels, serial number 110-C.
target: My name is Engels, serial number 110-C.

source: Those arms are nasty. Keep your distance.
target: Those arms are nasty. Keep your distance.

source: Now charging. Please wait.
target: Now charging. Please wait.

source: Support units. Nothing a few missiles won't solve.
target: Support units. Nothing a few missiles won't solve.

source: I suppose we'll do this the hard way.
target: I suppose we'll do this the hard way.

source: Now annihilating. Please wait.
target: Now annihilating. Please wait.

source: Vital signs detected. Reevaluating offensive protocol...
target: Vital signs detected. Reevaluating offensive protocol...

source: Dammit! Scanning for energy signature...
target: Dammit! Scanning for energy signature...

source: There, below. It's rising fast.
target: There, below. It's rising fast.

source: Prepare for breach!
target: Prepare for breach!

source: Vital signs detected. Reevaluating offensive protocol...
target: Vital signs detected. Reevaluating offensive protocol...

source: Incendiary readied. Remain still while crushing commences.
target: Incendiary readied. Remain still while crushing commences.

source: Do something about those arms!
target: Do something about those arms!

source: Support required. Activating Marx units.
target: Support required. Activating Marx units.

source: More units? What now?
target: More units? What now?

source: Critical da...mage...sustai...ned. Please...wait... Please...
target: Critical da...mage...sustai...ned. Please...wait... Please...

source: This energy signature... Found you!
target: This energy signature... Found you!

source: Oh, fly off and leave us to clamber over the giant scary machine, why don't you.
target: Oh, fly off and leave us to clamber over the giant scary machine, why don't you.

source: Not these again... But I suppose there's no time to waste.
target: Not these again... But I suppose there's no time to waste.

source: So you're with 2P? Don't think I won't kill you too.
target: So you're with 2P? Don't think I won't kill you too.

source: You're the one who's going to die here, 9S.
target: You're the one who's going to die here, 9S.

source: These Goliaths sure are handy!
target: These Goliaths sure are handy!

source: He's hacking Engels. Arm incoming!
target: He's hacking Engels. Arm incoming!

source: Targets acquired. Firing at will!
target: Targets acquired. Firing at will!

source: Tank controls online!
target: Tank controls online!

source: Destroy the tanks! He's drawing power from them.
target: Destroy the tanks! He's drawing power from them.

source: Fine, fine. Self-destruct it is!
target: Fine, fine. Self-destruct it is!

source: Find cover, fast!
target: Find cover, fast!

source: Just try dodging <var 1A 02 /var>this.<var 1A 01 /var>
target: Just try dodging <var 1A 02 /var>this.<var 1A 01 /var>

source: He's taking control of the missiles!
target: He's taking control of the missiles!

source: I'll blow you to pieces!
target: I'll blow you to pieces!

source: I'll shield you. Over here!
target: I'll shield you. Over here!

source: You're not getting out alive, 2P!
target: You're not getting out alive, 2P!

source: Decoupling flight unit. And now...
target: Decoupling flight unit. And now...

source: Don't let him out of your sight!
target: Don't let him out of your sight!

source: Here goes!
target: Here goes!

source: And again.
target: And again.

source: Die already!
target: Die already!

source: Multiple heat signatures from 9S's unit. Get back!
target: Multiple heat signatures from 9S's unit. Get back!

source: He's coming back this way!
target: He's coming back this way!

source: If we hit the unit hard enough, we might be able to disrupt his connection.
target: If we hit the unit hard enough, we might be able to disrupt his connection.

source: What is this stuff? Flour?
target: What is this stuff? Flour?

source: Mineral dust, maybe. I hope it's not harmful.
target: Mineral dust, maybe. I hope it's not harmful.

source: <cough> <cough> ...Particularly as I just breathed some in.
target: <cough> <cough> ...Particularly as I just breathed some in.

<var 09 E803 ((Rank B)) ((Rank A)) ((Rank S)) /var>
