source: Escape the imperial palace
target: Escape the imperial palace

source: Defeat Arch Ultima
target: Defeat Arch Ultima

source: Alert! Alert! Intruders detected in the Imperial Way! All available units, converge!
target: Alert! Alert! Intruders detected in the Imperial Way! All available units, converge!

source: We must leave this place, now! Before they can gather reinforcements!
target: We must leave this place, now! Before they can gather reinforcements!

source: Don't let them get away!
target: Don't let them get away!

source: Damnit, they're already here.
target: Damnit, they're already here.

source: It seems there is no turning back. We must force our way through.
target: It seems there is no turning back. We must force our way through.

source: The Black Wolf is among the intruders! Deploy magitek armor!
target: The Black Wolf is among the intruders! Deploy magitek armor!

source: There they are! Stop them!
target: There they are! Stop them!

source: Let's keep moving.
target: Let's keep moving.

source: Ugh, there is no end to them...
target: Ugh, there is no end to them...

source: You won't escape, Gaius Baelsar!
target: You won't escape, Gaius Baelsar!

source: You will pay for your crimes, traitor!
target: You will pay for your crimes, traitor!

source: I was wondering when the imperial guard would appear... Focus on the magitek armor first!
target: I was wondering when the imperial guard would appear... Focus on the magitek armor first!

source: Annia─on my mark!
target: Annia─on my mark!

source: I think not!
target: I think not!

source: Damn it...
target: Damn it...

source: This way. Quickly!
target: This way. Quickly!

source: We make ourselves easy marks by moving together. I suggest we split up.
target: We make ourselves easy marks by moving together. I suggest we split up.

source: All right, then. I'll take the low road, so to speak.
target: All right, then. I'll take the low road, so to speak.

source: I will see you outside. Stay safe.
target: I will see you outside. Stay safe.

source:
It seems we've been afforded an impromptu field test.
Ready all battle data, and begin test sequence 2.0!
target:
It seems we've been afforded an impromptu field test.
Ready all battle data, and begin test sequence 2.0!

source:
Initiating synthetic auracite system...
All systems now fully functional!
target:
Initiating synthetic auracite system...
All systems now fully functional!

source: We haven't much time! I said ready the battle data, damn you!
target: We haven't much time! I said ready the battle data, damn you!

source: Now loading data sample XIV...
target: Now loading data sample XIV...

source: It's not working! Ready another sample─the one taken from Castrum Abania!
target: It's not working! Ready another sample─the one taken from Castrum Abania!

source: Now loading data sample XII...
target: Now loading data sample XII...

source: Increase generator output to maximum! Activate the magitek field─full power!
target: Increase generator output to maximum! Activate the magitek field─full power!

source: Unstoppable? We shall see about that.
target: Unstoppable? We shall see about that.

source: Nidhogg! Show them your fury!
target: Nidhogg! Show them your fury!

source: This...cannot be...
target: This...cannot be...

source: If you would bar my way, then you will feel the fury of Nidhogg!
target: If you would bar my way, then you will feel the fury of Nidhogg!

source: It works, it works! Hahaha! Arch Ultima is unstoppable!
target: It works, it works! Hahaha! Arch Ultima is unstoppable!

source: Purge Lyhe Mheg of nightmares!
target: Purge Lyhe Mheg of nightmares!

source: Vanquish An Lad's nightmare!
target: Vanquish An Lad's nightmare!

source: To think that all of this came from An Lad's heart...
target: To think that all of this came from An Lad's heart...

source: Come on, we have to hurry and find them!
target: Come on, we have to hurry and find them!

source: This mist... It's a nightmare that plagued one of the children!
target: This mist... It's a nightmare that plagued one of the children!

source: We'll take care of it just like always. Ezel─do your thing!
target: We'll take care of it just like always. Ezel─do your thing!

source: Very well! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─at your command, I will suck it up and spit it out yonder for smiting!
target: Very well! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─at your command, I will suck it up and spit it out yonder for smiting!

source: Right, time for my magick! Get ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: Right, time for my magick! Get ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: This gloomy aura... Over there! It's An Lad!
target: This gloomy aura... Over there! It's An Lad!

source: Another nightmare! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I await your command!
target: Another nightmare! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I await your command!

source: I'll make short work of this! <snort>
target: I'll make short work of this! <snort>

source: There's another one just over there! Come on!
target: There's another one just over there! Come on!

source: Now, where did An Lad disappear to?
target: Now, where did An Lad disappear to?

source: Uhhh, this burning sensation... It's the nightmare from Rak'tika!
target: Uhhh, this burning sensation... It's the nightmare from Rak'tika!

source: Careful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This fiend is stronger than the ones before!
target: Careful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This fiend is stronger than the ones before!

source: Ah, there's An Lad! Come on!
target: Ah, there's An Lad! Come on!

source: Another nightmare! Let's be quick about it!
target: Another nightmare! Let's be quick about it!

source: Can't be many nightmares left, now... Ah! Up the slope!
target: Can't be many nightmares left, now... Ah! Up the slope!

source: Hold on, An Lad! We're coming for you!
target: Hold on, An Lad! We're coming for you!

source: I can't take it anymore... I just want to disappear...
target: I can't take it anymore... I just want to disappear...

source: Oh, no you don't! Don't you dare disappear on me!
target: Oh, no you don't! Don't you dare disappear on me!

source: I've never devoured anything near as potent... But whatever may become of my belly, I will do this! <var 1A 02 /var>I must<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: I've never devoured anything near as potent... But whatever may become of my belly, I will do this! <var 1A 02 /var>I must<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Uhhhhhh... Like a thousand knives, slicing and stabbing...
target: Uhhhhhh... Like a thousand knives, slicing and stabbing...

source: B-Brace yourselves... This is the mother of all─<var 1A 02 /var>blaaaaaarrrghhh<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: B-Brace yourselves... This is the mother of all─<var 1A 02 /var>blaaaaaarrrghhh<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Good work, Ezel! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─get ready!
target: Good work, Ezel! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─get ready!

source: Hehehehe... A plague. You are a plague.
target: Hehehehe... A plague. You are a plague.

source: I'm a plague... My existence brings only torment... Better that I fade away...
target: I'm a plague... My existence brings only torment... Better that I fade away...

source: Not good! We must vanquish the nightmare before it's too late!
target: Not good! We must vanquish the nightmare before it's too late!

source: Yesss... Let your torment consume you. Let it spread all around you.
target: Yesss... Let your torment consume you. Let it spread all around you.

source: Those things... They're manifestations of torment!
target: Those things... They're manifestations of torment!

source: They feed into An Lad! If we don't stop them, the nightmare will grow stronger!
target: They feed into An Lad! If we don't stop them, the nightmare will grow stronger!

source: Let us form a protective circle!
target: Let us form a protective circle!

source: Meddlesome wretches. Begone with you.
target: Meddlesome wretches. Begone with you.

source: Oh, what now? Watch out, you two!
target: Oh, what now? Watch out, you two!

source: You are alone. No one cares for you. No one will save you.
target: You are alone. No one cares for you. No one will save you.

source: It's going after An Lad! We must stand with them!
target: It's going after An Lad! We must stand with them!

source: An Lad, stay strong! We're here for you!
target: An Lad, stay strong! We're here for you!

source: Huzzah! We did it!
target: Huzzah! We did it!

source: It's over...  You're free now, An Lad...
target: It's over...  You're free now, An Lad...

source: Nightmares remaining
target: Nightmares remaining

source: Ah! Wait just a─!
target: Ah! Wait just a─!

source: An Lad... Let's keep giving chase while we tend to the nightmares!
target: An Lad... Let's keep giving chase while we tend to the nightmares!

source: I have a bad feeling about this...
target: I have a bad feeling about this...

source: An Lad, wait! We want to help you!
target: An Lad, wait! We want to help you!

source: An Lad is fading fast! We don't have much time!
target: An Lad is fading fast! We don't have much time!

source: I'm ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Just say the word!
target: I'm ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Just say the word!

source: I still sense a nightmare nearby... Let's hurry and find it!
target: I still sense a nightmare nearby... Let's hurry and find it!

source: Designation: Blassty. Intruders to central calculation system detected. Initiating extermination protocol!
target: Designation: Blassty. Intruders to central calculation system detected. Initiating extermination protocol!

source: Designation: Brute Justice. Temporal interlopers identified. Verdict: Guilty. Punishment: Eradication!
target: Designation: Brute Justice. Temporal interlopers identified. Verdict: Guilty. Punishment: Eradication!

source: Initiating new combat protocol... Commence final judgment!
target: Initiating new combat protocol... Commence final judgment!

source: Final judgment passed... Bask in the light and be cleansed!
target: Final judgment passed... Bask in the light and be cleansed!

source: Final judgment passed... Atone with your lifeblood!
target: Final judgment passed... Atone with your lifeblood!

source: I am Alexander...the Creator. You...who would prove yourself worthy of your utopia...will be judged.
target: I am Alexander...the Creator. You...who would prove yourself worthy of your utopia...will be judged.

source: The time of judgment is nigh...
target: The time of judgment is nigh...

source: Executing judgment protocol in 10 seconds...
target: Executing judgment protocol in 10 seconds...

source: 5 seconds to divine judgment...
target: 5 seconds to divine judgment...

source: 4 seconds...
target: 4 seconds...

source: I am the Creator... I will rebuild, remake, reform myself into the ultimate state of perfection...!
target: I am the Creator... I will rebuild, remake, reform myself into the ultimate state of perfection...!

source: Designation: Brute Justice. Standing by for assembly!
target: Designation: Brute Justice. Standing by for assembly!

source: Designation: Blassty. Standing by for assembly!
target: Designation: Blassty. Standing by for assembly!

source:
I am Alexander...the Assembled.
Look upon the perfection that will be your destruction...
target:
I am Alexander...the Assembled.
Look upon the perfection that will be your destruction...

source: Difference engine fully powered... Beginning future simulation...
target: Difference engine fully powered... Beginning future simulation...

source: Space-time interference restrictions lifted... Initializing temporal prison...
target: Space-time interference restrictions lifted... Initializing temporal prison...

source: Behold the Ruby Weapon! It will be the last thing you ever see!
target: Behold the Ruby Weapon! It will be the last thing you ever see!

source: Deploying claws!
target: Deploying claws!

source: You won't even see them coming!
target: You won't even see them coming!

source: Commencing high-velocity assault!
target: Commencing high-velocity assault!

source: Synthetic auracite safety locks removed. Preparing Ultima, maximum power!
target: Synthetic auracite safety locks removed. Preparing Ultima, maximum power!

source: Energy levels at critical! Unleashing Ultima!
target: Energy levels at critical! Unleashing Ultima!

source: This can't be! The Ruby Weapon is unstoppable!
target: This can't be! The Ruby Weapon is unstoppable!

source: Wh-What is this!? No! Get out of my mind!
target: Wh-What is this!? No! Get out of my mind!

source: Stop! No, I'm not...Nael... I am...
target: Stop! No, I'm not...Nael... I am...

source: I am...Nael van Darnus.
target: I am...Nael van Darnus.

source: Come to purify this forsaken land.
target: Come to purify this forsaken land.

source: The legacy of ancient Allag is mine to command!
target: The legacy of ancient Allag is mine to command!

source: How can this be!? O mighty Dalamud, am I not Thy loyal servant!?
target: How can this be!? O mighty Dalamud, am I not Thy loyal servant!?

source: Red moon of destruction, I shall prove to Thee my worth!
target: Red moon of destruction, I shall prove to Thee my worth!

source: No...Dalamud <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> fall... I know it to be true!
target: No...Dalamud <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> fall... I know it to be true!

source: O Brother...Nael! Your name shall live on for eternity!
target: O Brother...Nael! Your name shall live on for eternity!

source: I shall...see your ambitions fulfilled!
target: I shall...see your ambitions fulfilled!

source: Fall, fall! Death to the undeserving!
target: Fall, fall! Death to the undeserving!

source: Vengeance shall be mine!
target: Vengeance shall be mine!

source: Purge these unthinking beasts!
target: Purge these unthinking beasts!

source: All my despair, all my rage... Become my shield!
target: All my despair, all my rage... Become my shield!

source: Frozen in sorrow, burning with rage!
target: Frozen in sorrow, burning with rage!

source:
Increasing pilot override rate to 100%.
Commencing forced shutdown and system restart.
target:
Increasing pilot override rate to 100%.
Commencing forced shutdown and system restart.

source:
Synthetic auracite switching to Oversoul mode.
Loading data sample.
target:
Synthetic auracite switching to Oversoul mode.
Loading data sample.

source:
Darnus combat data ready.
Initiating organic core overwrite.
target:
Darnus combat data ready.
Initiating organic core overwrite.

source:
Preparing combat data.
Subject: Darnus.
target:
Preparing combat data.
Subject: Darnus.

source: Anti-eikon weaponry, restraints removed.
target: Anti-eikon weaponry, restraints removed.

source: Ungh! Such speed...but I'm still in control!
target: Ungh! Such speed...but I'm still in control!

source:
Initiating Ultima sequence.
Ignore all warnings.
target:
Initiating Ultima sequence.
Ignore all warnings.

source:
I'm sorry, everyone. This is the end for me.
Activating...Oversoul.
target:
I'm sorry, everyone. This is the end for me.
Activating...Oversoul.

source: Arrive at Katharsis
target: Arrive at Katharsis

source: Clear Katharsis
target: Clear Katharsis

source: Arrive at Doxa
target: Arrive at Doxa

source: Clear Doxa
target: Clear Doxa

source: Arrive at Noesis
target: Arrive at Noesis

source: Defeat Rukshs Dheem
target: Defeat Rukshs Dheem

source: [To the depths!]
target: [To the depths!]

source: [These are poor neighbors indeed...]
target: [These are poor neighbors indeed...]

source: [The time has come to part with these interlopers.]
target: [The time has come to part with these interlopers.]

source: [The walls fall─we must hurry.]
target: [The walls fall─we must hurry.]

source: [We were fortunate... But what is all of this?]
target: [We were fortunate... But what is all of this?]

source: [Tiresome creatures.]
target: [Tiresome creatures.]

source: [There it lies. I give you my breath...]
target: [There it lies. I give you my breath...]

source: [Your wish is granted. Go, little wanderers.]
target: [Your wish is granted. Go, little wanderers.]

source: Your kind has never given of its treasures willingly─your lives will be no different.
target: Your kind has never given of its treasures willingly─your lives will be no different.

source: You know nothing of the depths! Nothing!
target: You know nothing of the depths! Nothing!

source: [Hah!]
target: [Hah!]

source: Visions of eld, attend to us now...
target: Visions of eld, attend to us now...

source: Clear the Trial of Ronka!
target: Clear the Trial of Ronka!

source: Free your comrades from the talismans!
target: Free your comrades from the talismans!

source: Defeat the huaca!
target: Defeat the huaca!

source: Yet to heroes proven learned and wise, a comrade's soul shall be their prize.
target: Yet to heroes proven learned and wise, a comrade's soul shall be their prize.

source: If you would see theirs set free, answer me these riddles three.
target: If you would see theirs set free, answer me these riddles three.

source: 'Twixt these talismans hide friend and foe. Choose your companions well, or sorrow know.
target: 'Twixt these talismans hide friend and foe. Choose your companions well, or sorrow know.

source: A test of mind and memory. Choose wisely, and you all may yet go free.
target: A test of mind and memory. Choose wisely, and you all may yet go free.

source: Desire you that which I yet claim? Then we shall play another game...
target: Desire you that which I yet claim? Then we shall play another game...

source: Yet still there remains one trial you must pass.
target: Yet still there remains one trial you must pass.

source: Deft of paw, with kin do I vie. Though sought apart, betterment of the whole do our efforts descry. What...am...I?
target: Deft of paw, with kin do I vie. Though sought apart, betterment of the whole do our efforts descry. What...am...I?

source: With fearsome fang, I travel with pack. Together we find harmony, and thus for peace our land does not lack. What...am...I?
target: With fearsome fang, I travel with pack. Together we find harmony, and thus for peace our land does not lack. What...am...I?

source: On my belly do I crawl. By my strength does prosperity reign within our hall. What...am...I?
target: On my belly do I crawl. By my strength does prosperity reign within our hall. What...am...I?

source:
You trespass, mortal, upon sacred ground.
In retribution, four souls have I bound.
target:
You trespass, mortal, upon sacred ground.
In retribution, four souls have I bound.

source: Leave Trial's Threshold
target: Leave Trial's Threshold

source: A pathetic display, one and all. The weak shall not be suffered to disgrace this sacred hall.
target: A pathetic display, one and all. The weak shall not be suffered to disgrace this sacred hall.

source: Indeed, the opo-opo is keen and shrewd. The spirit of ingenuity, by whose guidance the Ronkans did prosperity pursue. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.
target: Indeed, the opo-opo is keen and shrewd. The spirit of ingenuity, by whose guidance the Ronkans did prosperity pursue. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.

source: Indeed, 'twas the spirit of the wolf their doctrines praised. That they would know peace and harmony to the end of their days. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.
target: Indeed, 'twas the spirit of the wolf their doctrines praised. That they would know peace and harmony to the end of their days. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.

source: Indeed, the dread serpent turned protector, lured to slumber ere it tear the world asunder. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.
target: Indeed, the dread serpent turned protector, lured to slumber ere it tear the world asunder. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.

source: Alas, 'twas the opo-opo. Keen and shrewd, its spirit exalts ingenuity, a virtue by which the Ronkans did prosperity pursue.
target: Alas, 'twas the opo-opo. Keen and shrewd, its spirit exalts ingenuity, a virtue by which the Ronkans did prosperity pursue.

source: Alas, 'twas the wolf their doctrines praised. That they might know peace and harmony to the end of their days.
target: Alas, 'twas the wolf their doctrines praised. That they might know peace and harmony to the end of their days.

source: Alas, 'twas a snake. The dread serpent turned protector, lured to slumber ere it tear the world asunder.
target: Alas, 'twas a snake. The dread serpent turned protector, lured to slumber ere it tear the world asunder.

source: For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.
target: For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.

source: For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.
target: For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.

source: For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.
target: For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.

source: If you would glean the knowledge enshrined in this earth, I would first take the measure of your worth.
target: If you would glean the knowledge enshrined in this earth, I would first take the measure of your worth.

source: Solve the riddles of the huaca!
target: Solve the riddles of the huaca!

source: Your comrades are assembled, together at last...
target: Your comrades are assembled, together at last...

source: Finally! This is what I was expecting to find here in the ruins.
target: Finally! This is what I was expecting to find here in the ruins.

source: Be careful, sisters!
target: Be careful, sisters!

source: Hold nothing back. Failure of this <var 1A 02 /var>test<var 1A 01 /var> does not appear to be an option.
target: Hold nothing back. Failure of this <var 1A 02 /var>test<var 1A 01 /var> does not appear to be an option.

source: Quickly─fan out before it strikes!
target: Quickly─fan out before it strikes!

source: Its sights are set on Y'shtola! Hurry, we must protect her!
target: Its sights are set on Y'shtola! Hurry, we must protect her!

source: Victory oft begs sacrifice, but which of you would pay the price?
target: Victory oft begs sacrifice, but which of you would pay the price?

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Hurry, we have to save <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Hurry, we have to save <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!

source: Oh, no─Cymet!
target: Oh, no─Cymet!

source: Impressive...
target: Impressive...

source: You may think you have won, but we have only just begun!
target: You may think you have won, but we have only just begun!

source: Poison!? <cough> <cough> Come, gather around me.
target: Poison!? <cough> <cough> Come, gather around me.

source: Reinforcements? Leave them to me!
target: Reinforcements? Leave them to me!

source: We mustn't waste time with this slime─focus on the guardian!
target: We mustn't waste time with this slime─focus on the guardian!

source: Show them your all!
target: Show them your all!

source: Well fought, hero, the trial is complete. The way is open, and thus...I concede...defeat...
target: Well fought, hero, the trial is complete. The way is open, and thus...I concede...defeat...

source: Not wholly unexpected, but an exhausting ordeal nevertheless.
target: Not wholly unexpected, but an exhausting ordeal nevertheless.

source: One worthy of she who the Ronkans extolled, must be strong of mind, body, and soul.
target: One worthy of she who the Ronkans extolled, must be strong of mind, body, and soul.

source: Make your way to the transmission tower!
target: Make your way to the transmission tower!

source: Speak with Cid!
target: Speak with Cid!

source: Defeat the imperial soldiers!
target: Defeat the imperial soldiers!

source: Defeat the antibodies!
target: Defeat the antibodies!

source: Defeat Bahamut!
target: Defeat Bahamut!

source: This is Bozja Citadel, alright. At least...I think it is. Was everything so distorted when you tested this before?
target: This is Bozja Citadel, alright. At least...I think it is. Was everything so distorted when you tested this before?

source: Your recollection of this place appears grossly incomplete. I can but assume your memory is being warped by your subconscious.
target: Your recollection of this place appears grossly incomplete. I can but assume your memory is being warped by your subconscious.

source: Well I'd rather not stand around laboring over details. Let's look for the transmission tower in the Principia. Anything of import would've been stored there.
target: Well I'd rather not stand around laboring over details. Let's look for the transmission tower in the Principia. Anything of import would've been stored there.

source: You've done it, Cid! The road has returned.
target: You've done it, Cid! The road has returned.

source: We should be able to reach the Principia if we keep heading north.
target: We should be able to reach the Principia if we keep heading north.

source: Look! There's the transmission tower!
target: Look! There's the transmission tower!

source: The tension in the air is palpable.
target: The tension in the air is palpable.

source: Ah, right. The soldiers were on high alert that day.
target: Ah, right. The soldiers were on high alert that day.

source: The Bozjan Resistance had infiltrated the citadel to stop the Academy's experiments.
target: The Bozjan Resistance had infiltrated the citadel to stop the Academy's experiments.

source: A curious question. One I believe worth investigating. Shall we?
target: A curious question. One I believe worth investigating. Shall we?

source: The memory appears to be...mending itself? Interesting.
target: The memory appears to be...mending itself? Interesting.

source: Could they be a manifestation of your subconscious? If so, they likely seek to suppress your memories of the citadel.
target: Could they be a manifestation of your subconscious? If so, they likely seek to suppress your memories of the citadel.

source: Meaning they intend to purge us from your mind. We cannot let them!
target: Meaning they intend to purge us from your mind. We cannot let them!

source: Is there no end to them? We have to hold on, lest they succeed in erasing us from Cid's mind.
target: Is there no end to them? We have to hold on, lest they succeed in erasing us from Cid's mind.

source: Are we sure I'm not suffering from a sudden onset of psychosis?
target: Are we sure I'm not suffering from a sudden onset of psychosis?

source: Just a little further...
target: Just a little further...

source: Is that...Cid? Do you recall this happening?
target: Is that...Cid? Do you recall this happening?

source: Father, please! If you would just look over this data─
target: Father, please! If you would just look over this data─

source: Enough, damn you! The next time you question me it shall be the last. Now leave!
target: Enough, damn you! The next time you question me it shall be the last. Now leave!

source: You of all people should understand the risks. Why do you refuse to see reason?
target: You of all people should understand the risks. Why do you refuse to see reason?

source: It's rather unlike him to overlook data, no matter the source.
target: It's rather unlike him to overlook data, no matter the source.

source: Look here. You─er, I mean... He left behind his research documentation.
target: Look here. You─er, I mean... He left behind his research documentation.

source: There they are! The replicas of Gunnhildr's blades!
target: There they are! The replicas of Gunnhildr's blades!

source: Bahamut!? This has to be another attempt by your subconscious to stop us. Please, Cid, you have to pull yourself together.
target: Bahamut!? This has to be another attempt by your subconscious to stop us. Please, Cid, you have to pull yourself together.

source: Careful. I like not the looks of this...
target: Careful. I like not the looks of this...

source: Oh no! Could his psyche be deteriorating? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, look out!
target: Oh no! Could his psyche be deteriorating? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, look out!

source: We have to hold on! For Cid!
target: We have to hold on! For Cid!

source: Thank you. I... I feel better, now.
target: Thank you. I... I feel better, now.

source: Perhaps now your subconscious will be more forthcoming with the truth in this memory.
target: Perhaps now your subconscious will be more forthcoming with the truth in this memory.

source: The Meteor project cannot be stopped! I will not allow it!
target: The Meteor project cannot be stopped! I will not allow it!

source: Taste my steel!
target: Taste my steel!

source: Careful of his blade!
target: Careful of his blade!

source: Your struggles shall avail you not!
target: Your struggles shall avail you not!

source: Keep your distance!
target: Keep your distance!

source: You would dash yourself against my shield? Very well...
target: You would dash yourself against my shield? Very well...

source: I will mount your heads upon my wall!
target: I will mount your heads upon my wall!

source: He would turn the very air against us. Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: He would turn the very air against us. Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: Ready the turrets!
target: Ready the turrets!

source: うるさい機械を、先に壊すわよ！
target: うるさい機械を、先に壊すわよ！

source: I tire of these games!
target: I tire of these games!

source: You dare defy me!?
target: You dare defy me!?

source: I thought to offer you a quick, painless death. Alas...
target: I thought to offer you a quick, painless death. Alas...

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A little help, if you'd be so kind.
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A little help, if you'd be so kind.

source: I can take the brunt of it, but I'll need a little help!
target: I can take the brunt of it, but I'll need a little help!

source: By thy leave!
target: By thy leave!

source: Now! Drive it back!
target: Now! Drive it back!

source: Hold on just a little longer!
target: Hold on just a little longer!

source:
リーン、今だ！
力を解き放てッ……！
target:
リーン、今だ！
力を解き放てッ……！

source: Minfilia... Give me strength!
target: Minfilia... Give me strength!

source: I shall not yield!
target: I shall not yield!

source: That my defenses could be broken...
target: That my defenses could be broken...

source: It is time I bring my full strength to bear!
target: It is time I bring my full strength to bear!

source: All of our research, our planning... It cannot be for naught!
target: All of our research, our planning... It cannot be for naught!

source: The Empire cannot...must...not...
target: The Empire cannot...must...not...

source: Leave this to me.
target: Leave this to me.

source: Quickly! My barrier shan't hold long!
target: Quickly! My barrier shan't hold long!

source: We've come too far to fail now!
target: We've come too far to fail now!

source: Come on, we can't give up!
target: Come on, we can't give up!

source: Hold on, Thancred!
target: Hold on, Thancred!

source: We're so close!
target: We're so close!

source: We've no choice but to fight. Otherwise, his subconscious will continue to repress this memory.
target: We've no choice but to fight. Otherwise, his subconscious will continue to repress this memory.

source: What in the world? The road, it just...ends.
target: What in the world? The road, it just...ends.

source: A consequence of your incomplete memories. You have to think back, Cid. Where did this road lead?
target: A consequence of your incomplete memories. You have to think back, Cid. Where did this road lead?

source: Damn it all, the road is cut off again. Come on, Cid, you have to remember.
target: Damn it all, the road is cut off again. Come on, Cid, you have to remember.

source: A psychological stimulus to prompt recollection... Yes, that just might work.
target: A psychological stimulus to prompt recollection... Yes, that just might work.

source: Well done, Cid. Let us press onward.
target: Well done, Cid. Let us press onward.

source: Search for clues to help Cid's memory.
target: Search for clues to help Cid's memory.

source: Speak with Cid.
target: Speak with Cid.

source: Did you see that? A military base appeared out of thin air... Or out of my mind, I suppose.
target: Did you see that? A military base appeared out of thin air... Or out of my mind, I suppose.

source: Do you suppose it's possible we can tamper with this memory?
target: Do you suppose it's possible we can tamper with this memory?

source: Altering memories is easier said than done, it seems. Well, let's keep going.
target: Altering memories is easier said than done, it seems. Well, let's keep going.

source: Here we are. The Principia. Inside is the transmission tower.
target: Here we are. The Principia. Inside is the transmission tower.

source: What in the seven hells are these!?
target: What in the seven hells are these!?

source: Curious that we could defeat these but not the soldiers earlier. Perhaps because they are not truly part of this memory?
target: Curious that we could defeat these but not the soldiers earlier. Perhaps because they are not truly part of this memory?

source: We can worry about that later. Come on, we're nearly to the tower.
target: We can worry about that later. Come on, we're nearly to the tower.

source: Gah! I... I can't...move.
target: Gah! I... I can't...move.

source: It seems to be having an adverse effect on Cid's psyche. Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we have to stop it!
target: It seems to be having an adverse effect on Cid's psyche. Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we have to stop it!

source: Piteous worms! There will be naught left of you but ash!
target: Piteous worms! There will be naught left of you but ash!

source: I shall not yield!
target: I shall not yield!

source: That my defenses could be bested...
target: That my defenses could be bested...

source: It is time I bring my full strength to bear!
target: It is time I bring my full strength to bear!

source: I'll hold his attention. Cover me.
target: I'll hold his attention. Cover me.

source: By the gods, this data... The Empire would invite a calamity.
target: By the gods, this data... The Empire would invite a calamity.

source: So many sleepless nights spent on those damned papers. All for nothing...
target: So many sleepless nights spent on those damned papers. All for nothing...

source: If my suspicions are correct, then he was already... Ahem. Never mind, let us press on. The truth awaits us.
target: If my suspicions are correct, then he was already... Ahem. Never mind, let us press on. The truth awaits us.

source: Review Cid's research!
target: Review Cid's research!

source: Defeat Varis yae Galvus!
target: Defeat Varis yae Galvus!

source: Defeat Ramuh
target: Defeat Ramuh

source:
Thou wouldst forge this world anew?
I, Ramuh, shall test thy worth.
target:
Thou wouldst forge this world anew?
I, Ramuh, shall test thy worth.

source: Spears of lightning, to me!
target: Spears of lightning, to me!

source: May levinbolts strike thee down!
target: May levinbolts strike thee down!

source: From the storm of my judgment, thou shalt not escape!
target: From the storm of my judgment, thou shalt not escape!

source: Swift as thou art, I am swifter still!
target: Swift as thou art, I am swifter still!

source: The rolling of thunder foretells thy doom, mortal.
target: The rolling of thunder foretells thy doom, mortal.

source: By the fourteen bolts be thee rent asunder!
target: By the fourteen bolts be thee rent asunder!

source: Thou art resilient indeed, but thy trial is far from over.
target: Thou art resilient indeed, but thy trial is far from over.

source: Come, mine arbiters! Test this mortal's resolve.
target: Come, mine arbiters! Test this mortal's resolve.

source: 'Neath rolling cloud, unrelenting lightning doth strike!
target: 'Neath rolling cloud, unrelenting lightning doth strike!

source: The time of thy judgment is nigh!
target: The time of thy judgment is nigh!

source: The end hath come. Prepare thyself!
target: The end hath come. Prepare thyself!

source: With all my might, I smite thee!
target: With all my might, I smite thee!

source: With renewed vigor, mine arbiters enter the fray!
target: With renewed vigor, mine arbiters enter the fray!

source: O noble beasts of the levin, may none withstand your charge!
target: O noble beasts of the levin, may none withstand your charge!

source: I have taken thy measure, Bringer of Light.
target: I have taken thy measure, Bringer of Light.

source: Over and over doth lightning strike thee!
target: Over and over doth lightning strike thee!

source: Each bolt is mine to command!
target: Each bolt is mine to command!

source: Thy bravery is commendable, though it shall avail thee naught...
target: Thy bravery is commendable, though it shall avail thee naught...

source: Arbiters! With me!
target: Arbiters! With me!

source: Defeat Garuda and Ifrit
target: Defeat Garuda and Ifrit

source: Such lowly creatures. I shall not suffer them to live!
target: Such lowly creatures. I shall not suffer them to live!

source: And I shall not suffer thee to fail, Garuda!
target: And I shall not suffer thee to fail, Garuda!

source: Insolent worms! They dare defy me!?
target: Insolent worms! They dare defy me!?

source: A pitiful display. Stand aside!
target: A pitiful display. Stand aside!

source: These mortals are not so easily bested...
target: These mortals are not so easily bested...

source: No more games. We face them together!
target: No more games. We face them together!

source: Impossible! From where doth this strength spring!?
target: Impossible! From where doth this strength spring!?

source: Join me, Ifrit! By raging wind and engulfing flame, we are born anew!
target: Join me, Ifrit! By raging wind and engulfing flame, we are born anew!

source: Gwooooooh!
target: Gwooooooh!

source: I...am Raktapaksa, he who soareth on wings of crimson.
target: I...am Raktapaksa, he who soareth on wings of crimson.

source: May howling winds feed the flame!
target: May howling winds feed the flame!

source: Thou shalt defy me no more!
target: Thou shalt defy me no more!

source: All shall succumb to my fury!
target: All shall succumb to my fury!

source: Defeat the Idol of Darkness
target: Defeat the Idol of Darkness

source:
Killing them one by one's not going to work!
You'll have to attack that concentration of Darkness.
target:
Killing them one by one's not going to work!
You'll have to attack that concentration of Darkness.

source: Is that what's controlling them?
target: Is that what's controlling them?

source: Are those voidgates? Be careful!
target: Are those voidgates? Be careful!

source: I don't like the look of this!
target: I don't like the look of this!

source: The aether is becoming unstable!
target: The aether is becoming unstable!

source: The Darkness is growing!
target: The Darkness is growing!

source: Something's coming! Watch out!
target: Something's coming! Watch out!

source: The sin eaters... What are they doing!?
target: The sin eaters... What are they doing!?

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It'll destroy us all!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It'll destroy us all!

source:
メテオ計劃を中断させようなどと……
大将軍たる我が許すものか！
target:
メテオ計劃を中断させようなどと……
大将軍たる我が許すものか！

source: ガンバスタードの力、試してみるか……！
target: ガンバスタードの力、試してみるか……！

source: 少しはやるようだが……この攻撃ならばどうだ？
target: 少しはやるようだが……この攻撃ならばどうだ？

source: ガンシールド、エネルギー充填を開始する……！
target: ガンシールド、エネルギー充填を開始する……！

source: 震え、怯え、頭を垂れよ……！
target: 震え、怯え、頭を垂れよ……！

source: 魔導タレット、起動……！
target: 魔導タレット、起動……！

source: さかしい連中だ……ならば……！
target: さかしい連中だ……ならば……！

source: ガンバスタード、出力最大……消し飛ぶがよい！
target: ガンバスタード、出力最大……消し飛ぶがよい！

source:
耐え抜くとは、驚いた……。
ならば、全力で戦い抜くのみよ！
target:
耐え抜くとは、驚いた……。
ならば、全力で戦い抜くのみよ！

source: 我が大盾に、防げぬものなし……！
target: 我が大盾に、防げぬものなし……！

source: な、なんと……我が大盾を貫いたとッ！？
target: な、なんと……我が大盾を貫いたとッ！？

source:
ガンバスタード、リミッターカット……！
帝国の力、あなどるなよ！
target:
ガンバスタード、リミッターカット……！
帝国の力、あなどるなよ！

source:
グッ……メテオ計劃、停滞させてなるものか……！
おおおおおおッ！
target:
グッ……メテオ計劃、停滞させてなるものか……！
おおおおおおッ！

source: ガレマール帝国が敗れるというのか……！？
target: ガレマール帝国が敗れるというのか……！？

source: The Light... It's too much for her to bear!
target: The Light... It's too much for her to bear!

source: She won't last much longer!
target: She won't last much longer!

source: Enough of this! Power of Darkness, answer my call!
target: Enough of this! Power of Darkness, answer my call!

source: Hyaaah!
target: Hyaaah!

source: Fools... You would stoke the fires of conflict?
target: Fools... You would stoke the fires of conflict?

source: Your blood shall freeze!
target: Your blood shall freeze!

source: Shatter!
target: Shatter!

source: Such impudence!
target: Such impudence!

source: Light consume you!
target: Light consume you!

source: Darkness begone!
target: Darkness begone!

source: Why do you resist?
target: Why do you resist?

source: Smite our foes!
target: Smite our foes!

source: Divine Light, deliver serenity everlasting!
target: Divine Light, deliver serenity everlasting!

source: Tranquility must be restored to the land!
target: Tranquility must be restored to the land!

source: I shall weave a new Dragonsong!
target: I shall weave a new Dragonsong!

source: Resplendent ice, grant me strength!
target: Resplendent ice, grant me strength!

source: The Light shall usher in peace!
target: The Light shall usher in peace!

source: Come to me, Hraesvelgr!
target: Come to me, Hraesvelgr!

source: My love...
target: My love...

source: At long last, we are reunited...
target: At long last, we are reunited...

source: And we shall never be parted again!
target: And we shall never be parted again!

source: I won't give up...
target: I won't give up...

source: Not on my future─<var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> future!
target: Not on my future─<var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> future!

source: And I'll be damned if I let it end here!
target: And I'll be damned if I let it end here!

source: No! We're so close!
target: No! We're so close!

source: Do something! Anything!
target: Do something! Anything!

source: Defeat Shiva
target: Defeat Shiva

source: Damn this Light!
target: Damn this Light!

source: Damn it all!
target: Damn it all!

source: I want to see what tomorrow will bring!
target: I want to see what tomorrow will bring!

source: Darkness shall never prevail!
target: Darkness shall never prevail!

source: By my hand, this world shall be purified!
target: By my hand, this world shall be purified!

source: The Darkness in your hearts shall be your undoing!
target: The Darkness in your hearts shall be your undoing!

source: May all be enveloped in Light!
target: May all be enveloped in Light!

source: The age of peace and tranquility has come...
target: The age of peace and tranquility has come...

source: We'll soon be off to our next destination! Raise your rods and make ready to set sail!
target: We'll soon be off to our next destination! Raise your rods and make ready to set sail!

source: Weigh the anchors! Shove off!
target: Weigh the anchors! Shove off!

source: All right, home port is callin'! Pack up your rods and prepare to return to Limsa!
target: All right, home port is callin'! Pack up your rods and prepare to return to Limsa!

source: That's all the fishin' we'll be doin' today. Now's the time to measure your catch!
target: That's all the fishin' we'll be doin' today. Now's the time to measure your catch!

source: Looks like <var 0A E802 /var> fished up Lady Luck herself! Here comes a spectral current!
target: Looks like <var 0A E802 /var> fished up Lady Luck herself! Here comes a spectral current!

source: We've got <var 0A E802 /var> to thank for this spectral current! No one's going home hungry tonight!
target: We've got <var 0A E802 /var> to thank for this spectral current! No one's going home hungry tonight!

source: A fish ain't all <var 0A E802 /var> pulled out of the water! Here comes a spectral current!
target: A fish ain't all <var 0A E802 /var> pulled out of the water! Here comes a spectral current!

source: We're droppin' anchors here─Galadion Bay! Take your fill of the ocean's bounty!
target: We're droppin' anchors here─Galadion Bay! Take your fill of the ocean's bounty!

source: Time to settle in at Galadion Bay! The weather's lookin' a mite tetchy, but manage not to fall overboard and you'll have your pick of the ocean's creatures!
target: Time to settle in at Galadion Bay! The weather's lookin' a mite tetchy, but manage not to fall overboard and you'll have your pick of the ocean's creatures!

source: Here it is─the southern Strait of Merlthor! Show me which of you is a fisher among fishers!
target: Here it is─the southern Strait of Merlthor! Show me which of you is a fisher among fishers!

source: Ain't it a sight? The southern Strait of Merlthor! Even in this hellish weather, I reckon you lot can haul a veritable feast onto the decks of this ship!
target: Ain't it a sight? The southern Strait of Merlthor! Even in this hellish weather, I reckon you lot can haul a veritable feast onto the decks of this ship!

source: Feel the cool wind of the northern Strait of Merlthor against your faces! The only thing better is the pull of a fish at the end of your hook!
target: Feel the cool wind of the northern Strait of Merlthor against your faces! The only thing better is the pull of a fish at the end of your hook!

source: It's rough seas today in the northern Strait of Merlthor! Brave through them, however, and there's no tellin' what you'll pull outta the sea!
target: It's rough seas today in the northern Strait of Merlthor! Brave through them, however, and there's no tellin' what you'll pull outta the sea!

source: The Rhotano Sea welcomes us with open arms─let's hope its fish are just as welcoming!
target: The Rhotano Sea welcomes us with open arms─let's hope its fish are just as welcoming!

source: Seems nature doesn't feel like welcoming us to the Rhotano Sea! No matter─we'll take what we need!
target: Seems nature doesn't feel like welcoming us to the Rhotano Sea! No matter─we'll take what we need!

source: Welcome to the Cieldalaes! Pick a spot at the rail and have at it─I want to see my deck squirmin' with scales!
target: Welcome to the Cieldalaes! Pick a spot at the rail and have at it─I want to see my deck squirmin' with scales!

source: Not the best weather to be navigatin' the Cieldalaes, but the bigger the risk, the bigger the fish, I always say!
target: Not the best weather to be navigatin' the Cieldalaes, but the bigger the risk, the bigger the fish, I always say!

source: Ah, taste the spray from the Bloodbrine Sea! This water's saltier than my old granddad and teemin' with fish for the takin'!
target: Ah, taste the spray from the Bloodbrine Sea! This water's saltier than my old granddad and teemin' with fish for the takin'!

source: The Bloodbrine's downright murderous today! Have a care when you haul in your catch, or the crimson in the swells might well be yours!
target: The Bloodbrine's downright murderous today! Have a care when you haul in your catch, or the crimson in the swells might well be yours!

source:
Ohhh, we're sailin' round in Rothlyt Sound, with rod in hand and hearts unbound!♪
Right, enough singin'─time for fishin'!
target:
Ohhh, we're sailin' round in Rothlyt Sound, with rod in hand and hearts unbound!♪
Right, enough singin'─time for fishin'!

source:
Ohhh, the seas are wroth in Rothlyt Sound─hold fast now, mates, or we'll be drowned!♪
Perfect conditions for hookin' a monster, I reckon!
target:
Ohhh, the seas are wroth in Rothlyt Sound─hold fast now, mates, or we'll be drowned!♪
Perfect conditions for hookin' a monster, I reckon!

source: Look at all them squawkers! They must've spotted a shoal of tasty fish!
target: Look at all them squawkers! They must've spotted a shoal of tasty fish!

source: Here they come! A whole flock of gulls flyin' in our direction!
target: Here they come! A whole flock of gulls flyin' in our direction!

source:
Seems the ship's got some feathered friends.
I wonder if more of their mates'll be joinin' them...
target:
Seems the ship's got some feathered friends.
I wonder if more of their mates'll be joinin' them...

source: Keep an eye out. If the seagulls gather in a big ol' flock, it's a good idea to get your hook in the water.
target: Keep an eye out. If the seagulls gather in a big ol' flock, it's a good idea to get your hook in the water.

source: We've got dolphins fore and aft! That's a sign of good fortune, that is!
target: We've got dolphins fore and aft! That's a sign of good fortune, that is!

source: Oho! Looks like a mob of dolphins is makin' right for us!
target: Oho! Looks like a mob of dolphins is makin' right for us!

source:
See them dolphins swimmin' nearby?
Could be they're scoutin' ahead for the rest of the pod.
target:
See them dolphins swimmin' nearby?
Could be they're scoutin' ahead for the rest of the pod.

source: We could be in for some luck. Dolphins are harbingers of the spectral current─every sailor knows that!
target: We could be in for some luck. Dolphins are harbingers of the spectral current─every sailor knows that!

source: Look at all them squawkers! They must've spotted a shoal of tasty morsels!
target: Look at all them squawkers! They must've spotted a shoal of tasty morsels!

source: There's a whole flock of gulls here! The water must be churnin' with big ol' fish!
target: There's a whole flock of gulls here! The water must be churnin' with big ol' fish!

source: Have you ever seen so many gulls!? Cast a line, and let's see what they're after!
target: Have you ever seen so many gulls!? Cast a line, and let's see what they're after!

source: We've got dolphins fore and aft! That's a sign of good fortune, that is!
target: We've got dolphins fore and aft! That's a sign of good fortune, that is!

source: Look! Dolphins! The Navigator smiles upon us this day!
target: Look! Dolphins! The Navigator smiles upon us this day!

source: Dolphins! A whole mess of 'em! We're in for a wave of Llymlaen's favor─you'll see!
target: Dolphins! A whole mess of 'em! We're in for a wave of Llymlaen's favor─you'll see!

source:
There are gulls about...
Makes you wonder what drew 'em near, eh?
target:
There are gulls about...
Makes you wonder what drew 'em near, eh?

source: Keep an eye out. If the seagulls are flockin', it's a good idea to get your hook in the water.
target: Keep an eye out. If the seagulls are flockin', it's a good idea to get your hook in the water.

source:
Seems the ship's got some feathered friends.
I wonder if more of their mates'll be joinin' them...
target:
Seems the ship's got some feathered friends.
I wonder if more of their mates'll be joinin' them...

source:
See them dolphins swimmin' nearby?
Could be they're scoutin' ahead for the rest of the pod.
target:
See them dolphins swimmin' nearby?
Could be they're scoutin' ahead for the rest of the pod.

source: We could be in for some luck. Dolphins are harbingers of the spectral current─every sailor knows that!
target: We could be in for some luck. Dolphins are harbingers of the spectral current─every sailor knows that!

source: We've spotted dolphins around the ship. Our luck's about to pick up, I reckon.
target: We've spotted dolphins around the ship. Our luck's about to pick up, I reckon.

source: Ah, you hear that whistlin' in the breeze? That means we're in the Sirensong Sea, and its bounty is yours for the takin'!
target: Ah, you hear that whistlin' in the breeze? That means we're in the Sirensong Sea, and its bounty is yours for the takin'!

source: Every siren in the sea is wailin' now! Will you go home with a barrel full o' fish, or will another soul be taken by their stormy song?
target: Every siren in the sea is wailin' now! Will you go home with a barrel full o' fish, or will another soul be taken by their stormy song?

source: Feast your eyes on Kugane, more dazzlin' than the Ruby Sea herself! The fish in these parts grow fatter than a merchant's coinpurse, so have your best bait at the ready!
target: Feast your eyes on Kugane, more dazzlin' than the Ruby Sea herself! The fish in these parts grow fatter than a merchant's coinpurse, so have your best bait at the ready!

source: Kugane's no less a sight to behold, even under inhospitable skies! Keep one hand tight on your rod and the other firm on the bulwark!
target: Kugane's no less a sight to behold, even under inhospitable skies! Keep one hand tight on your rod and the other firm on the bulwark!

source: Behold the glitterin' expanse of the Ruby Sea! Each fish a jewel worthy of adornin' the end of your line!
target: Behold the glitterin' expanse of the Ruby Sea! Each fish a jewel worthy of adornin' the end of your line!

source: Looks like rough waters in the Ruby Sea! But if a tumbled jewel comes out prettier, then a tumbled fish... Well, I reckon we'll find out soon enough!
target: Looks like rough waters in the Ruby Sea! But if a tumbled jewel comes out prettier, then a tumbled fish... Well, I reckon we'll find out soon enough!

source: Here were are─the One River! You'll have your pick of the meatiest fish in Othard, assumin' you have what it takes to wrest them from the waters!
target: Here were are─the One River! You'll have your pick of the meatiest fish in Othard, assumin' you have what it takes to wrest them from the waters!

source: Seems the weather in the One River is less than welcomin'! But you wouldn't be here if you didn't have a steady hand and a sharp eye, so I know you'll pluck a prize from these troubled waters!
target: Seems the weather in the One River is less than welcomin'! But you wouldn't be here if you didn't have a steady hand and a sharp eye, so I know you'll pluck a prize from these troubled waters!

source: Arrive in the Mount Argai Mines
target: Arrive in the Mount Argai Mines

source: Clear the Mount Argai Mines
target: Clear the Mount Argai Mines

source: Arrive in the Summer Ballroom
target: Arrive in the Summer Ballroom

source: Clear the Summer Ballroom
target: Clear the Summer Ballroom

source: Arrive in the Illuminated Plaza
target: Arrive in the Illuminated Plaza

source: Defeat the spectral berserker
target: Defeat the spectral berserker

source: Hah! When I saw that airship come down, I had my suspicions, but it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you!
target: Hah! When I saw that airship come down, I had my suspicions, but it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you!

source: Hmph, when will you learn to call your lovely branch when you're in trouble? We'll discuss this later, but for now...onward!
target: Hmph, when will you learn to call your lovely branch when you're in trouble? We'll discuss this later, but for now...onward!

source: This way, my brave sapling! This way!
target: This way, my brave sapling! This way!

source: Come, my lovelies! Come and join the fun!
target: Come, my lovelies! Come and join the fun!

source: Continue on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We will keep these ones busy!
target: Continue on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We will keep these ones busy!

source: A pinch of pixie magic, and─presto─a secret passage to Lakeland!
target: A pinch of pixie magic, and─presto─a secret passage to Lakeland!

source: Right, you asked for it!
target: Right, you asked for it!

source: A good old-fashioned dwarven decking, made mightier in exile!
target: A good old-fashioned dwarven decking, made mightier in exile!

source: Come, servants of Darkness! I'll bathe in your vile blood!
target: Come, servants of Darkness! I'll bathe in your vile blood!

source: Darkness must die! Die, die, DIEEEEEE!
target: Darkness must die! Die, die, DIEEEEEE!

source: Ahhhhhh, my blood! It burns in my veins!
target: Ahhhhhh, my blood! It burns in my veins!

source: I'll rend your flesh and crush your bones!
target: I'll rend your flesh and crush your bones!

source: Like a gust of wind, I shall sweep away the pall of Darkness!
target: Like a gust of wind, I shall sweep away the pall of Darkness!

source: My swiftness knows no equal!
target: My swiftness knows no equal!

source: Fast as the Light that banishes the Dark!
target: Fast as the Light that banishes the Dark!

source: I shall fight. For the world...and for you, my heart!
target: I shall fight. For the world...and for you, my heart!

source: Embrace death!
target: Embrace death!

source: Arise, my servants, and come to my aid!
target: Arise, my servants, and come to my aid!

source: Oh dear, tired so soon?
target: Oh dear, tired so soon?

source: Very well, you may rest...but not in peace!
target: Very well, you may rest...but not in peace!

source: Hehe, such lovely blossoms of blood!
target: Hehe, such lovely blossoms of blood!

source: More! I need more to attend me! If you cannot stand, then crawl!
target: More! I need more to attend me! If you cannot stand, then crawl!

source: Come now, death isn't so terrible. Not when you have company, hehehe...
target: Come now, death isn't so terrible. Not when you have company, hehehe...

source: I would behold your beautiful blossoms! Let them bloom!
target: I would behold your beautiful blossoms! Let them bloom!

source: Tainted though I am, I am still a Warrior of Light!
target: Tainted though I am, I am still a Warrior of Light!

source: Plunge into the depths of oblivion!
target: Plunge into the depths of oblivion!

source: These grounds will be strewn with your flesh!
target: These grounds will be strewn with your flesh!

source: Why? Why can I not reach you? Is it because...I am tainted?
target: Why? Why can I not reach you? Is it because...I am tainted?

source: Oho, we meet again, and during such a festive occasion besides! Let us revel, my friends!
target: Oho, we meet again, and during such a festive occasion besides! Let us revel, my friends!

source: Come, come! Gather ye around, and lend an ear to my sweet melody!
target: Come, come! Gather ye around, and lend an ear to my sweet melody!

source: You're saving some of the action for us, I trust!
target: You're saving some of the action for us, I trust!

source: Watch me, Milinda! This time I fight not to avenge, but to protect!
target: Watch me, Milinda! This time I fight not to avenge, but to protect!

source: Compared to the Virtues, this is just a relaxing diversion!
target: Compared to the Virtues, this is just a relaxing diversion!

source: Can't afford to botch this up─Miss Olvara would never let me live it down!
target: Can't afford to botch this up─Miss Olvara would never let me live it down!

source: Not ashamed to admit the offer of drinks has me fired up!
target: Not ashamed to admit the offer of drinks has me fired up!

source: Let's finish this quick and have those drinks! It's free, so Taynor can't complain!
target: Let's finish this quick and have those drinks! It's free, so Taynor can't complain!

source: Have a taste of dwarven tradition, you airy glowing bastards!
target: Have a taste of dwarven tradition, you airy glowing bastards!

source: Arrive at the gathering ring
target: Arrive at the gathering ring

source: Clear the gathering ring
target: Clear the gathering ring

source: Arrive at the scalekin pen
target: Arrive at the scalekin pen

source: Clear the scalekin pen
target: Clear the scalekin pen

source: Arrive at Sunseat
target: Arrive at Sunseat

source: Defeat Lunar Bahamut
target: Defeat Lunar Bahamut

source:
The Amalj'aa are in trouble.
Let's split up.
target:
The Amalj'aa are in trouble.
Let's split up.

source: Very well. I shall fly to their aid.
target: Very well. I shall fly to their aid.

source:
My poor child...
I shall free thee from thy pain.
target:
My poor child...
I shall free thee from thy pain.

source: Hmph. There's no end to them.
target: Hmph. There's no end to them.

source: I will call unto my children.
target: I will call unto my children.

source:
The eikon waiteth in the heavens!
My child shall bear thee to him!
target:
The eikon waiteth in the heavens!
My child shall bear thee to him!

source: Preparing to fire...
target: Preparing to fire...

source: Reactivating magitek field...
target: Reactivating magitek field...

source: We must hold our ground until their defenses are broken!
target: We must hold our ground until their defenses are broken!

source: Once the way is clear, strike at the enemy's heart!
target: Once the way is clear, strike at the enemy's heart!

source:
Our flames will clear the way!
Prepare to strike again!
target:
Our flames will clear the way!
Prepare to strike again!

source:
You would lend us your aid?
Then let us crush this accursed war machine.
target:
You would lend us your aid?
Then let us crush this accursed war machine.

source:
You fight well!
Our brethren will hear of your brave deeds.
target:
You fight well!
Our brethren will hear of your brave deeds.

source: Follow Cid's instructions
target: Follow Cid's instructions

source: Destroy the target
target: Destroy the target

source: Destroy the target while evading its attacks
target: Destroy the target while evading its attacks

source: Destroy the target while defending against its attacks
target: Destroy the target while defending against its attacks

source: Let's begin the G-Warrior training simulation. I've prepared three trials to teach you the basics.
target: Let's begin the G-Warrior training simulation. I've prepared three trials to teach you the basics.

source: First, I want you to try attacking the guidance system. Don't worry, it won't fight back!
target: First, I want you to try attacking the guidance system. Don't worry, it won't fight back!

source: The G-Warrior is armed with a range of weaponry. Now's your chance to learn what it's capable of.
target: The G-Warrior is armed with a range of weaponry. Now's your chance to learn what it's capable of.

source: So far, so good. Let's move on to something a bit more advanced, shall we?
target: So far, so good. Let's move on to something a bit more advanced, shall we?

source: If you feel you've already learned enough, you can end the simulation by accessing the training node.
target: If you feel you've already learned enough, you can end the simulation by accessing the training node.

source: But once you begin combat, you won't be able to leave the simulation until it's over.
target: But once you begin combat, you won't be able to leave the simulation until it's over.

source: All right, let's continue.
target: All right, let's continue.

source: The G-Warrior also comes equipped with the Pyretic Booster, which diverts even more power to its weapons and increases its speed and maneuverability.
target: The G-Warrior also comes equipped with the Pyretic Booster, which diverts even more power to its weapons and increases its speed and maneuverability.

source: This, however, comes at a price. Activating it places a huge strain on the G-Warrior, so it must only be used in short bursts.
target: This, however, comes at a price. Activating it places a huge strain on the G-Warrior, so it must only be used in short bursts.

source:
That's why it's best to practice here before heading into battle.
Now, try activating the Pyretic Booster!
target:
That's why it's best to practice here before heading into battle.
Now, try activating the Pyretic Booster!

source: You'll notice that your movement speed is much improved. But as shown on your monitor, the G-Warrior becomes more and more structurally unstable as time passes.
target: You'll notice that your movement speed is much improved. But as shown on your monitor, the G-Warrior becomes more and more structurally unstable as time passes.

source: To deactivate the Pyretic Booster, press the same button again.
target: To deactivate the Pyretic Booster, press the same button again.

source: Now to try using the Pyretic Booster to destroy the target.
target: Now to try using the Pyretic Booster to destroy the target.

source: This time, the node will launch wide reaching attacks in quick succession. But with your increased movement speed, you should have no trouble evading them.
target: This time, the node will launch wide reaching attacks in quick succession. But with your increased movement speed, you should have no trouble evading them.

source: Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You'd best deactivate the Pyretic Booster while I explain the final trial.
target: Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You'd best deactivate the Pyretic Booster while I explain the final trial.

source:
Are you listening? Quickly, deactivate the Pyretic Booster!
Even though it's only a simulation, it'll terminate prematurely if you're not careful.
target:
Are you listening? Quickly, deactivate the Pyretic Booster!
Even though it's only a simulation, it'll terminate prematurely if you're not careful.

source: We've covered offense, now to look at defense. This is where the Aetherial Aegis should come in handy.
target: We've covered offense, now to look at defense. This is where the Aetherial Aegis should come in handy.

source: Unfortunately, you can't keep the barrier up indefinitely as it will drain the G-Warrior's power reserves. You might even run out of energy for the weapons, so watch out.
target: Unfortunately, you can't keep the barrier up indefinitely as it will drain the G-Warrior's power reserves. You might even run out of energy for the weapons, so watch out.

source: First, let's try deploying the Aetherial Aegis.
target: First, let's try deploying the Aetherial Aegis.

source: The monitor shows how much power is being drained. Don't let it get too low!
target: The monitor shows how much power is being drained. Don't let it get too low!

source: That's enough for now. Turn off the barrier using the same button used to deploy it.
target: That's enough for now. Turn off the barrier using the same button used to deploy it.

source: For the last trial, we'll use the Aetherial Aegis while attempting to destroy the target.
target: For the last trial, we'll use the Aetherial Aegis while attempting to destroy the target.

source: Unlike before, there is no way to escape its attacks, so you'll need to weather them using the barrier.
target: Unlike before, there is no way to escape its attacks, so you'll need to weather them using the barrier.

source: You're a natural! All right, that's everything. Time to end the simulation.
target: You're a natural! All right, that's everything. Time to end the simulation.

source: You'll need to deactivate the Aetherial Aegis before you run out of power!
target: You'll need to deactivate the Aetherial Aegis before you run out of power!

source: That's as much damage as the G-Warrior can take. If this was a real combat situation, you'd be...well, let's not dwell on that.
target: That's as much damage as the G-Warrior can take. If this was a real combat situation, you'd be...well, let's not dwell on that.

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? We can't test the Pyretic Booster if you don't activate it.
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? We can't test the Pyretic Booster if you don't activate it.

source: Having trouble finding the button for the Aetherial Aegis? It should be clearly marked...
target: Having trouble finding the button for the Aetherial Aegis? It should be clearly marked...

source: Auto Restoration can mitigate a certain amount of damage incurred, but don't rely on it to carry you through the battle!
target: Auto Restoration can mitigate a certain amount of damage incurred, but don't rely on it to carry you through the battle!

source: Deploy the Aetherial Aegis to weather the storm!
target: Deploy the Aetherial Aegis to weather the storm!

source: Defeat the Sapphire Weapon
target: Defeat the Sapphire Weapon

source:
Well, well. It seems the savages have been busy...
I shall enjoy breaking their new toy.
target:
Well, well. It seems the savages have been busy...
I shall enjoy breaking their new toy.

source: My likeness reborn in ceruleum flames!
target: My likeness reborn in ceruleum flames!

source: Let us see what you make of this!
target: Let us see what you make of this!

source: Your wild flailing shall avail you naught!
target: Your wild flailing shall avail you naught!

source: I tire of these games. Now to send you to a watery grave!
target: I tire of these games. Now to send you to a watery grave!

source:
It must have absorbed an aquatic eikon.
Be sure to use the Pyretic Booster and Aetherial Aegis!
target:
It must have absorbed an aquatic eikon.
Be sure to use the Pyretic Booster and Aetherial Aegis!

source:
Is that...Ultima?
Use the Aetherial Aegis!
target:
Is that...Ultima?
Use the Aetherial Aegis!

source:
It's preparing to strike!
Quickly, deploy the Aegis!
target:
It's preparing to strike!
Quickly, deploy the Aegis!

source: Activate the Pyretic Booster and keep moving!
target: Activate the Pyretic Booster and keep moving!

source:
Destroy the ceruleum servants, then focus your attacks on the Sapphire Weapon!
You mustn't let it launch its next attack!
target:
Destroy the ceruleum servants, then focus your attacks on the Sapphire Weapon!
You mustn't let it launch its next attack!

source:
It's submerged, but not for long.
Watch for signs of movement!
target:
It's submerged, but not for long.
Watch for signs of movement!

source:
The ceruleum servants are protecting the Weapon.
Ignore the turrets for now and destroy the servants!
target:
The ceruleum servants are protecting the Weapon.
Ignore the turrets for now and destroy the servants!

source:
The turrets can wait─ You must eliminate the ceruleum servants first!
It's the only way!
target:
The turrets can wait─ You must eliminate the ceruleum servants first!
It's the only way!

source:
The turrets are preparing to self-destruct.
Destroy them with the Ultima Buster!
target:
The turrets are preparing to self-destruct.
Destroy them with the Ultima Buster!

source: This battle shall be our last.
target: This battle shall be our last.

source: Darkness must be destroyed!
target: Darkness must be destroyed!

source: Begone, spawn of shadow!
target: Begone, spawn of shadow!

source: I will not fall!
target: I will not fall!

source: Refulgent aether, smite my foes!
target: Refulgent aether, smite my foes!

source: Gleaming steel, light my path!
target: Gleaming steel, light my path!

source: I am salvation given form...
target: I am salvation given form...

source: Mankind's first hero...and his final hope!
target: Mankind's first hero...and his final hope!

source: For victory, I render up my all!
target: For victory, I render up my all!

source: You still stand. Very well...
target: You still stand. Very well...

source: To me, Warriors of Light!
target: To me, Warriors of Light!

source: Hope, grant me strength!
target: Hope, grant me strength!

source: You... It cannot be...
target: You... It cannot be...

source: Clad in prayer, I am invincible!
target: Clad in prayer, I am invincible!

source: Your demise will be our salvation!
target: Your demise will be our salvation!

source: My soul knows no surrender!
target: My soul knows no surrender!

source: My duty... No, not yet!
target: My duty... No, not yet!

source: Justice belongs to the victor, and the victor I shall be!
target: Justice belongs to the victor, and the victor I shall be!

source: Rift swallow you!
target: Rift swallow you!

source: Find your way out...if you can.
target: Find your way out...if you can.

source: Your end is nigh! Mine is the hope, mine is the Light!
target: Your end is nigh! Mine is the hope, mine is the Light!

source: I shall transcend you!
target: I shall transcend you!

source: Why!? Why do you interfere!? Is this not meant to be our shared dream!?
target: Why!? Why do you interfere!? Is this not meant to be our shared dream!?

source: No, I cannot have erred... Ever have I walked this path, and I shall walk it to its end!
target: No, I cannot have erred... Ever have I walked this path, and I shall walk it to its end!

source: And so it ends. In unceremonious silence.
target: And so it ends. In unceremonious silence.

source: You would do well to hurry, lest you be set adrift in the rift.
target: You would do well to hurry, lest you be set adrift in the rift.

source: You are determined, that much I will allow. Mayhap you will yet win free.
target: You are determined, that much I will allow. Mayhap you will yet win free.

source: Hmph, did you truly think I would let you leave? Fool. This place shall be your grave.
target: Hmph, did you truly think I would let you leave? Fool. This place shall be your grave.

source: Here where we Ascians have been forced to retreat time and again, you will meet your demise.
target: Here where we Ascians have been forced to retreat time and again, you will meet your demise.

source: You clutch the crystal of Azem to your breast and wish upon it with all your heart.
target: You clutch the crystal of Azem to your breast and wish upon it with all your heart.

source: Hmph... Even with all this power, it seems I am hard-pressed to lay you low.
target: Hmph... Even with all this power, it seems I am hard-pressed to lay you low.

source: No matter. If you will not fall, then you will be banished instead!

source: Allied units unresponsive. However, retreat is not an option. Kill...or...die...
target: Allied units unresponsive. However, retreat is not an option. Kill...or...die...

source: Die... Die... They're all dead! You should all be dead!
target: Die... Die... They're all dead! You should all be dead!

source: Killing... Is it “fun” for you too?
target: Killing... Is it “fun” for you too?

source: Fun...funny, if that's the way of the world...
target: Fun...funny, if that's the way of the world...
