source: Its head comes off!? Have care!
target: Its head comes off!? Have care!

source: Defeat Profane Fafnir!
target: Defeat Profane Fafnir!

source: His Eminence... Must protect...His Eminence...
target: His Eminence... Must protect...His Eminence...

source: The archbishop no longer rules Ishgard! The people shape our nation's future now!
target: The archbishop no longer rules Ishgard! The people shape our nation's future now!

source: My divine flames...shall consume you!
target: My divine flames...shall consume you!

source: By the Fury, this is Ser Charibert's magick! Have care!
target: By the Fury, this is Ser Charibert's magick! Have care!

source: Your reckoning...is come!
target: Your reckoning...is come!

source: Quickly, take one each!
target: Quickly, take one each!

source: ●強力な攻撃が来ます！集まってください！
target: ●強力な攻撃が来ます！集まってください！

source: The time is come...to call upon the true power...of the Heavens' Ward...
target: The time is come...to call upon the true power...of the Heavens' Ward...

source: This bodes ill... Quickly, take cover behind my shield!
target: This bodes ill... Quickly, take cover behind my shield!

source:
●なんという攻撃だ……！
だがっ、ここで倒れるわけにはいかない……！
target:
●なんという攻撃だ……！
だがっ、ここで倒れるわけにはいかない……！

source: For the glory...of King Thordan!
target: For the glory...of King Thordan!

source: His Eminence... You will return...His Eminence to me...
target: His Eminence... You will return...His Eminence to me...

source: Stay on your guard!
target: Stay on your guard!

source: Gather to me...ye faithful souls...
target: Gather to me...ye faithful souls...

source: Render unto me...your strength!
target: Render unto me...your strength!

source: These fiends empower the blasphemy! We must strike them down first!
target: These fiends empower the blasphemy! We must strike them down first!

source: Let us settle this...once and for all!
target: Let us settle this...once and for all!

source: In the name of Ishgard, we will free you from your torment!
target: In the name of Ishgard, we will free you from your torment!

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─this way!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─this way!

source: Defeat Charlet!
target: Defeat Charlet!

source: I'll draw his attention. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, keep me in the fight!
target: I'll draw his attention. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, keep me in the fight!

source: I can't die until I lay Charlet to rest!
target: I can't die until I lay Charlet to rest!

source: Lightning-aspected aether!? Keep away from it!
target: Lightning-aspected aether!? Keep away from it!

source: What's that lightning doing to me!? Cast Esuna, quickly!
target: What's that lightning doing to me!? Cast Esuna, quickly!

source: Good work!
target: Good work!

source: Hrrraaaghhh! T-Together... We must be...together!
target: Hrrraaaghhh! T-Together... We must be...together!

source: Ungh! Can't move!
target: Ungh! Can't move!

source: L-Like swatting...flies!
target: L-Like swatting...flies!

source: Not on my watch!
target: Not on my watch!

source: As long as I hold out, he won't lay a finger on you!
target: As long as I hold out, he won't lay a finger on you!

source: I-I can't do it! I'm too w-w-weak!
target: I-I can't do it! I'm too w-w-weak!

source: No you're not, Charlet! Your kindness is your strength!
target: No you're not, Charlet! Your kindness is your strength!

source: I-I-I'm sorry, Fordola! Nnnhaaagh!
target: I-I-I'm sorry, Fordola! Nnnhaaagh!

source: This is our chance. Let's finish him off!
target: This is our chance. Let's finish him off!

source: It's over, Charlet. I'll end your suffering!
target: It's over, Charlet. I'll end your suffering!

source: Th-This is all wrong! All wrong!
target: Th-This is all wrong! All wrong!

source: Let me handle this!
target: Let me handle this!

source: This ends now!
target: This ends now!

source: No... I can't let it end...like this...
target: No... I can't let it end...like this...

source: Fordola! You can't die yet!
target: Fordola! You can't die yet!

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! No... Not like this!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! No... Not like this!

source: 10 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
target: 10 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...

source: 5 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
target: 5 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...

source: 4 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
target: 4 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...

source: 3 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
target: 3 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...

source: 2 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
target: 2 seconds to Fordola's Penitent Blade...

source: 1 second to Fordola's Penitent Blade...
target: 1 second to Fordola's Penitent Blade...

source: Hold nothing back! Push yourself to your limit, and me to mine!
target: Hold nothing back! Push yourself to your limit, and me to mine!

source: Hah! Still fight in you, I see.
target: Hah! Still fight in you, I see.

source: Is this truly the best Hydaelyn's chosen can muster?
target: Is this truly the best Hydaelyn's chosen can muster?

source: Soon you will know the full extent of my power.
target: Soon you will know the full extent of my power.

source: Ah, my soul...how it burns!
target: Ah, my soul...how it burns!

source: I know you feel it, too. The inferno swelling within you.
target: I know you feel it, too. The inferno swelling within you.

source: Come! Let all creation be consumed by our ravenous fervor!
target: Come! Let all creation be consumed by our ravenous fervor!

source: Do not tell me your life's fire is already spent...
target: Do not tell me your life's fire is already spent...

source: Yes, yes! Rise once more! It mustn't end yet!
target: Yes, yes! Rise once more! It mustn't end yet!

source: No, not yet! Not until the last of me is spent!
target: No, not yet! Not until the last of me is spent!

source: Burn, burn!
target: Burn, burn!

source: This is my moment! Our moment!
target: This is my moment! Our moment!

source: Did you not wish to take my head?
target: Did you not wish to take my head?

source: Have I overestimated your potential?
target: Have I overestimated your potential?

source: Have you no rage left for me? No rancor?
target: Have you no rage left for me? No rancor?

source: Show me your vaunted fortitude!
target: Show me your vaunted fortitude!

source: Protect Kan<var 1F /var>E<var 1F /var>Senna and defeat Gleipnir!
target: Protect Kan<var 1F /var>E<var 1F /var>Senna and defeat Gleipnir!

source: The Elder Seedseer must not be disturbed! Protect her!
target: The Elder Seedseer must not be disturbed! Protect her!

source: He makes for the Elder Seedseer! To her side!
target: He makes for the Elder Seedseer! To her side!

source: The ceremony is almost complete. Keep Gleipnir at bay!
target: The ceremony is almost complete. Keep Gleipnir at bay!

source: Ugh... I can scarcely raise my spear... Has the poison taken effect already!?
target: Ugh... I can scarcely raise my spear... Has the poison taken effect already!?

source: He calls upon his wicked minions! Bring them to me─they will fall before my spear!
target: He calls upon his wicked minions! Bring them to me─they will fall before my spear!

source: You must fend off his attacks if the Elder Seedseer is to survive!
target: You must fend off his attacks if the Elder Seedseer is to survive!

source: So long as we are within the barrier, we need not fear Gleipnir's poison!
target: So long as we are within the barrier, we need not fear Gleipnir's poison!

source: However, the battle is far from over. Steel yourselves!
target: However, the battle is far from over. Steel yourselves!

source: The forest's blessing shall guide us through the most torrential storm!
target: The forest's blessing shall guide us through the most torrential storm!

source: More beasts! Protect the Elder Seedseer!
target: More beasts! Protect the Elder Seedseer!

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, to me! We must group together!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, to me! We must group together!

source: Even Gleipnir lashes out in the face of death. Bring an end to its misery while the barrier still stands!
target: Even Gleipnir lashes out in the face of death. Bring an end to its misery while the barrier still stands!

source: Ea<var 1F /var>Sura, I now fathom the depth of your suffering. For all that you held dear, I shall see to it that you are given peace.
target: Ea<var 1F /var>Sura, I now fathom the depth of your suffering. For all that you held dear, I shall see to it that you are given peace.

source: His rancor makes even the elementals shudder in fear. The barrier may not last for much longer.
target: His rancor makes even the elementals shudder in fear. The barrier may not last for much longer.

source: Press the attack!
target: Press the attack!

source: There is hope yet! I shall erect the hedge once more!
target: There is hope yet! I shall erect the hedge once more!

source: The pain is too much to bear... I cannot...I cannot move...
target: The pain is too much to bear... I cannot...I cannot move...

source: That mist bears Gleipnir's poison! Do not allow them to drift near the Elder Seedseer!
target: That mist bears Gleipnir's poison! Do not allow them to drift near the Elder Seedseer!

source:
毒気が浄化されただけでなく、力が溢れてくる！
これが精霊の力なのか！？！
target:
毒気が浄化されただけでなく、力が溢れてくる！
これが精霊の力なのか！？！

source: The ceremony is almost complete! Bear Gleipnir's wrath for just a while longer!
target: The ceremony is almost complete! Bear Gleipnir's wrath for just a while longer!

source: I shall draw his ire. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, lend the Elder Seedseer a portion of your power!
target: I shall draw his ire. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, lend the Elder Seedseer a portion of your power!

source: Come, you pitiful beast! Let us see the contents of your innards!
target: Come, you pitiful beast! Let us see the contents of your innards!

source: I swore that I would protect her. This time I shall not falter!
target: I swore that I would protect her. This time I shall not falter!

source: <cough> ...Ugh... <wheeze> My next charge shall be my last... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, gift your aether unto the Elder Seedser!
target: <cough> ...Ugh... <wheeze> My next charge shall be my last... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, gift your aether unto the Elder Seedser!

source: Protect her... Ugh...
target: Protect her... Ugh...

source: Gift your aether to Kan<var 1F /var>E<var 1F /var>Senna!
target: Gift your aether to Kan<var 1F /var>E<var 1F /var>Senna!

source: Defeat Gleipnir!
target: Defeat Gleipnir!

source: My aether is exhausted... I cannot stand...
target: My aether is exhausted... I cannot stand...

source: Aim for the weak point of the aetherial orb!
target: Aim for the weak point of the aetherial orb!

source: Defeat the Indigo Beast!
target: Defeat the Indigo Beast!

source: Here it comes! We're counting on you, Lorens!
target: Here it comes! We're counting on you, Lorens!

source: Aye, no enemy's weakness escapes my eyes...
target: Aye, no enemy's weakness escapes my eyes...

source: Grrroooaaarrrggghhh!
target: Grrroooaaarrrggghhh!

source: See how easy that was? I reckon you can do it, too, Actin' Commander!
target: See how easy that was? I reckon you can do it, too, Actin' Commander!

source: Is that all you've got? Time to put ye out of yer misery!
target: Is that all you've got? Time to put ye out of yer misery!

source: Grrroaaarghhh! My...my children...!
target: Grrroaaarghhh! My...my children...!

source: Wheiskaet, reporting for duty! Aye, now the real fun begins!
target: Wheiskaet, reporting for duty! Aye, now the real fun begins!

source: Now we're gettin' somewhere! Let's finish the deed!
target: Now we're gettin' somewhere! Let's finish the deed!

source: Look alive, everyone! Victory is within our grasp!
target: Look alive, everyone! Victory is within our grasp!

source: ●今すぐ俺の元に集まれッ！
target: ●今すぐ俺の元に集まれッ！

source: The blasphemy's absorbin' their aether! I have a bad feelin' about this...
target: The blasphemy's absorbin' their aether! I have a bad feelin' about this...

source: The tide turns against us...
target: The tide turns against us...

source: Pshhh! We ssstand with you!
target: Pshhh! We ssstand with you!

source: Pshhh! As do we! For the future of the Indigo Deep!
target: Pshhh! As do we! For the future of the Indigo Deep!

source: That's enough aether to go blastin' this entire island! We'd better work fast!
target: That's enough aether to go blastin' this entire island! We'd better work fast!

source: Where'd it go? Best be wary...
target: Where'd it go? Best be wary...

source: That trick o' yours won't work on us anymore. Ain't that right, Actin' Commander?
target: That trick o' yours won't work on us anymore. Ain't that right, Actin' Commander?

source: There is no end to them. Prepare yourselves!
target: There is no end to them. Prepare yourselves!

source: Landenel! U'odh! Now's yer time to shine!
target: Landenel! U'odh! Now's yer time to shine!

source: Wheiskaet! Defend us with yer blade!
target: Wheiskaet! Defend us with yer blade!

source: Absorbin' their aether, is it? We'd best finish those beasts quickly...
target: Absorbin' their aether, is it? We'd best finish those beasts quickly...

source: The wall's gone! Aye, this is our chance to strike!
target: The wall's gone! Aye, this is our chance to strike!

source: Ungh... Such power...
target: Ungh... Such power...

source: Here it comes again. Steel yerselves!
target: Here it comes again. Steel yerselves!

source: ●皆、諦めるな！　活路はきっとある！
target: ●皆、諦めるな！　活路はきっとある！

source: Noll...and the Crushing Tide! Let us stand as one, my friends!
target: Noll...and the Crushing Tide! Let us stand as one, my friends!

source: If we don't take out those orbs, this'll be over before it starts. Ye ready!?
target: If we don't take out those orbs, this'll be over before it starts. Ye ready!?

source: 10 seconds to Extinction Flare...
target: 10 seconds to Extinction Flare...

source: 5 seconds to Extinction Flare...
target: 5 seconds to Extinction Flare...

source: 4 seconds to Extinction Flare...
target: 4 seconds to Extinction Flare...

source: 3 seconds to Extinction Flare...
target: 3 seconds to Extinction Flare...

source: 2 seconds to Extinction Flare...
target: 2 seconds to Extinction Flare...

source: 1 second to Extinction Flare...
target: 1 second to Extinction Flare...

source: Protect the refugees!
target: Protect the refugees!

source: Coordinate with G'raha Tia and defeat the beasts!
target: Coordinate with G'raha Tia and defeat the beasts!

source: Coordinate with your comrades and defeat the beasts!
target: Coordinate with your comrades and defeat the beasts!

source: I'll command the beasts' attention. See to the wounded!
target: I'll command the beasts' attention. See to the wounded!

source:
They're being overwhelmed by fear...
Alphinaud, do what you can!
target:
They're being overwhelmed by fear...
Alphinaud, do what you can!

source: ●不要ラベル
target: ●不要ラベル

source: Everyone's turning! All is lost!
target: Everyone's turning! All is lost!

source: Those who can stand, come with me!
target: Those who can stand, come with me!

source: ...Worry not for the refugees, but for yourself, boy!
target: ...Worry not for the refugees, but for yourself, boy!

source:
I don't like the look of that...
Stay sharp!
target:
I don't like the look of that...
Stay sharp!

source: ●不要ラベル
target: ●不要ラベル

source: You take the lead, I'll provide support!
target: You take the lead, I'll provide support!

source: More beasts... I only hope my newfound abilities are enough!
target: More beasts... I only hope my newfound abilities are enough!

source: You're starting to get the hang of those things.
target: You're starting to get the hang of those things.

source: They fight hard...but not hard enough!
target: They fight hard...but not hard enough!

source: We've lost too many already. G'raha, with me!
target: We've lost too many already. G'raha, with me!

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: Is there no way to break the chain of transformations!?
target: Is there no way to break the chain of transformations!?

source: Watch out, Alisaie! This one is not like the rest!
target: Watch out, Alisaie! This one is not like the rest!

source: See if I care! I won't back down!
target: See if I care! I won't back down!

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: Now's our chance!
target: Now's our chance!

source: The air crackles with energy... Find cover!
target: The air crackles with energy... Find cover!

source: As they say─turnabout's fair play!
target: As they say─turnabout's fair play!

source: Oho, a trio for the ages!
target: Oho, a trio for the ages!

source: I had a feeling I'd find you here.<var 17 /var>This should be the last of the worst troublemakers. With me!
target: I had a feeling I'd find you here.<var 17 /var>This should be the last of the worst troublemakers. With me!

source: ●不要ラベル
target: ●不要ラベル

source: Jullus will see the refugees to safety. We must keep the beasts at bay!
target: Jullus will see the refugees to safety. We must keep the beasts at bay!

source: ●不要ラベル
target: ●不要ラベル

source: Heal the wounded refugees!
target: Heal the wounded refugees!

source: Calm the distressed refugees!
target: Calm the distressed refugees!

source: Infiltrate the supply depot
target: Infiltrate the supply depot

source: Set explosives on the magitek weaponry
target: Set explosives on the magitek weaponry

source: Find a place to hide, then relay your progress
target: Find a place to hide, then relay your progress

source: Access the control terminal
target: Access the control terminal

source: Withdraw from the supply depot
target: Withdraw from the supply depot

source: Assist A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna's troops
target: Assist A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna's troops

source: Assist Emmanellain's troops
target: Assist Emmanellain's troops

source: Assist Sicard's troops
target: Assist Sicard's troops

source: Head north and join the vanguard
target: Head north and join the vanguard

source: Defeat the tempered imperials
target: Defeat the tempered imperials

source: Defeat Vergilia van Corculum
target: Defeat Vergilia van Corculum

source: Two on the gate... Could get messy if I'm not careful.
target: Two on the gate... Could get messy if I'm not careful.

source: One guarding the controls. Time he took a nap!
target: One guarding the controls. Time he took a nap!

source: Now to set the explosives. Best keep quiet...for now.
target: Now to set the explosives. Best keep quiet...for now.

source: So, they've got guard dogs, eh? No use hiding, they'll soon sniff me out. Luckily, I've come prepared.
target: So, they've got guard dogs, eh? No use hiding, they'll soon sniff me out. Luckily, I've come prepared.

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: That should do the trick. Now to hide and send word.
target: That should do the trick. Now to hide and send word.

source: This is Thancred. The explosives are in place.
target: This is Thancred. The explosives are in place.

source: Very good. All is proceeding as planned.<var 17 /var>Head to the control terminal. It should be to the northwest.
target: Very good. All is proceeding as planned.<var 17 /var>Head to the control terminal. It should be to the northwest.

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: Understood. Have the others wait at the rendezvous point.
target: Understood. Have the others wait at the rendezvous point.

source: That's it! The control terminal!
target: That's it! The control terminal!

source: Fighters─protect the others!
target: Fighters─protect the others!

source: ●未使用になりました
target: ●未使用になりました

source: A brief respite─but stay alert.<var 17 /var>Keep the carriages safe!
target: A brief respite─but stay alert.<var 17 /var>Keep the carriages safe!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: What impeccable timing!<var 17 /var>Fear not, friends─the savior of Ishgard is here!
target: What impeccable timing!<var 17 /var>Fear not, friends─the savior of Ishgard is here!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: A fine display, but the other carriages are still in danger.<var 17 /var>Go on ahead─we'll hold the line!
target: A fine display, but the other carriages are still in danger.<var 17 /var>Go on ahead─we'll hold the line!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: We're the only ones still strugglin'?<var 17 /var>Time we put our backs into it, then!
target: We're the only ones still strugglin'?<var 17 /var>Time we put our backs into it, then!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source:
That big bastard's goin' straight for the carriages!
Stop it in its tracks!
target:
That big bastard's goin' straight for the carriages!
Stop it in its tracks!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: Quick, broadside it!
target: Quick, broadside it!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: You lot all right back there?
target: You lot all right back there?

source: We're fine─and ready for more!
target: We're fine─and ready for more!

source: Hear that?<var 17 /var>Get to the front and turn the tide!
target: Hear that?<var 17 /var>Get to the front and turn the tide!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: We have them now─ Forward!
target: We have them now─ Forward!

source: The supply caravan is safe for the time being, and Thancred's team have thrown the enemy into disarray.
target: The supply caravan is safe for the time being, and Thancred's team have thrown the enemy into disarray.

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: Now it's our turn!
target: Now it's our turn!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: That's her─Vergilia!
target: That's her─Vergilia!

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: ●未使用ラベル
target: ●未使用ラベル

source: Keep the war machines at bay!
target: Keep the war machines at bay!

source: Haha! More fodder for my flames!
target: Haha! More fodder for my flames!

source: So many... At this rate, we will be overwhelmed!
target: So many... At this rate, we will be overwhelmed!

source: I will not fall so easily! These curs will taste my wrath!
target: I will not fall so easily! These curs will taste my wrath!

source: More of them! Quick, lend Sadu a hand!
target: More of them! Quick, lend Sadu a hand!

source: Make way! These whelps will rue the day they crossed my path!
target: Make way! These whelps will rue the day they crossed my path!

source: None shall escape my chains! Now is your chance to strike!
target: None shall escape my chains! Now is your chance to strike!

source: Hahaha! May your screams fill the air!
target: Hahaha! May your screams fill the air!

source: ●あの魔導リーパー……止めなきゃ危ない！
target: ●あの魔導リーパー……止めなきゃ危ない！

source: As a raging bull!
target: As a raging bull!

source: 5 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
target: 5 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.

source: 4 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
target: 4 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.

source: 3 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
target: 3 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.

source: 2 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
target: 2 seconds until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.

source: 1 second until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.
target: 1 second until Sadu completes the ritual of Falling Dusk.

source: It's time. We only have one shot at this, so let's make it count!
target: It's time. We only have one shot at this, so let's make it count!

source: If our assumption is correct, the fugitives have come─and may still be here. Keep your eyes peeled and your guard up.
target: If our assumption is correct, the fugitives have come─and may still be here. Keep your eyes peeled and your guard up.

source: These halls are home to dangerous creatures. I will draw their attention, that you may focus on applying your techniques.
target: These halls are home to dangerous creatures. I will draw their attention, that you may focus on applying your techniques.

source: To begin with, cast Kardia on me. The spell will establish a magical link between us.
target: To begin with, cast Kardia on me. The spell will establish a magical link between us.

source: The residual aether of your attacks will be channeled unto me, healing my wounds as you deal damage to our foes.
target: The residual aether of your attacks will be channeled unto me, healing my wounds as you deal damage to our foes.

source: Sizable fiend ahead. I believe this calls for a barrier.
target: Sizable fiend ahead. I believe this calls for a barrier.

source: This time, augment your spells using Eukrasia, then cast Eukrasian Diagnosis on me.
target: This time, augment your spells using Eukrasia, then cast Eukrasian Diagnosis on me.

source: This will bestow a barrier on me that provides both protection and healing.
target: This will bestow a barrier on me that provides both protection and healing.

source: More of the same plant taken... What could it possibly be?
target: More of the same plant taken... What could it possibly be?

source: Traces of ice... Someone recently fought here─a proficient wielder of magic.
target: Traces of ice... Someone recently fought here─a proficient wielder of magic.

source: The fugitives may be close. Be on your guard.
target: The fugitives may be close. Be on your guard.

source: This will go poorly for you if you resist!
target: This will go poorly for you if you resist!

source: We'll see about that!
target: We'll see about that!

source: This is getting us nowhere! We must subdue Loifa first!
target: This is getting us nowhere! We must subdue Loifa first!

source: Oh, for the love of─ Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: Oh, for the love of─ Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: Impressive! To see how well you wield your nouliths, one would not think you a novice!
target: Impressive! To see how well you wield your nouliths, one would not think you a novice!

source: Hm, nothing of note here... Let us head deeper into the arboretum.
target: Hm, nothing of note here... Let us head deeper into the arboretum.

source: Let's finish them quickly!
target: Let's finish them quickly!

source: Ancel, that's enough! You mustn't lose your temper!
target: Ancel, that's enough! You mustn't lose your temper!

source: We'll deal with you instead!
target: We'll deal with you instead!

source: That's enough, Mahaud!
target: That's enough, Mahaud!

source: Loifa, no!
target: Loifa, no!

source: No... Not here...
target: No... Not here...

source: Hmph! There'll be nothing left of you but ash!
target: Hmph! There'll be nothing left of you but ash!

source: I've got this. Stand back.
target: I've got this. Stand back.

source: Search for the fugitives.
target: Search for the fugitives.

source: Cast Kardia on Lalah.
target: Cast Kardia on Lalah.

source: Cast Eukrasian Diagnosis on Lalah.
target: Cast Eukrasian Diagnosis on Lalah.

source: Eliminate the wildlife.
target: Eliminate the wildlife.

source: Eliminate the wildlife.
target: Eliminate the wildlife.

source: Search the area for clues.
target: Search the area for clues.

source: Defeat Loifa and his accomplices!
target: Defeat Loifa and his accomplices!

source: Yes, just so! Let us continue on!
target: Yes, just so! Let us continue on!

source: Excellent! Now we may proceed with confidence!
target: Excellent! Now we may proceed with confidence!

source: It's over! Lay down your arms, and I promise you won't come to further harm!
target: It's over! Lay down your arms, and I promise you won't come to further harm!

source: Godsdammit... If it wasn't for that sage...
target: Godsdammit... If it wasn't for that sage...

source: Ungh... Well, well...
target: Ungh... Well, well...

source: So, shall we practice some somanoutical fundamentals?
target: So, shall we practice some somanoutical fundamentals?

source: Some manner of plant seems to have been harvested here. I can't identify it by the remaining parts, however...
target: Some manner of plant seems to have been harvested here. I can't identify it by the remaining parts, however...

source: There may be other clues nearby. We should investigate further.
target: There may be other clues nearby. We should investigate further.

source: Th-Their enhancement has given them such power!?
target: Th-Their enhancement has given them such power!?

source: ロイファを狙いましょう！
target: ロイファを狙いましょう！

source: Mahaud, return the favor and take care of that sage! Finish it!
target: Mahaud, return the favor and take care of that sage! Finish it!

source: Grrr, damn you!
target: Grrr, damn you!

source: Defeat the chimera.
target: Defeat the chimera.

source: Speak with Drusilla.
target: Speak with Drusilla.

source: Gibbet will hurt 'em from the flank, and Gallows will surprise 'em from behind. If you're getting' swarmed, use Guillotine to carve yourself some space.
target: Gibbet will hurt 'em from the flank, and Gallows will surprise 'em from behind. If you're getting' swarmed, use Guillotine to carve yourself some space.

source: The chimera won't be able to resist the smell of blood─make sure to soak these sands in it!
target: The chimera won't be able to resist the smell of blood─make sure to soak these sands in it!

source: You're getting' the hang of it! Gibbet will hurt 'em from the side─switch off between that and Gallows to make your attacks even more deadly!
target: You're getting' the hang of it! Gibbet will hurt 'em from the side─switch off between that and Gallows to make your attacks even more deadly!

source: That's what I like to see! Gallows will hurt 'em from behind─switch off between that and Gibbet to make your attacks even more deadly!
target: That's what I like to see! Gallows will hurt 'em from behind─switch off between that and Gibbet to make your attacks even more deadly!

source: You're usin' Guillotine like a true killer! Reap a feast of souls in one fell swoop!
target: You're usin' Guillotine like a true killer! Reap a feast of souls in one fell swoop!

source: You've takin' to killin' more quickly than I could've hoped. It'll be an easy thing to summon your avatar to your side.
target: You've takin' to killin' more quickly than I could've hoped. It'll be an easy thing to summon your avatar to your side.

source: Let's move on to the fun bit, eh? Your avatar will help you strike fear into the hearts of your foes.
target: Let's move on to the fun bit, eh? Your avatar will help you strike fear into the hearts of your foes.

source: Now call it to your side! Blood stalk and grim swathe will make short work of these fiends!
target: Now call it to your side! Blood stalk and grim swathe will make short work of these fiends!

source: The bloodshed should've gotten the chimera's attention. Steel yourself for a fight!
target: The bloodshed should've gotten the chimera's attention. Steel yourself for a fight!

source: Our target arrives. Finish this and I'll let you keep its head as a trophy!
target: Our target arrives. Finish this and I'll let you keep its head as a trophy!

source: So long as your avatar is by your side, monsters like this are nothin' more than easy prey.
target: So long as your avatar is by your side, monsters like this are nothin' more than easy prey.

source: Show me you've been listenin', <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Give your avatar a feast to remember!
target: Show me you've been listenin', <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Give your avatar a feast to remember!

source: Remember to position yourself! Gibbet from the side, Gallows from the rear! Simple enough, eh?
target: Remember to position yourself! Gibbet from the side, Gallows from the rear! Simple enough, eh?

source: Fill your Soul Gauge and summon your avatar!
target: Fill your Soul Gauge and summon your avatar!

source: Defeat the mired chimera!
target: Defeat the mired chimera!

source: Harvest the souls of the fallen to summon your avatar!
target: Harvest the souls of the fallen to summon your avatar!

source: Use Gibbet
target: Use Gibbet

source: Use Gallows
target: Use Gallows

source: Use Guillotine
target: Use Guillotine

source: Hehehe! I have awaited this feast for far too long. I think I shall skip straight to the main course!
target: Hehehe! I have awaited this feast for far too long. I think I shall skip straight to the main course!

source: The pig squirms and writhes. Stay still and let the chef's blade finish the job!
target: The pig squirms and writhes. Stay still and let the chef's blade finish the job!

source: Hmph. Very well. Meat is all the more delicious when it is tenderized!
target: Hmph. Very well. Meat is all the more delicious when it is tenderized!

source: Give him a taste of his own vile medicine, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Rip his soul out!
target: Give him a taste of his own vile medicine, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Rip his soul out!

source: You just worry about Orcus, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll take care of the rest.
target: You just worry about Orcus, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll take care of the rest.

source: Gah... No...
target: Gah... No...

source: Defeat Orcus!
target: Defeat Orcus!

source: Ugh... I can't die...without a final meal.
target: Ugh... I can't die...without a final meal.

source: Lightning gathers! We must head it off!
target: Lightning gathers! We must head it off!

source: To attack with such reckless abandon... Their bodies and minds must be on the verge of breaking!
target: To attack with such reckless abandon... Their bodies and minds must be on the verge of breaking!

source: Sharlayan will suffer your villainy no more!
target: Sharlayan will suffer your villainy no more!

source: Damn it, they're not in their right minds!
target: Damn it, they're not in their right minds!

source: You'll pay for all the lives you've destroyed!
target: You'll pay for all the lives you've destroyed!

source: Spread out, spread out!
target: Spread out, spread out!

source: Stay with me, my friends! We'll free you yet!
target: Stay with me, my friends! We'll free you yet!

source: Wake up, Ancel! Please!
target: Wake up, Ancel! Please!

source: Steady, Mahaud! Steady!
target: Steady, Mahaud! Steady!

source: みんな、当たらないように散るんだ！
target: みんな、当たらないように散るんだ！

source: Ancel! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> needs our help!
target: Ancel! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> needs our help!

source: Aaahhh! Arrrggghhh!
target: Aaahhh! Arrrggghhh!

source: Unnnghhh... Arrrggghhh!
target: Unnnghhh... Arrrggghhh!

source: Heh heh heh... Let us begin with you, Ancel!
target: Heh heh heh... Let us begin with you, Ancel!

source: That will do, that will do... Mahaud─your turn!
target: That will do, that will do... Mahaud─your turn!

source: Man's frail flesh is his greatest flaw! If we are to evolve, we must break free of its confines!
target: Man's frail flesh is his greatest flaw! If we are to evolve, we must break free of its confines!

source: Hm, so this is your limit. <sigh> Yet another disappointment...but perhaps you can take one of these meddlers with you to the grave!
target: Hm, so this is your limit. <sigh> Yet another disappointment...but perhaps you can take one of these meddlers with you to the grave!

source: Ahahahahahaha!
target: Ahahahahahaha!

source: You truly are fascinating specimens! Oh, the things I will learn from your cadavers!
target: You truly are fascinating specimens! Oh, the things I will learn from your cadavers!

source: This proving ground was prepared especially for you. I trust you won't mind if I harvest a sample or two!
target: This proving ground was prepared especially for you. I trust you won't mind if I harvest a sample or two!

source: Come, let us test the edge of my scalpel!
target: Come, let us test the edge of my scalpel!

source: I am quite experienced in the art of amputation. You won't feel a thing!
target: I am quite experienced in the art of amputation. You won't feel a thing!

source: Subdue Ancel and Mahaud.
target: Subdue Ancel and Mahaud.

source: Defeat Guildivain!
target: Defeat Guildivain!

source: You're disgusting!
target: You're disgusting!

source: This bodes ill... We must finish him quickly!
target: This bodes ill... We must finish him quickly!

source: Then we have no choice but to subdue them.
target: Then we have no choice but to subdue them.

source: People are not your playthings, you fiend!
target: People are not your playthings, you fiend!

source: Hmph, laugh while you can! You won't be doing it much longer!
target: Hmph, laugh while you can! You won't be doing it much longer!

source: It has been a tremendous pleasure, my dear subjects. But all good things must come to an end.
target: It has been a tremendous pleasure, my dear subjects. But all good things must come to an end.

source: Oh gods, not this spell!
target: Oh gods, not this spell!

source: Damn it, he's taken control of their minds again!
target: Damn it, he's taken control of their minds again!

source: Oho, it seems our two sages have protection─intrinsic and extrinsic, respectively. Curiouser and curiouser...
target: Oho, it seems our two sages have protection─intrinsic and extrinsic, respectively. Curiouser and curiouser...

source: Not good... At this rate, their minds will be irreparably damaged!
target: Not good... At this rate, their minds will be irreparably damaged!

source: This magick is derived from somanoutics! If we destroy his nouliths, we can break its hold!
target: This magick is derived from somanoutics! If we destroy his nouliths, we can break its hold!

source: Too clever by half! But you'll need to be quick too, else your comrades' brains will melt in their skulls.
target: Too clever by half! But you'll need to be quick too, else your comrades' brains will melt in their skulls.

source: Yes, we did it! Are you all right, my friends!?
target: Yes, we did it! Are you all right, my friends!?

source: <pant> <pant> I think so... Thank you...
target: <pant> <pant> I think so... Thank you...

source: Your successor is proving <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> quite the nuisance, Hatia... But unique as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is most definitely worth the trouble!
target: Your successor is proving <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> quite the nuisance, Hatia... But unique as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is most definitely worth the trouble!

source: Keep your comrades alive and break their mind control.
target: Keep your comrades alive and break their mind control.

source: Defeat Erichthonios
target: Defeat Erichthonios

source: I must save them... But first...
target: I must save them... But first...

source: You will go no further...
target: You will go no further...

source: I'll shatter you against the stones!
target: I'll shatter you against the stones!

source: Be assailed by ice and flame!
target: Be assailed by ice and flame!

source: Your bones to ash! Your flesh to ice!
target: Your bones to ash! Your flesh to ice!

source: You leave me no choice...
target: You leave me no choice...

source: I cannot allow you to run free!
target: I cannot allow you to run free!

source: Chains to bind you!
target: Chains to bind you!

source: No... The lives of my colleagues are at stake!
target: No... The lives of my colleagues are at stake!

source: Should it cost me my life, I will triumph!
target: Should it cost me my life, I will triumph!

source: I must... I must return you to your cell!
target: I must... I must return you to your cell!

source: These shackles cannot be sundered!
target: These shackles cannot be sundered!

source: Cast off my chains, and I shall bind you again! Ever tighter...
target: Cast off my chains, and I shall bind you again! Ever tighter...

source: This shall be your final resting place!
target: This shall be your final resting place!

source: Be imprisoned 'twixt light and flame!
target: Be imprisoned 'twixt light and flame!

source: Run all you like, but my chains will catch you!
target: Run all you like, but my chains will catch you!

source: Drag them unto the depths, O chains!
target: Drag them unto the depths, O chains!

source: I will lock you away, once and again! Forever!
target: I will lock you away, once and again! Forever!

source: Defeat the phoinix
target: Defeat the phoinix

source:
理由はわからないが、獄卒長が環境を作り変えたみたいだ……！
ともかく今は眼前の脅威を、フェネクスを弱らせてくれ！
target:
理由はわからないが、獄卒長が環境を作り変えたみたいだ……！
ともかく今は眼前の脅威を、フェネクスを弱らせてくれ！

source: Minato holds me responsible for Kisei's death. I will keep its attention.
target: Minato holds me responsible for Kisei's death. I will keep its attention.

source: Have care. The air is thick with her malice.
target: Have care. The air is thick with her malice.

source: It means to charge! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, can you break its focus?
target: It means to charge! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, can you break its focus?

source: Well struck.
target: Well struck.

source: Remain calm and alert. It may attempt another charge.
target: Remain calm and alert. It may attempt another charge.

source: A formidable foe indeed. But we will not be bested!
target: A formidable foe indeed. But we will not be bested!

source: It readies to strike! On your guard!
target: It readies to strike! On your guard!

source: I...I can't move...
target: I...I can't move...

source: We must discuss your change of vocation─<var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> dealing with the blasphemy.
target: We must discuss your change of vocation─<var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> dealing with the blasphemy.

source: Quickly! We must protect Gosetsu!
target: Quickly! We must protect Gosetsu!

source: You have my thanks.
target: You have my thanks.

source: Urgh... This is nothing.
target: Urgh... This is nothing.

source: It comes for me! Perhaps a grazing shot will break its concentration.
target: It comes for me! Perhaps a grazing shot will break its concentration.

source: Expertly done!
target: Expertly done!

source: I am not so easily broken.
target: I am not so easily broken.

source: I sense something amiss. Quickly, to me!
target: I sense something amiss. Quickly, to me!

source: A test of my will and training both. Hold fast, everyone!
target: A test of my will and training both. Hold fast, everyone!

source: Well done, Gosetsu. Now, I believe it is past time we put Minato's soul to rest.
target: Well done, Gosetsu. Now, I believe it is past time we put Minato's soul to rest.

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Are you all right?
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Are you all right?

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Hold on!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Hold on!

source: Defeat Izanami
target: Defeat Izanami

source: Prove your strength to Venat!
target: Prove your strength to Venat!

source: Let neither side hold back.
target: Let neither side hold back.

source: Impressive... I shall have to try something different.
target: Impressive... I shall have to try something different.

source: I see you won't be easily overcome...but neither will I.
target: I see you won't be easily overcome...but neither will I.

source: We've only just begun. Come at me with your all!
target: We've only just begun. Come at me with your all!

source: My blade sings!
target: My blade sings!

source: There!
target: There!

source: Have a taste!
target: Have a taste!

source: No quarter!
target: No quarter!

source: Prepare yourself!
target: Prepare yourself!

source: Very well, let us move to the final trial.
target: Very well, let us move to the final trial.

source: Break your chains, shed your burdens─and show me your strength of will!
target: Break your chains, shed your burdens─and show me your strength of will!

source: You still stand. The people of your time are more resilient than I had dared hope.
target: You still stand. The people of your time are more resilient than I had dared hope.

source: I have seen enough.
target: I have seen enough.

source: Defeat Hesperos
target: Defeat Hesperos

source: I have awaited this moment... Witness the full measure of a hemitheos's power!
target: I have awaited this moment... Witness the full measure of a hemitheos's power!

source: There is but one master in Asphodelos!
target: There is but one master in Asphodelos!

source: These halls are <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> domain!
target: These halls are <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> domain!

source: If you insist upon this folly, then you must face the full extent of my authority!
target: If you insist upon this folly, then you must face the full extent of my authority!

source: I shall feast upon your aether!
target: I shall feast upon your aether!

source: Your aether turns...and by it shall you be undone!
target: Your aether turns...and by it shall you be undone!

source: A rat in a maze is amusing at first, but it is still a rat─vermin to be disposed of.
target: A rat in a maze is amusing at first, but it is still a rat─vermin to be disposed of.

source: Scurry, vermin, ere my blade finds your bellies...
target: Scurry, vermin, ere my blade finds your bellies...

source: This chlamys is no mere affectation, I assure you!
target: This chlamys is no mere affectation, I assure you!

source: For trespass in my domain shall you be judged!
target: For trespass in my domain shall you be judged!

source: Do not believe victory yours... I can yet shed this meager form and usher you back to the star!
target: Do not believe victory yours... I can yet shed this meager form and usher you back to the star!

source: To him do I dedicate this transformation─this victory!
target: To him do I dedicate this transformation─this victory!

source: Power courses through me! And you... You will feed my subjects!
target: Power courses through me! And you... You will feed my subjects!

source: A tragedy unfolds within the halls of Asphodelos. Rejoice, for you are its star!
target: A tragedy unfolds within the halls of Asphodelos. Rejoice, for you are its star!

source: And the final act begins! Bring your adoring fans to tears!
target: And the final act begins! Bring your adoring fans to tears!

source: To those who endured every tragic turn, stand at attention for the curtain call!
target: To those who endured every tragic turn, stand at attention for the curtain call!

source: A tragedy demands death. Discard your delusions of salvation and embrace catharsis!
target: A tragedy demands death. Discard your delusions of salvation and embrace catharsis!

source: 'Tis said that there are no ifs in history, yet man is wont to dream. Let us dream, then, of a future where a dear comrade lived...
target: 'Tis said that there are no ifs in history, yet man is wont to dream. Let us dream, then, of a future where a dear comrade lived...

source: Your feeble light shall fade before my brilliance!
target: Your feeble light shall fade before my brilliance!

source: Undone by mortal will. Whither now...?
target: Undone by mortal will. Whither now...?

source: O Ascalon! Drink deep of the power of slumbering gods!
target: O Ascalon! Drink deep of the power of slumbering gods!

source: Y-You survived my divine reckoning!? Impossible!
target: Y-You survived my divine reckoning!? Impossible!

source: This is the power of Light? No... If I must fall, then so shall you!
target: This is the power of Light? No... If I must fall, then so shall you!

source: Thy final verse is sung!
target: Thy final verse is sung!

source:
Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!
target:
Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!

source: Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!
target: Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!

source: I swore to Shiva─swore that I would not take the lives of men... Stop me, I prithee!
target: I swore to Shiva─swore that I would not take the lives of men... Stop me, I prithee!

source: I thank thee, servant of Hydaelyn... Now I may go to be with my beloved...
target: I thank thee, servant of Hydaelyn... Now I may go to be with my beloved...

source: Thus did one song draw to a close. But here and now, this minstrel shall perform another─a song of imagination transcending...
target: Thus did one song draw to a close. But here and now, this minstrel shall perform another─a song of imagination transcending...

source: At long last, this flesh belongeth to me! And now, wicked mortals─my dirge shall usher you unto your doom!
target: At long last, this flesh belongeth to me! And now, wicked mortals─my dirge shall usher you unto your doom!

source: Hahahaha! By the power of mine enemy's eyes, I am become a god eternal!
target: Hahahaha! By the power of mine enemy's eyes, I am become a god eternal!

source: O Ascalon! Purge the tainted with the light of sorrow immeasurable!
target: O Ascalon! Purge the tainted with the light of sorrow immeasurable!

source: O Ascalon! Consign the wicked with the light of rancor unquenchable!
target: O Ascalon! Consign the wicked with the light of rancor unquenchable!

source: O Ascalon! Scorch the earth with the light of regret unfathomable!
target: O Ascalon! Scorch the earth with the light of regret unfathomable!

source: Your time is come! Eyes of mine enemy, bring oblivion unto the unbelievers!
target: Your time is come! Eyes of mine enemy, bring oblivion unto the unbelievers!

source: Dragonsong War Progress
target: Dragonsong War Progress

source: Alternate Dragonsong War Progress
target: Alternate Dragonsong War Progress

source: In pursuit of the archbishop, the Warrior of Light journeyed to Azys Lla, where <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> confronted a primal born of the power of the Eye: King Thordan and his knights twelve.
target: In pursuit of the archbishop, the Warrior of Light journeyed to Azys Lla, where <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> confronted a primal born of the power of the Eye: King Thordan and his knights twelve.

source: Though <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> emerged victorious, <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> comrade's body was claimed by Nidhogg, who brought his unbridled rage to bear against Ishgard.
target: Though <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> emerged victorious, <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> comrade's body was claimed by Nidhogg, who brought his unbridled rage to bear against Ishgard.

source: A single life can alter the course of history... Enslaved by an ancient relic, the great wyrm Hraesvelgr descended upon Ishgard at his vengeful brother's side.
target: A single life can alter the course of history... Enslaved by an ancient relic, the great wyrm Hraesvelgr descended upon Ishgard at his vengeful brother's side.

source: Thus did a dreadful new divinity arise─one endowed with the nigh-irrepressible life force of two great wyrms...
target: Thus did a dreadful new divinity arise─one endowed with the nigh-irrepressible life force of two great wyrms...

source: Tell me, Warrior of Light. How do you propose to end this conflict?
target: Tell me, Warrior of Light. How do you propose to end this conflict?

source: If you believe that eliminating me will undo a thousand years of strife and suffering, then you are a fool.
target: If you believe that eliminating me will undo a thousand years of strife and suffering, then you are a fool.

source: It should go without saying, but stay on your guard. There was quite the menagerie of horrors when last I was here.
target: It should go without saying, but stay on your guard. There was quite the menagerie of horrors when last I was here.

source: They're upon us! To arms!
target: They're upon us! To arms!

source: Merlwyb and I shall hold them off. Press on, my friends!
target: Merlwyb and I shall hold them off. Press on, my friends!

source: A persistent lot, aren't they?
target: A persistent lot, aren't they?

source: I shall hold the line here. When you see an opening, take it, and do not look back!
target: I shall hold the line here. When you see an opening, take it, and do not look back!

source: Nerva never did make things easy. Let's get this over with.
target: Nerva never did make things easy. Let's get this over with.

source: More are coming! Stay sharp!
target: More are coming! Stay sharp!

source: There is no end to them...
target: There is no end to them...

source: Careful there, Leveilleur. They have their sights set on you.
target: Careful there, Leveilleur. They have their sights set on you.

source: I will see to the rabble. You focus on the large one there.
target: I will see to the rabble. You focus on the large one there.

source: Very well. With me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: Very well. With me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: This ends here, Nerva. For Garlemald, her people, and all who call this star home!
target: This ends here, Nerva. For Garlemald, her people, and all who call this star home!

source: Blasphemy or no, I'll not suffer anyone who gets in my way!
target: Blasphemy or no, I'll not suffer anyone who gets in my way!

source: For glory...everlasting. For Garlemald!
target: For glory...everlasting. For Garlemald!

source: Hold on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: Hold on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: We must take the offensive!
target: We must take the offensive!

source: To me... My legion!
target: To me... My legion!

source: We will be overrun at this rate...
target: We will be overrun at this rate...

source: Bring them here, and leave the rest to me.
target: Bring them here, and leave the rest to me.

source: Dammit, how could that have missed!? No matter, we will deal with them easily enough.
target: Dammit, how could that have missed!? No matter, we will deal with them easily enough.

source: Behind me, quickly! I shall take the brunt of it!
target: Behind me, quickly! I shall take the brunt of it!

source: We must...drive it back!
target: We must...drive it back!

source: <pant> <pant> Gods be good...
target: <pant> <pant> Gods be good...

source: We've come too far...to give up now...
target: We've come too far...to give up now...

source: Then let's put an end to this, shall we?
target: Then let's put an end to this, shall we?

source: No! Garlemald...is mine! MINE!!!
target: No! Garlemald...is mine! MINE!!!

source: No, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Are you all right?
target: No, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Are you all right?

source: Get a hold of yourself, <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>! We've a monster to slay!
target: Get a hold of yourself, <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>! We've a monster to slay!

source: Reach the top of the Tower of Babil!
target: Reach the top of the Tower of Babil!

source: Defeat Nerva's minions!
target: Defeat Nerva's minions!

source: Defeat Nerva yae Galvus!
target: Defeat Nerva yae Galvus!

source: Arrive at the undersea entrance
target: Arrive at the undersea entrance

source: Clear the undersea entrance
target: Clear the undersea entrance

source: Arrive at the Threshold of Bounty
target: Arrive at the Threshold of Bounty

source: Clear the Threshold of Bounty
target: Clear the Threshold of Bounty

source: Arrive at Weaver's Warding
target: Arrive at Weaver's Warding

source: Defeat the Kapikulu
target: Defeat the Kapikulu

source:
Unrecognized aetherial signature...
Brazen thief! You will proceed no further!
target:
Unrecognized aetherial signature...
Brazen thief! You will proceed no further!

source: Turn back, treasure seeker, or this vault will be your tomb.
target: Turn back, treasure seeker, or this vault will be your tomb.

source: Your greed will prove your undoing...
target: Your greed will prove your undoing...

source:
Warning. This vault is under my protection.
Failure to withdraw will invite chastisement.
target:
Warning. This vault is under my protection.
Failure to withdraw will invite chastisement.

source:
Spin and fumble!
Stumble and fall!
target:
Spin and fumble!
Stumble and fall!

source:
Leave now, and live.
This is your final warning.
target:
Leave now, and live.
This is your final warning.

source:
Willful trespass confirmed.
You have chosen...death.
target:
Willful trespass confirmed.
You have chosen...death.

source: All intruders will be slain!
target: All intruders will be slain!

source:
Glyph of passage detected.
Confirming bearer's identity...
target:
Glyph of passage detected.
Confirming bearer's identity...

source: I have taken the liberty of preparing an <var 1A 02 /var>electrifying<var 1A 01 /var> stage for you.
target: I have taken the liberty of preparing an <var 1A 02 /var>electrifying<var 1A 01 /var> stage for you.

source: Meet one of my creations. You might find it a <var 1A 02 /var>handful<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: Meet one of my creations. You might find it a <var 1A 02 /var>handful<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: I will lay Garlond low, but first I must break you!
target: I will lay Garlond low, but first I must break you!

source: <pant> I will not suffer...to be in another's shadow!
target: <pant> I will not suffer...to be in another's shadow!

source: Let us dance, champion of Eorzea.
target: Let us dance, champion of Eorzea.

source: Impressive! Now it is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> turn!
target: Impressive! Now it is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> turn!

source: Know your place!
target: Know your place!

source: Come, we shall see if you can finish what you have started.
target: Come, we shall see if you can finish what you have started.

source: Eorzea is mine by right!
target: Eorzea is mine by right!

source: That you should still stand... Very well, then!
target: That you should still stand... Very well, then!

source: Arrive at the command chamber
target: Arrive at the command chamber

source: Clear the command chamber
target: Clear the command chamber

source: Arrive at the Laboratorium Primum
target: Arrive at the Laboratorium Primum

source: Clear the Laboratorium Primum
target: Clear the Laboratorium Primum

source: Arrive on the Echelon
target: Arrive on the Echelon

source: Defeat Gaius van Baelsar
target: Defeat Gaius van Baelsar

source: Right, I'll examine the equipment for intelligence. Press on─I'll let you know if I learn anything.
target: Right, I'll examine the equipment for intelligence. Press on─I'll let you know if I learn anything.

source: Well, well, would you look at this! It's the armor we borrowed for our mission at Castrum Centri!
target: Well, well, would you look at this! It's the armor we borrowed for our mission at Castrum Centri!

source: If this isn't fate, I don't know what is! Go on, strap yourself in and raise hells!
target: If this isn't fate, I don't know what is! Go on, strap yourself in and raise hells!

source: If you will not yield, then you will be destroyed!
target: If you will not yield, then you will be destroyed!

source: We need to make our way down. There ought to be a terminal for the lift up ahead.
target: We need to make our way down. There ought to be a terminal for the lift up ahead.

source: Here it is. If you'd care to take the van, I'll follow after I've had a look around.
target: Here it is. If you'd care to take the van, I'll follow after I've had a look around.

source: Clear Ingenuity's Foothold
target: Clear Ingenuity's Foothold

source: Clear the Path
target: Clear the Path

source: Clear the Monument to Destruction
target: Clear the Monument to Destruction

source: Clear the Endless City
target: Clear the Endless City

source: Clear the Circle of Inquiry
target: Clear the Circle of Inquiry

source: Clear the Twin Halls
target: Clear the Twin Halls

source: The Builder has been made to yield...
target: The Builder has been made to yield...

source: Intriguing. Then the Destroyer shall take your measure...
target: Intriguing. Then the Destroyer shall take your measure...

source: ...After you have provided my servant with some sport.
target: ...After you have provided my servant with some sport.

source: In the name of the Destroyer, I will lay you low.
target: In the name of the Destroyer, I will lay you low.

source: My divine axe will rend you in twain!
target: My divine axe will rend you in twain!

source: Come, show me the strength of mankind!
target: Come, show me the strength of mankind!

source: Upon the ground you shall crawl!
target: Upon the ground you shall crawl!

source: By my authority as the Destroyer...
target: By my authority as the Destroyer...

source: I will break you body and soul!
target: I will break you body and soul!

source: Wandering star, descend and destroy!
target: Wandering star, descend and destroy!

source: Keep a reverent distance!
target: Keep a reverent distance!

source: Bask in my blinding resplendence!
target: Bask in my blinding resplendence!

source: Can you predict your own undoing?
target: Can you predict your own undoing?

source: Most impressive, children of man...
target: Most impressive, children of man...

source: A domain aspected to lightning... Byregot is here, I shouldn't doubt.
target: A domain aspected to lightning... Byregot is here, I shouldn't doubt.

source: The mechanical spire ahead could have been plucked straight out of legend!
target: The mechanical spire ahead could have been plucked straight out of legend!

source: That you should best a divinity... I couldn't have asked for better help!
target: That you should best a divinity... I couldn't have asked for better help!

source: So the gods have minions at their beck and call... We must proceed with care.
target: So the gods have minions at their beck and call... We must proceed with care.

source: Rhalgr isn't known as the god of destruction without reason. Steel yourself.
target: Rhalgr isn't known as the god of destruction without reason. Steel yourself.

source: Ahead stands a statue I have fashioned for our contest.
target: Ahead stands a statue I have fashioned for our contest.

source: Come, mortals. Enter my realm─if you dare.
target: Come, mortals. Enter my realm─if you dare.

source: Another domain─one aspected to fire...
target: Another domain─one aspected to fire...

source: Then the voice that called out to us...
target: Then the voice that called out to us...

source: Mere minions are no match for you, 'twould seem.
target: Mere minions are no match for you, 'twould seem.

source: A divinity awaits us beyond. Have care.
target: A divinity awaits us beyond. Have care.

source: Look how the sky has changed! The result of your victory over Azeyma, I daresay...
target: Look how the sky has changed! The result of your victory over Azeyma, I daresay...

source: There's a city up ahead... Could there be people here?
target: There's a city up ahead... Could there be people here?

source: Prepare to be judged, children of man.
target: Prepare to be judged, children of man.

source: Ashes you will be.
target: Ashes you will be.

source: Will you weather my trial?
target: Will you weather my trial?

source: We have only just begun!
target: We have only just begun!

source: The flames of the abyss consume all.
target: The flames of the abyss consume all.

source: Bitterest suffering awaits.
target: Bitterest suffering awaits.

source: From ashes you came, to ashes you will return.
target: From ashes you came, to ashes you will return.

source: Still you defy our divine authority.
target: Still you defy our divine authority.

source: Very well. Let us proceed to your judgment.
target: Very well. Let us proceed to your judgment.

source: We, the Traders, shall weigh your souls!
target: We, the Traders, shall weigh your souls!

source: Preserve the balance if you can.
target: Preserve the balance if you can.

source: 5 seconds to Balance.
target: 5 seconds to Balance.

source: 4 seconds to Balance.
target: 4 seconds to Balance.

source: 3 seconds...
target: 3 seconds...

source: 2 seconds...
target: 2 seconds...

source: 1 second...
target: 1 second...

source: Once more─and once more only─we shall weigh your souls.
target: Once more─and once more only─we shall weigh your souls.

source: Preserve the balance.
target: Preserve the balance.

source: The moment of judgment is come.
target: The moment of judgment is come.

source: You have been found wanting.
target: You have been found wanting.

source: You shall wander in purgatory for eternity.
target: You shall wander in purgatory for eternity.

source: You have passed our judgment...
target: You have passed our judgment...

source: Well done! You are deserving of reward!
target: Well done! You are deserving of reward!

source: Man's tenacity is a sight to behold!
target: Man's tenacity is a sight to behold!

source: As a show of esteem, we shall bring our all to bear.
target: As a show of esteem, we shall bring our all to bear.

source: Hahaha! Such vim and vigor!
target: Hahaha! Such vim and vigor!

source: So this is the spirit of man...
target: So this is the spirit of man...

source: You shall bear witness to our might...

source: But will you be able to comprehend it?
target: But will you be able to comprehend it?

source:
That mortals should set foot in our divine realm...
Come, we shall see whether you are fit to remain!
target:
That mortals should set foot in our divine realm...
Come, we shall see whether you are fit to remain!

source: So, you are resolved to face me.
target: So, you are resolved to face me.

source: By my power shall a new world be forged.
target: By my power shall a new world be forged.

source: Come, children of man!
target: Come, children of man!

source: Scatter!
target: Scatter!

target: Behold the works of a god!

target: The thunder is mine to command!

source: If you would halt our ascension, then press on...

target: Witness the glory of the divine!

source: Bend the knee!

target: You will be scoured by the light of the Sun!

target: O crimson fan, in fire woven...

source: In your wake leave naught uncleansed!

source: Is it just a mirage...or something more?
target: Is it just a mirage...or something more?

source: Hahaha! I've quite warmed to you!
target: Hahaha! I've quite warmed to you!

source: An explosive finish!
target: An explosive finish!

target: Let there be fire!

source: Raging flames, dance upon the wind!
target: Raging flames, dance upon the wind!

source: None can escape the inferno!
target: None can escape the inferno!

source: This will burn!
target: This will burn!

source: A gift of flame for our children!
target: A gift of flame for our children!

source: Ever shall the fires burn...
target: Ever shall the fires burn...

source: Every soul in this domain ssserves me now.<var 17 /var>Come, feassst upon their flesh!
target: Every soul in this domain ssserves me now.<var 17 /var>Come, feassst upon their flesh!

source: さぁ、餌の時間だ…！
target: さぁ、餌の時間だ…！

source: The castle answers his call...<var 17 /var>We'd do well to break up this feast quickly.
target: The castle answers his call...<var 17 /var>We'd do well to break up this feast quickly.

source: 戦闘が長引くとまずそうね……。
target: 戦闘が長引くとまずそうね……。

source: Behold the power of the archfiend of earth!

source: He hastens their regeneration!
target: He hastens their regeneration!

source: We are deathlessssss.<var 17 /var>You cannot defeat that which cannot die!
target: We are deathlessssss.<var 17 /var>You cannot defeat that which cannot die!

target: この戦いに加勢することで、チャラにしてもらうぞ。

source: What is this power?

source: You will tremble before my true ssstrength!
target: You will tremble before my true ssstrength!

target: Know your end is nigh!

source: Attend to the minions first.
target: Attend to the minions first.

target: Finally getting serious, are we?<var 17 /var>Very well, let us return the favor!

source: Trickery will not save you!

target: Enough! <var 1A 02 /var>Enough<var 1A 01 /var>!

target: We cannot win without Zero. We must help her!

source: Hmph. If I must deal with <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> first...<var 17 /var>I'll kill you all myself!
target: Hmph. If I must deal with <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> first...<var 17 /var>I'll kill you all myself!

source: Pathetic! Useless!

target: This place will be your grave!

target: This magick... We must stop him <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>!

target: Defeat all enemies.

source: She can turn voidsent into crystal...
target: She can turn voidsent into crystal...

target: The Ultima Weapon has partaken of the power of eikons! None can stand against it!

target: Yield to the storm!

target: No matter─it still harbors the might of other eikons!

source: The land itself is mine to wield!

target: Once more, crystal bearer. Look to the Light to vanquish the Darkness.

target: Garuda's as well!? Impossible!

target: But the Ultima Weapon is not spent of eikon power yet!

target: Very well, let us see how you fare when the Ultima Weapon's power inhibitor is disengaged!

target: No! How...how are you doing this!?

target: We settle this once and for all!

target: I need not the power of eikons to defeat you! Gaze upon <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> power!

source: This is most...unexpected. You are possessed of great might, this I will allow.

source: Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!
target: Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!

target: How much destruction must be wreaked before you are sated!?

target: I have not the strength...to shield thee again...

target: Permit not the manifestation of that vile magick...lest Darkness prevail!

target: Arrive at the confession chamber

target: Your defeat will bring Lord van Baelsar's noble conquest one step closer to fruition!

target: Your conviction and courage will not be for naught! This I swear!

target: For victory and vengeance, I will strike you down!

target: Defeat Rhitahtyn sas Arvina

target: Ignore pain... Ignite rage... And fight with the fury of wildfire!

target: You will have no mercy from me!

target: Defeat Livia sas Junius

target: This is Cid. To review, our goal is to deactivate the magitek field.

target: If you could create a diversion─that's to say, wreak lots of havoc─I'll search for the field generator.

target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how are you faring? ...Reached a dead end, you say? I believe I know where you are.

target: There's a disposal chute nearby. Find it and jump in, and you'll emerge in a different sector.

target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, assault crafts are near! Watch out for incoming fire!

source: I've located the controls for the security system. A moment while I disable the barriers.
target: I've located the controls for the security system. A moment while I disable the barriers.

source: Another bulkhead, eh? Fortunately I'm equipped for the task. Stand back!
target: Another bulkhead, eh? Fortunately I'm equipped for the task. Stand back!

target: Come on, the field generator should be just up ahead!

source: There it is! Keep the enemy occupied while I take it out of commission!
target: There it is! Keep the enemy occupied while I take it out of commission!

source: You will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> take any more from me!
target: You will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> take any more from me!

target: You have made me <var 1A 02 /var>wroth<var 1A 01 /var>!

target: But I will break you soon enough!

source: You will not defeat me! <var 1A 02 /var>You will not<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: You will not defeat me! <var 1A 02 /var>You will not<var 1A 01 /var>!

target: I'm also pleased to say I've found a suit of armor. Press on─I'll meet you just ahead.

source: Damn, reinforcements! Take care of them, would you?
target: Damn, reinforcements! Take care of them, would you?

target: We must hold the enemy here! All units─attack!

target: Gah, damn these savages! Deploy the reserve colossi!

target: How can this be...? R-Reinforcements! We need more reinforcements!

source: We have seen the end.
target: We have seen the end.

source: The same end, again and again.
target: The same end, again and again.

source: All of us have known despair.
target: All of us have known despair.

source: A sorrow so deep only emptiness remains.
target: A sorrow so deep only emptiness remains.

source: 'Tis so lonely between the stars.
target: 'Tis so lonely between the stars.

target: As surely as stars fall from the heavens, all civilizations are destined to die.

source: This is fate!
target: This is fate!

target: Embrace the quiet!

target: Utterly futile.

target: Ahhh, it comes flooding back. The memory of a star ravaged by disease.

target: Quick as a shadow, doom comes to claim us.

target: Ever shall we sing, our voice resounding throughout the vast expanse.

target: Unto you we shall deliver the answer of all the lives that came before.

target: No life, no star, nor the universe itself...

target: None should hope for better!

source: We cannot suffer it again...
target: We cannot suffer it again...

target: For the sake of the star, I will deal with you personally!

target: You have meddled enough! Farewell, servant of Light!

target: Surrender not, my child. Look thee to the Light...

target: And receive of the power to banish the Darkness!

target: That You should still have the strength to interfere... Damn You, Hydaelyn!

source: No matter. Blessing or no, you imperfect beings cannot hope to defeat me!
target: No matter. Blessing or no, you imperfect beings cannot hope to defeat me!

target: Those tainted by Light cannot be suffered to live! Go forth, my shadows!

target: Yet know that if I should perish, so too will the mortal within whose flesh I reside.

target: Hmph. Yours was always a vain struggle.

target: Hearken unto me, brave Mogglesguard! These villains must be vanquished!

target: Our foe is formidable, kupo. But surely, they are no match for our king!

target: Hail to the king, kupo!

target: To me, my Mogglesguard! We strike as one!

target: Tear them apart if you must! Their drifting aether will suffice!

That you should make it this far...
No matter, I will devour you personally!
target:
That you should make it this far...
No matter, I will devour you personally!

It has an entire bank of artillery at its command!

ThE iMpOsSiBlE cHoIcE...
wIlL yOu TaStE sTeEl, Or WiThEr In FlAmE?

wIlL yOu TaStE sTeEl, Or WiThEr In FlAmE?
